channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: Chamber of Commerce sees new US export crackdown on China, email says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Biden政府、出口限制、中国、下周、美国商会
总结: 美国总统拜登政府计划于下周公布针对中国的新的出口限制措施。这一消息由美国商会于周四通过电子邮件通知其成员。这些新限制将进一步管控对华高科技产品出口，旨在限制中国的技术发展和军事能力提升。 <div> The Biden administration is set to unveil new export restrictions on China as soon as next week, the U.S. Chamber of Commerce told members in a Thursday email.

item.title: EU, China close to agreement over EV import tariffs, leading MEP says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Brussels、Beijing、European Union、Chinese electric vehicle imports、tariffs
总结: 欧盟和中国接近达成一项关于中国电动汽车进口到欧盟关税问题的解决方案。欧洲议会贸易委员会主席在接受德国广播电台采访时表示，双方正在朝着消除或调整这些关税的方向努力，这将有利于促进中欧之间电动车辆贸易的发展。 <div> Brussels and Beijing are nearing a solution over tariffs on Chinese electric vehicle imports into the bloc, the chair of the trade committee of the European Parliament told a German broadcaster.

item.title: Chinese hackers preparing for conflict, US cyber official says
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中国黑客、美国关键基础设施、IT网络、潜在冲突、美国网络安全官员
总结: 美国一位高级网络安全官员表示，中国黑客正在潜入美国的关键基础设施IT网络中，这可能预示着与美国之间存在潜在的冲突。
Chinese hackers are positioning themselves in U.S. critical infrastructure IT networks for a potential clash with the United States, a top American cybersecurity official said on Friday.

item.title: Procter & Gamble doubles down on China’s TikTok to reverse sales slump
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Procter & Gamble, 营销策略, Douyin, Pantene洗发水, 增长
总结: 宝洁公司最近几个月正在对其在快速增长的中国购物应用抖音上的营销策略及网红阵容进行重整。在周四的投资人会议上，高管表示，这一举措已助力其Pantene洗发水品牌在该平台上的头发护理品类中实现领涨增长。 <div> Procter & Gamble has been revamping its marketing and line-up of influencers on fast-growing Chinese shopping app Douyin in recent months, helping its Pantene shampoo lead growth in hair care on the platform, executives said Thursday at an investor day.

item.title: Mexico not a backdoor for Chinese products, president Sheinbaum says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国产品、美国、加拿大、墨西哥、贸易会议
总结: 墨西哥总统表示，中国产品并未通过墨西哥进入美国和加拿大。他强调，在即将召开的贸易会议上，政府将会明确这一立场。这意味着中美加三国之间的贸易动态中，墨西哥不会成为中国产品进入美加两国的通道。 <div> Chinese products are not entering the United States and Canada through Mexico, the president of the Latin American nation said on Friday, and the government will make that clear in upcoming trade meetings.

item.title: US bars more food, metal imports over China's alleged forced labor
item.content:encoded: The United States banned food, metals and other imports from about 30 more Chinese companies over alleged forced labor involving the Uyghurs, according to a government notice posted online on Friday.

item.title: Tariffs could hurt growth, boost inflation for all, Bundesbank chief warns
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 欧洲、美国、贸易战争、通胀、欧盟经济整合
总结: 如果出现新的贸易战争，欧洲和美国都将面临增长放缓的问题，同时通胀也可能上升。这将增大对欧盟领导人施加的压力，要求他们启动久拖未决的经济整合进程，以保护该地区免受冲击。德国联邦银行行长Joachim Nagel于上周五发表了这一观点。 <div> Europe and the U.S. will both take a growth hit if there is a new trade war and inflation could also rise, increasing pressure on EU leaders to kick start long-delayed economic integration to insulate the bloc, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said on Friday.

item.title: New U.S. sanctions probably spell end of EU energy payments through Russia's Gazprombank
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国制裁、莫斯科、欧洲客户、俄罗斯天然气、支付方式、俄罗斯FX市场、波动性、莫斯科、北京、经济关系

总结： 美国对莫斯科的新一轮制裁可能导致欧洲客户支付俄罗斯天然气的唯一途径被关闭。这将增加俄罗斯外汇市场的波动性，并促使莫斯科进一步向北京靠拢，在经济上加强与中国的联系。俄罗斯经济学家对此表示了担忧。
New U.S. sanctions on Moscow may shut down the only way European customers can pay for Russian gas, increase volatility on Russia's FX market and push Moscow closer to Beijing's orbit, Russian economists said on Friday.

item.title: Morning Bid: Euro/dollar stares at parity, Bitcoin eyes $100k
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国市场、全球市场、经济数据、企业财报、投资者情绪
总结： 今日在美国和全球市场，投资者将密切关注重要的经济数据发布以及企业财报表现，这些因素将对市场走势产生关键影响。此外，投资者情绪的变化也将成为左右市场动态的关键因素之一。预期美国股市可能会因近期公布的经济指标和公司业绩而出现波动，同时全球经济环境的发展也将持续为全球市场带来不确定性。 <div> A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: Duct-taped banana artist says his work is a 'provocation' on value of art
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：意大利艺术家、香蕉、duct tape、$6.2 million、艺术价值
总结: 意大利艺术家创作的一件将香蕉用duct tape贴在墙上的作品本周以620万美元售出。他在周五发表的采访中表示，这件作品是一个“挑衅”，旨在邀请人们重新审视和欣赏艺术的真正价值。这件看似普通的艺术品引发了对于当代艺术与价值认知的讨论。 <div> The Italian artist who created the banana duct-taped to a wall that sold this week for $6.2 million, said in an interview published on Friday that the work was a "provocation" and an invitation to appreciate the true value of art.

item.title: India to offer $4-$5 bln in incentives for electronics production, weaning off China
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度、$50亿美元、激励措施、本地生产、组件、移动设备、笔记本电脑、政府官员、中国依赖

总结： 为推动本土产业发展并减少对中国供应的依赖，印度政府两名官员表示，印度将提供高达50亿美元的激励措施，鼓励企业在当地生产用于移动设备和笔记本电脑等电子产品的组件。
India will offer up to $5 billion in incentives to companies to make components locally for gadgets from mobiles to laptops, two government officials said, in a bid to bolster the burgeoning industry and wean off supplies from China.

item.title: China widens EU dairy probe to more subsidy programmes
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、欧盟、乳制品进口、反补贴调查、丹麦、法国、意大利、荷兰 总结:
中国表示将扩大对来自欧盟乳制品进口的反补贴调查范围，追加涵盖欧盟的更多补贴项目以及丹麦、法国、意大利和荷兰的具体补贴措施。
China said on Friday it would expand the scope of its anti-subsidy investigation into dairy imports from the European Union to cover additional EU subsidy programmes as well as those in Denmark, France, Italy and the Netherlands.

item.title: Asia Gold Gold demand tepid in India, other Asian hubs as prices rebound
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Physical gold premiums, India, demand, local prices, jewellers, retail buyers, China, bullion, Asian hubs, subdued

总结: 本周，印度实物黄金升水下滑，原因在于当地金价上涨导致珠宝商和零售商需求减少。同时，全球最大消费国中国以及其他主要亚洲市场的黄金需求也保持低迷态势。
Physical gold premiums slipped in India on a pull-back in demand this week as rising local prices prompted jewellers and retail buyers to stay on the sidelines, while demand for bullion in top consumer China and other major Asian hubs also remained subdued.

item.title: China expands visa-free access to Japan, Bulgaria and other countries
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、签证免费安排、日本、保加利亚、罗马尼亚、克罗地亚、黑山、2024年11月30日、2025年12月31日

总结: 中国外交部发言人于上周五宣布，自2024年11月30日至2025年12月31日期间，将对日本、保加利亚、罗马尼亚、克罗地亚和黑山等国家扩大实施免签政策。这意味着在此期间，来自这些国家的公民将更容易访问中国，无需申请签证。
China will expand its visa-free arrangements to include Japan, Bulgaria, Romania, Croatia, Montenegro and other countries, effective from Nov. 30, 2024, to Dec. 31, 2025, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Friday.

item.title: Texas governor orders state agencies to sell China assets
item.content:encoded:
关键词：德州州长、中国、投资禁令、财务风险、安全风险、美中紧张局势、全球资本流动
总结: 德州州长下令该州的政府部门停止对中国的投资并尽快出售相关资产，此举缘于财务和安全风险考虑，显示出美中紧张关系开始影响全球资本流动。
The governor of Texas ordered state agencies to stop investing in China and sell assets there as soon as possible, citing financial and security risks, a sign of rising U.S.-China tensions starting to impact global capital flows.

item.title: BP and partners to invest $7 billion in carbon capture project in Indonesia's Papua
item.content:encoded:
关键词：BP、合作伙伴、$70亿美元、碳捕获项目、印尼巴布亚地区、天然气田开发、3万亿立方英尺额外天然气资源。

总结： BP及其合作伙伴宣布将投资70亿美元在印度尼西亚最东部的巴布亚地区开展一项碳捕获项目和天然气田开发。该项目旨在解锁该区域高达3万亿立方英尺的额外天然气资源。
BP and partners said they would invest $7 billion in a carbon capture project and gas field development in Indonesia's easternmost Papua region that could unlock 3 trillion cubic feet of additional gas resources.

item.title: Suspected China-linked hack on US telecoms worst in nation's history, senator says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国、中国、电信公司、黑客攻击、历史最严重
总结: 美国参议院情报委员会主席称，一起与中方有关的电信公司数据泄露事件是“我国历史上迄今为止最严重的电信黑客攻击”。据华盛顿邮报报道，该事件引发了对网络安全的高度关注。 <div> A breach of telecoms companies that the United States said was linked to China was the "worst telecom hack in our nation's history - by far", the chairman of the Senate Intelligence Committee told the Washington Post on Thursday.

item.title: China says it is willing to talk with US to push forward bilateral trade
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、美国、对话、相互尊重、经济贸易关系 总结:
中国愿与美国基于相互尊重的原则开展积极对话，并推动双边经贸关系的发展。副商务部长王受文于周五表示。
China is willing to conduct active dialogue with the United States based on the principles of mutual respect and promote the development of bilateral economic and trade relations, vice commerce minister Wang Shouwen said on Friday.

item.title: Gold and oil surge on Ukraine war fears as poor data pummels the euro
item.content:encoded:
关键词：黄金、石油、避险资产、瑞士法郎、德国政府债务、俄罗斯-乌克兰冲突、欧洲天然气价格、经济数据、欧元压力 总结:
随着俄罗斯与乌克兰冲突升级，本周五黄金、石油以及包括瑞士法郎和德国政府债在内的避险资产均录得强劲涨幅。同时，欧洲天然气价格的上涨以及不佳的经济数据给欧元带来了压力。
Gold, oil, and haven assets from the Swiss franc to German government debt headed for strong weekly gains on Friday after the Russia-Ukraine conflict escalated, while European gas price rises and poor economic data heaped pressure on the euro.

item.title: Taiwan's president to visit Tuvalu, Palau and Marshall Islands
item.content:encoded: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te will visit Tuvalu, Palau and Marshall Islands in the Pacific, the presidential office said on Friday.

item.title: Oil heads for weekly gains as Ukraine war intensifies
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：石油价格、周五、周涨幅5%、乌克兰战争、中国进口增加
总结: 石油价格在周五保持稳定，预计本周将实现5%的涨幅。这主要归因于乌克兰战争形势加剧以及中国将在11月增加进口量的预期。 <div> Oil prices held steady on Friday, on track for a weekly rise of 5%, as the Ukraine war intensified and Chinese imports were set to increase in November.

item.title: Taiwan's president to visit Pacific allies, no details on US transits
item.content:encoded: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te will visit Taipei's three remaining diplomatic allies in the Pacific on a trip starting at the end of the month, his office said on Friday, but the government declined to give details on U.S. transit stops.

item.title: China's Xi visits Morocco, meets with crown prince, says state media
item.content:encoded:
关键词：习近平、中国国家主席、访问、摩洛哥、周四 总结：
中国国家主席习近平于周四对摩洛哥进行了短暂访问。据官方新闻机构MAP报道，这是习近平对这个北非国家的一次重要外交行动，进一步加强了中摩两国之间的友好合作关系。
Chinese President Xi Jinping made a short visit to Morocco on Thursday, according to state news agency MAP.

item.title: Corporate China seeks dollars as trade tensions rise
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国公司、美元储备、人民币定价、进口渠道、货币风险 总结：
随着贸易紧张局势可能导致外汇汇率波动加剧，中国公司正在增加美元储备，同时更多地采用人民币进行合同定价，并开辟进口线路，以此来缓解货币风险。
Chinese firms are squirreling away even more dollars, pricing contracts in yuan and opening import lines to mitigate currency risks as trade tensions threaten to roil foreign exchange rates.

item.title: Morning Bid: Resilience is the name of the game, Japan CPI eyed
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市表现、经济数据、投资者情绪、中美贸易关系 总结: 随着新的一天开始，亚洲市场的关注点将落在各地股市的表现上，特别是中国经济数据的发布，这些数据可能会对市场产生重大影响。投资者情绪也将持续受全球宏观经济环境和中美贸易关系动态的影响。此外，任何关于主要经济体政策动向的消息也可能成为影响当天亚洲市场走势的关键因素。

A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: IAEA Board passes Iran resolution as West pushes Tehran towards talks
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：伊朗、核活动、谈判、新限制、压力
总结: 美国和其盟友正在寻求对伊朗施加更多压力，目的是促使伊朗同意就新的核活动限制进行谈判。通过这一举措，国际社会希望能够在现有基础上进一步约束伊朗的核计划发展，确保其不会走向军事化。 <div> The aim is to pressure Iran into entering negotiations on new restrictions on its nuclear activities.

item.title: Exxon group pulls out of talks with Guyana over shallow water oil block, government says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Exxon Mobil、美国石油巨头、圭亚那政府、浅水区油块、谈判破裂 总结:
美国石油巨头埃克森美孚及其合作伙伴已退出与圭亚那政府关于浅水区油块勘探和开发条款的谈判。这一消息由圭亚那副总统于周四宣布。
U.S. oil major Exxon Mobil and partners have pulled out of negotiations with Guyana's government on terms for exploring and developing a shallow-water oil block, the South American country's vice president said on Thursday.

item.title: FCC proposes fining Chinese video doorbell manufacturer after security concerns raised
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：联邦通信委员会(Federal Communications Commission)、中国、Eken、视频门铃制造商、罚款、虚假信息、安全 concerns
总结: 美国联邦通信委员会于周四提议对总部位于中国的视频门铃制造商Eken处以近735,000美元的罚款。这起罚单源于Eken被指控提供了虚假信息，并在其产品引发了安全顾虑之后。 <div> The Federal Communications Commission on Thursday proposed to fine Chinese-based video doorbell manufacturer Eken nearly $735,000 for providing false information and after security concerns were raised.

item.title: China blames US policy on Taiwan for defence leaders not meeting
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国国防部长、美国、台湾、 Laos、会面未果 总结：
中国国防部指责美国对台立场导致其国防部长在本周于老挝举行的会议上未能与美国防长会面。
China's defence ministry blamed the United States' stance on Taiwan for its minister not meeting his U.S. counterpart during a gathering this week in Laos.

item.title: China claims 'wipe-out' of large telecom fraud centres in northern Myanmar
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、缅甸、执法机构、电信诈骗、大规模、逮捕 总结:
中国和缅甸的执法机构合作成功清剿了位于缅甸北部的所有大型电信诈骗中心。据中国官方媒体周四报道，上周末开展的一次行动中，有超过700名嫌疑人被逮捕。此举打击了跨境电信诈骗犯罪活动，保障了两国人民的利益。
China and Myanmar's law enforcement agencies have "wiped out" all large-scale telecom fraud centres operating in northern Myanmar, Chinese state media reported on Thursday, after an operation at the weekend saw more than 700 arrested.

item.title: Hong Kong democracy activist Jimmy Lai denies inciting hatred towards China in trial
item.content:encoded: Pro-democracy activist Jimmy Lai said on Thursday he was against violence and had not sought to incite hatred against China and Hong Kong authorities by calling for protests to defend basic rights, speaking in his second day of testimony in a landmark national security trial.

item.title: China's Trustar raises $1 bln for vehicle that holds McDonald's China stake, sources say
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Trustar Capital、$1 billion、continuation fund、McDonald Corp、中国及香港业务 总结:
Trustar Capital已成功筹集了10亿美元的资金，用于设立一支延续基金。该基金将接手并持有这家中国私募股权公司对麦当劳公司在大陆和香港地区运营业务的控股权益。据知情人士透露，此举将进一步巩固和拓展Trustar Capital在麦当劳中国及香港市场中的投资布局。
Trustar Capital has raised $1 billion for a continuation fund that will hold the Chinese private equity firm's controlling stake in McDonald Corp's operations in mainland China and Hong Kong, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.

item.title: Morning Bid: Nvidia sees past triple-digit growth
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Mike Dolan、经济数据、市场动态 总结: 迈克·多兰展望了美国和全球市场的未来一天情况。预计关键因素将包括重要的经济数据发布对金融市场的影响以及全球市场的最新动态。投资者应密切关注这些数据以作出明智的投资决策。此外，他可能还会分析潜在的市场趋势、风险事件及各国政策变化对市场走向的预期影响。

请注意，以上内容是根据提供的信息推断得出，具体内容需参考原文。
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: China announces policy measures to boost trade amid worries over Trump tariffs
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国 商务部 政策措施 外贸 加强融资支持 扩大农产品出口

总结： 中国商务部宣布一系列政策举措以促进对外贸易发展。措施包括承诺加强对企业的融资支持力度，以及扩大农产品的出口规模。这些政策旨在推动外贸稳中向好，进一步提升中国在全球贸易中的竞争力。
China's commerce ministry on Thursday announced a series of policy measures aimed at boosting the country's foreign trade, including pledging to strengthen financing support to firms and expand exports of agricultural products.

item.title: Alibaba combines e-commerce arms to tackle growing competition
item.content:encoded:
关键词：阿里巴巴集团、国内电商、国际电商、单一业务单元、领导层整合 总结:
阿里巴巴集团宣布，将把其国内与国际电商平台首次合并为统一的业务板块，并由一位领导者统一管理。这一调整意味着阿里巴巴将进一步整合资源和运营策略，以优化业务效率和提升全球竞争力。
Alibaba Group will integrate its domestic Chinese and international e-commerce platforms into a single business unit run by one leader for the first time, the company said in a stock exchange filing on Thursday.

item.title: Taiwan says son of jailed former senior Chinese official Bo Xilai is visiting
item.content:encoded: Taiwan's government said on Thursday that the son of jailed former senior Chinese leader Bo Xilai was visiting the island for personal reasons after marrying a Taiwan citizen, a rare trip for someone linked to China's political elite.

item.title: U.S. backs Philippine forces in South China Sea with task force
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国军事、菲律宾、南中国海、特别任务部队、情报、监视、侦察 总结:
美国大使馆官员周四表示，美军正通过一支特殊任务部队支持菲律宾在南中国海的行动。据透露，该行动涉及情报、监视和侦察等方面的合作。菲律宾方面也确认了这一情况。
The U.S. military is supporting Philippine operations in the South China Sea via a special task force, a U.S. embassy official said on Thursday, an initiative Manila said involves intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance.

item.title: China's Baidu posts 3% fall in third-quarter revenue, meeting market view
item.content:encoded:
关键词：百度、第三季度营收、下跌3%、市场预期、中国经济放缓、广告支出减少 总结：
百度周四报告称其第三季度营收下滑3%，符合市场预期。中国最大的互联网搜索引擎提供商正面临疲软经济下，其广告服务支出减少的挑战。
Baidu reported a 3% fall in third-quarter revenue on Thursday, meeting market estimates, as China's biggest internet search provider grappled with weak spending on its advertising services in a sluggish economy.

item.title: Military help for Ukraine 'too sensitive', but rep office a goal, Taiwan envoy says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：台湾、军事援助、乌克兰、代表办公室、副外交部长 Francois Wu
总结: 台湾副外交部长 Francois Wu 表示，由于涉入军事援助乌克兰一事“太过敏感”，台湾并未参与其中。不过，台湾希望能设立一个驻乌克兰的代表办公室。 <div> Taiwan is not involved in military assistance for Ukraine as it is "too sensitive" but would like to establish a representative office in the country, Taiwan Deputy Foreign Minister Francois Wu said.

item.title: Insolvencies in Germany up 22.9% year-on-year in October
item.content:encoded:
关键词：德国、统计办公室Destatis、十月、破产案件数量、上升 总结:
德国统计办公室Destatis表示，与去年同期相比，今年十月份德国的破产案件数量增长了22.9%。
The number of insolvencies in Germany rose by 22.9% in October on the previous year, the country's statistics office Destatis said on Thursday.

item.title: China finds $83 billion worth of gold reserves in Hunan
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、湖南中部、黄金储量、6000亿元、Xinhua新闻
总结: 据新华社报道，中国在湖南省中部地区发现价值约为6000亿元人民币（约合829亿美元）的黄金储量。这一重大发现标志着中国在矿产资源勘探方面取得重要成果，进一步丰富了中国的黄金资源储备。 <div> China has found gold reserves worth 600 billion yuan ($82.9 billion) in central Hunan province, state outlet Xinhua news said on Thursday.

item.title: China willing to maintain communication on submarine infrastructure security
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、国际潜艇基础设施、安全维护、沟通、相关方
总结: 中国外交部表示，中国愿意与有关各方保持沟通合作，共同维护国际海底光缆等潜艇基础设施的安全。这表明了中国对于保障全球信息传输安全和国际合作的积极态度。 <div> China is willing to maintain communication with relevant parties and to jointly safeguard the security of international submarine infrastructure, its foreign ministry said on Thursday.

item.title: Bracing for Trump tariffs, China's Xi makes diplomatic push at global summits
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 唐纳德·特朗普、再当选、美国总统、习近平、中国国家主席、外交攻势、关税、潜在裂痕、华盛顿、盟友
总结: 在唐纳德·特朗普再次当选美国总统后，中国国家主席习近平在首次全球会议中采取了外交攻势。此举旨在对冲预计会增加的新关税，并准备利用未来可能出现的华盛顿与其盟友之间的潜在裂痕来获取战略优势。
In his first global meetings since Donald Trump was reelected to lead the U.S., Chinese President Xi Jinping went on a diplomatic offensive, hedging against expected new tariffs and preparing to exploit potential future rifts between Washington and its allies.

item.title: Exclusive: Huawei aims to mass-produce newest AI chip in early 2025, despite US curbs
item.content:encoded:
关键词：华为、人工智能芯片、大规模生产、2025年第一季度、美国限制

总结：中国华为公司计划在2025年第一季度开始大规模生产其最先进的人工智能芯片，但目前由于受到美国的限制，该公司在芯片制造方面面临困难。尽管如此，华为依然决心推进这款先进芯片的量产进程。
China's Huawei plans to start mass-producing its most advanced artificial intelligence chip in the first quarter of 2025, even as it struggles to make enough chips due to U.S. restrictions, said two people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Cambodia's flagship canal in hot water as China funding dries up
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 柬埔寨、Hun Manet、运河、经济转型、僧侣祝福 总结:
柬埔寨领导人Hun Manet在八月的一个仪式上，向身着袈裟的僧侣下跪接受祝福，随着烟花和气球的升空，标志着他期望能改变国家经济命运的新运河工程正式启动。
At a ceremony in August, Cambodia's leader Hun Manet knelt to receive blessings from saffron-robed monks as fireworks and balloons heralded the breaking of ground for a canal he hopes will transform his country's economic fortunes.

item.title: Starbucks weighs strategic partnerships for China operations
item.content:encoded:
关键词：星巴克、中国业务、战略伙伴、出售股份、当地合作伙伴 总结:
星巴克于周四重申，公司正在为其在中国的业务探索战略合作伙伴关系。此前有媒体报道称，星巴克正在考虑将中国业务的部分股权出售给当地的合作伙伴。
Starbucks reiterated on Thursday it is exploring strategic partnerships for its Chinese operations, after a media report saying the company is considering selling a stake in the business to a local partner.

item.title: Exclusive: China advisers call for steady 5% 2025 economic growth goal, stronger stimulus
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国、政府顾问、经济增长目标、5.0%、财政刺激、美国关税、出口影响
总结: 中国政府顾问建议明年应维持大约5.0%的经济增长目标，并主张实施更有力的财政刺激措施，以缓解预期中美国加征关税对本国出口带来的负面影响。 <div> Chinese government advisers are recommending that Beijing should maintain an economic growth target of around 5.0% for next year, pushing for stronger fiscal stimulus to mitigate the impact of expected U.S. tariff hikes on the country's exports.

item.title: Morning Bid: Nvidia beats, but fails to provide spark
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、走势、股市、经济数据、投资者情绪 总结:
随着新的一天开始，亚洲市场的注意力将集中在各主要股市的走势上，预期各地股市开盘将受到隔夜全球市场表现的影响。经济数据的发布也将成为影响市场走势的关键因素，包括中国的贸易数据或日本的通胀数据等。此外，投资者将继续关注全球宏观经济环境以及地缘政治动态对市场情绪的影响，这些因素都将在当天亚洲市场的交易中起到重要作用。
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: Chinese defense minister declines meeting with Pentagon chief
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国国防部长、美国防部长劳埃德·奥斯汀、老挝会议、拒绝会面、五角大楼
总结: 中国国防部长在老挝召开的国防领导人会议上拒绝了与美国防部长劳埃德·奥斯汀的会面。这一举动被五角大楼负责人称作不幸事件。 <div> China's defense minister declined a meeting with U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin during a meeting of defense leaders in Laos, a move the Pentagon chief said on Wednesday was unfortunate.

item.title: Hennessy workers strike as France's Macron urges Xi to drop China cognac tariffs
item.content:encoded: Hennessy staff extended a strike on Wednesday over its plans to bottle cognac in China to circumvent import tariffs, after French President Emmanuel Macron urged his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping to lift the duties.

item.title: STMicro partners with Hua Hong as chipmakers need China, says CEO
item.content:encoded:
关键词：STMicroelectronics, 中国, Hua Hong, 局地生产, 竞争力 总结: 欧洲计算机芯片制造商STMicroelectronics的首席执行官周三宣布，该公司计划与中国的华虹半导体建立新的合作关系。他认为在中国当地设立制造基地对其保持竞争优势至关重要。此举将使STMicroelectronics得以加强其在中国市场的地位，并通过本地化生产提升其在全球半导体行业的竞争力。

The chief executive of European computer chipmaker STMicroelectronics on Wednesday announced new plans to partner with Chinese foundry Hua Hong , arguing that having local manufacturing in China is vital to its competitive position.

item.title: China-based biotech Laekna teams up with Lilly to develop muscle preserving obesity drug
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Eli Lilly, Laekna, 实验性肥胖药, 体重减轻, 肌肉保护
总结: 美国制药公司Eli Lilly与香港上市的Laekna宣布合作，共同开发一种实验性的肥胖药物。该药物旨在帮助患者在减轻体重的同时，能够保持肌肉质量。这项生物技术合作将针对肥胖治疗领域，寻求创新解决方案以实现健康减重并兼顾肌肉保护的效果。 <div> Eli Lilly and Hong Kong-listed Laekna will collaborate to develop an experimental obesity drug that aims to help patients lose weight while preserving muscle, the biotech said on Wednesday.

item.title: IAEA's Grossi hopes Iran's capping of highly enriched uranium stock holds
item.content:encoded:
关键词：联合国核监督机构、拉斐尔·格罗西、伊朗、铀库存、武器级、西方起草决议 总结：
联合国核监督机构负责人拉斐尔·格罗西表示，他希望伊朗限制其接近武器级的铀库存的举措能够得到维持。然而，该机构的董事会准备通过一项由西方起草的决议，这可能导致伊朗方面的措施受阻。
U.N. nuclear watchdog chief Rafael Grossi said on Wednesday he hopes Iran's move towards capping its stock of uranium just short of weapons grade will hold, as his agency's board was set to pass a Western-drafted resolution that could derail that.

item.title: Ford to cut European jobs as EV shift, Chinese rivals take toll
item.content:encoded:
关键词：福特、欧洲 workforce、裁员、电动车辆需求、政府支持、中国竞争对手、竞争压力、亏损 总结:
福特汽车公司宣布计划削减其在欧洲约14%的员工，原因在于近年来由于电动汽车需求疲软、政府对电动车转型的支持不足以及受到获得补贴的中国竞争对手的强大竞争压力，导致公司出现亏损。
Ford said it would cut around 14% of its European workforce on Wednesday, blaming losses in recent years due to weak electric vehicle demand, poor government support for the EV shift and competition from subsidized Chinese rivals.

item.title: Brokerages see 'uncertain' 2025 on worries over potential Trump tariffs
item.content:encoded:
关键词：全球经济、美国政策不确定性、特朗普、关税、中央银行货币政策 总结:
由于主要经纪商认为，美国总统当选人唐纳德·特朗普提出的关税可能导致全球市场波动加剧，并引发通胀压力，这将限制各大中央银行放宽货币政策的空间。因此，到2025年，美国政策的不确定性可能会适度放缓全球经济的增长。
Uncertainties around U.S. policies may slow global economic growth modestly in 2025, according to major brokerages. They expect U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's proposed tariffs to fuel volatility across global markets, spurring inflationary pressures and, in turn, limiting the scope for major central banks to ease monetary policy.

item.title: China's Pony AI seeks up to $4.55 bln valuation in upsized US IPO
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Pony AI、估值、$4.55亿美元、美国首次公开募股、纽约上市 总结:
中国自动驾驶公司Pony AI计划在美国的首次公开募股中寻求高达45.5亿美元的估值。该公司周三表示，其扩大规模后的IPO受到了强劲的需求，这标志着这家长期致力于纽约上市的机器人出租车公司的重大进展。
Pony AI is targeting a valuation of up to $4.55 billion in its upsized U.S. initial public offering, it said on Wednesday, indicating strong demand for the Chinese robotaxi firm's long-sought New York listing.

item.title: Putin's spy chief warns West against direct military conflict with Russia
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：普京、间谍首脑、西方、美国、欧洲、军事冲突、乌克兰
总结: 俄罗斯总统普京的间谍首脑周三警告西方国家，如果美国及其欧洲盟友因乌克兰问题而挑起与俄罗斯的直接军事对抗，将面临灾难性后果。 <div> President Vladimir Putin's spy chief warned the West on Wednesday that it risked disastrous consequences if the United States and its European allies stoke a direct military confrontation with Russia over Ukraine.

item.title: China returns to Pacific with aid and influence push, report shows
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、第二大双边捐助国、太平洋岛屿、美国、影响力争夺 总结:
中国已成为对太平洋岛屿地区第二大双边援助捐赠国，超越了美国。根据洛伊研究所关于该地区援助的报告，中国正通过有针对性的资金投入来争取地区影响力。
China has regained its place as the second-biggest bilateral donor to the Pacific Islands, displacing the United States and targeting its spending to win influence, a Lowy Institute report on aid to the region found.

item.title: Danish military says it's staying close to Chinese ship after data cable breaches
item.content:encoded:
关键词：丹麦军事、中国船、丹麦水域、光纤数据通信电缆、波罗的海 总结:
丹麦军方周三表示，他们正在密切关注一艘停泊在其海域内的中国船只。此前几天，波罗的海内的两条光纤数据通信电缆被切断。目前这艘中国船只处于闲置状态，丹麦军方对此保持警觉。
The Danish military said on Wednesday that it was staying close to a Chinese ship currently sitting idle in Danish waters, days after two fibre-optic data telecommunication cables in the Baltic Sea were severed.

item.title: Morning Bid: Nvidia vigil sees risk overcome safety
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Mike Dolan、经济动态、市场走势 总结: Mike Dolan展望了美国及全球市场的未来一天动态。他将关注美国市场的最新发展以及全球经济形势对金融市场的影响，同时分析全球市场的主要趋势和关键板块的表现。

请注意，以上内容是对原文章主题的概括，具体内容需参考Mike Dolan的原文报告。
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: Asia's jet fuel imports from India to hit multi-year highs in November
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲、印度、喷气燃料进口、冬季需求、炼油厂中断、中国出口下降、船运数据

总结: 由于炼油厂中断和中国出口减少导致供应紧张，亚洲从印度进口的喷气燃料预计将在11月达到多年来的高点，这一情况发生在冬季需求高峰前夕。根据行业消息人士和船运数据显示，亚洲市场正在寻求替代货源以满足即将到来的需求增长。
Asia's imports of jet fuel from India are set to hit multi-year highs in November ahead of peak winter demand after refinery outages and lower exports from China crimped supplies, according to industry sources and shiptracking data.

item.title: Exclusive: Sinochem may keep bankrupt refineries as auctions draw scant interest, sources say
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Sinochem Group、破产油 refinery、东部中国、拍卖、少有企业兴趣
总结: 据知情人士透露，由于拍卖会上其他公司对位于中国东部的三座破产油炼厂的兴趣寥寥，中化集团可能会继续保留这些炼厂。 <div> Sinochem Group may keep three bankrupt oil refineries located in eastern China after auctions to sell them drew little interest from other companies, sources familiar with the matter said.

item.title: India studying temporary tax request on China steel imports, says JSW Group chairman
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度政府、临时税、中国钢铁进口、JSW集团主席、水泥业务IPO

总结: JSW集团主席周三表示，印度政府正在研究对中国钢铁进口征收临时税的请求。此外，他透露JSW集团的水泥业务有望在本月底前获得首次公开募股(IPO)的监管批准。
The Indian government is studying the request for imposing a temporary tax on China steel imports, the JSW Group chairman said on Wednesday, adding that it could get regulatory approval for the initial public offering of its cement business by January end.

item.title: India's JSW Group chairman says govt studying request for temporary tax on China steel dumping
item.content:encoded:
关键词：JSW集团、印度、钢铁、财政、中国钢倾销临时税、Sajjan Jindal、行业活动
总结： JSW集团董事长Sajjan Jindal在一场行业活动的间隙表示，印度的钢铁和财政部正在研究对中国钢材倾销实施临时税收的请求。
JSW Group said India's steel and finance ministries are studying request for temporary tax on China steel dumping, chairman Sajjan Jindal said on the sidelines of an industry event.

item.title: Chinese EV maker Xpeng to break even later in 2025, president says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Xpeng、电动汽车、2025年、盈利、新产品、海外扩张
总结: 中国电动汽车制造商Xpeng的总裁Brian Gu表示，预计该公司将在2025年晚些时候实现盈亏平衡。这一预期基于对其新款车型的强劲需求以及持续稳步推进海外扩张带来的盈利能力提升的信心。 <div> Chinese electric car maker Xpeng is expected to break even sometime later in 2025, its President Brian Gu said, betting on strong demand for its new models and a steady overseas expansion to improve its profitability.

item.title: China's cashed-up crowd is back in the stock market
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国股票、投机热、全球基金、关税避风港、经济复苏
总结: 随着中国股市的投机狂潮日益升温，一些全球基金开始关注并考虑跟随当地资金进入那些能够避开关税影响且有望伴随经济复苏而上涨的市场板块。这些投资动向显示出对中国市场未来潜力的信心以及对中国经济复苏预期的看好。 <div> Speculative fever in Chinese stocks is running red hot and catching the attention of some global funds, who figure local money is worth following into market segments sheltered from tariffs and likely to ride an eventual economic recovery.

item.title: Nokia wins 'multi-billion' dollar deal in India
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Nokia、Bharti Airtel、印度、4G、5G
总结: 芬兰电信设备供应商Nokia宣布已与印度的Bharti Airtel达成一项价值数亿美元的协议，将为后者提供4G和5G网络设备。 <div> Finnish telecom equipment supplier Nokia on Wednesday said it had won a "multi-billion" dollar deal with India's Bharti Airtel for delivery of 4G and 5G equipment.

item.title: Explainer: National security trial of Hong Kong media tycoon Jimmy Lai: what's happened so far
item.content:encoded: Hong Kong media tycoon and pro-democracy advocate Jimmy Lai, 76, testified in court for the first time on Wednesday in his landmark national security trial, accused of endangering China's national security by colluding with foreign forces.

item.title: U.S. State Department's Campbell hopes Trump works with Pacific allies
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Kurt Campbell、特朗普政府、澳大利亚、新西兰、中国、战略竞争、太平洋、不撤退
总结: 美国副国务卿库尔特·坎贝尔表示，他希望即将上任的特朗普政府能在亚太地区与盟友澳大利亚和新西兰合作，鉴于当前与中国的“尖锐战略竞争”，而不是从该地区撤退。
U.S. Deputy Secretary of State Kurt Campbell said he hoped the incoming Trump administration would work with allies Australia and New Zealand in the Pacific, amid "acute strategic competition" with China and not withdraw from the region.

item.title: Pakistan's military to launch new offensive against separatist militants
item.content:encoded:
关键词：巴基斯坦、军事进攻、分离主义叛军、西南部、俾路支省、中国一带一路项目、联合行动、邻国

总结： 巴基斯坦宣布计划对其西南部俾路支省的分离主义叛军发起新的军事攻势。该地区包含一些重要的中国一带一路项目。目前尚不清楚这次行动计划是否会与邻国中国进行联合行动。
Pakistan plans a new military offensive against separatist insurgents in southwestern Balochistan province, home to key Chinese Belt and Road projects, but it was not immediately clear if the plan would be a joint effort with its giant neighbour.

item.title: Lima hails UAE's demolition of Qatar as best performance of 2026 qualifiers
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Fabio Lima、United Arab Emirates、Qatar、5-0、World Cup qualifying 总结：
前锋法比奥·利马表示，阿联酋在周二以5-0大胜卡塔尔的比赛是其球队在亚洲世界杯预选赛第三阶段的最出色表现。
Four-goal striker Fabio Lima said the United Arab Emirates' 5-0 thrashing of Qatar on Tuesday was his team's finest performance in the third phase of Asia's World Cup qualifying.

item.title: Morning Bid: British inflation set to dominate before Nvidia
item.content:encoded:
关键词：欧洲市场、全球市场、经济数据、企业财报、风险情绪 总结：
今日将重点关注欧洲及全球市场的表现。市场参与者将消化一系列关键经济数据的影响，包括制造业和服务业PMI等，这些数据可能对市场走势产生重要指引。此外，企业财报季仍在进行中，多家大型公司发布的业绩报告也将左右相关股市表现。同时，投资者将持续关注全球范围内的风险情绪变化，如地缘政治紧张局势以及央行政策动态等因素。
A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu

item.title: China's Xi visits Brasilia to cap tour flexing diplomatic clout
item.content:encoded:
关键词：北京、南美洲、外交攻势、影响力增长、美国总统过渡 总结:
北京近期对南美洲展开了一系列密集的外交活动，彰显了其在该地区日益增长的影响力。在这段期间，中国填补了因美国总统过渡而留下的空白，在南美展现了自己的存在与实力。
His visit caps a diplomatic blitz across South America that has shown Beijing's growing clout in the region where it filled a gap left by the U.S. presidential transition.

item.title: Victory over Saudi Arabia gives Indonesia World Cup belief, says coach Shin
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印尼、教练、申台龙、沙特阿拉伯、2026年世界杯 总结:
印尼教练申台龙表示，球队在周二于雅加达以2-0爆冷击败前亚洲冠军沙特阿拉伯，这让他们看到了晋级2026年世界杯的真实机会。
Indonesia coach Shin Tae-yong believes his team's shock 2-0 win over former Asian champions Saudi Arabia in Jakarta on Tuesday gives them a real chance of reaching the 2026 World Cup.

item.title: China funds cut ETF fees, escalating price war in booming market
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国基金公司、费用降低、权益类ETF、市场竞争、4000亿美元市场

总结: 中国几家主要基金公司周三宣布，将下调一批权益类ETF产品的管理费和交易费用，此举加剧了该市场上4000亿美元规模领域的价格竞争。这表明基金行业正通过降低费率来吸引投资者并争夺市场份额。
Major Chinese fund companies announced a reduction in fees for a batch of equity exchange-traded funds (ETFs) on Wednesday, intensifying price competition in the rapidly expanding $400 billion sector of the market.

item.title: HK pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai testifies for first time in landmark trial
item.content:encoded: Hong Kong democrat Jimmy Lai testified on Wednesday for the first time in his landmark national security trial, saying he had never tried to influence the foreign policy of other countries, such as the U.S., towards China and Hong Kong.

item.title: Misfiring forwards leave Australia stuck on a tightrope to World Cup
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：澳大利亚、巴林、世界杯预选赛、Kusini Yengi、绝杀进球
总结: 在周二的世界杯预选赛中，Kusini Yengi 的补时阶段进球帮助澳大利亚避免了被巴林击败的命运。然而，尽管澳大利亚成功扳平比分，但该队仍错失了一次在通往2026年世界杯之路上超越亚洲对手的大好机会，这让他们感到痛惜。 <div> Kusini Yengi's stoppage-time goal saved Australia from a calamitous defeat by Bahrain in World Cup qualifying on Tuesday but the Socceroos will be smarting over another blown chance to steal a march on Asian rivals on the road to 2026.

item.title: Oil little changed as market weighs mixed drivers
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 油价, 稳定, 乌克兰战争, 俄罗斯石油供应, 中国原油进口, 美国原油库存上升 总结:
油价在周三连续第二天保持大致稳定，因为市场担忧乌克兰战争升级可能造成俄罗斯石油供应中断，以及中国原油进口增长迹象的影响，这些因素抵消了美国原油库存上升的数据带来的影响。
Oil was broadly stable for a second day on Wednesday as concerns about escalating hostilities in the Ukraine war potentially disrupting oil supply from Russia and signs of growing Chinese crude imports offset data showing U.S. crude stocks rising.

item.title: Asian shares subdued ahead of Nvidia results, dollar steadies near 1-week low
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 亚洲股市、谨慎交易、投资者、Nvidia、人工智能、盈利结果、风险、美元、连跌三日、企稳。
总结: 亚洲股市周三谨慎交易，投资者密切关注人工智能领域重要企业Nvidia的财报发布，由于存在较大失望风险，市场情绪趋于保守。另一方面，美元在连续三个交易日下跌后企稳。 <div> Asian shares were trading cautiously on Wednesday as investors looked ahead to earnings results from artificial intelligence darling Nvidia where the risk of disappointment is high, while the dollar steadied after three straight sessions of declines.

item.title: China leaves lending benchmark LPRs unchanged, as expected
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、基准贷款利率、不变、每月调整、经济活动 总结:
中国在周三的月度调整中保持了基准贷款利率不变，此前为了提振经济活动，银行在上个月超预期地降低了利率。
China left benchmark lending rates unchanged at the monthly fixing on Wednesday, after lenders slashed the rates by higher-than-expected margins last month to revive economic activity.

item.title: China has key role to play in avoiding nuclear escalation, France's Macron says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：法国总统马克龙、中国、避免核升级、俄罗斯总统普京、核打击门槛降低 总结:
法国总统马克龙表示，中国在全球避免核升级问题上扮演着重要角色。此言背景是俄罗斯总统普京降低了使用核武器的门槛。他认为，在当前形势下，中国的参与和作用对于维护全球战略稳定至关重要。
French President Emmanuel Macron said on Tuesday that China has an important role to play in avoiding nuclear escalation, after Russian President Vladimir Putin lowered the threshold for a nuclear strike.

item.title: Morning Bid: US-Russia fright fades, Nvidia vigil almost over
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、走势前瞻、经济数据、企业财报、风险情绪 总结:
随着全球市场的联动，亚洲市场在未来一天的交易中将备受关注。投资者将密切关注即将公布的重要经济数据，这些数据可能对市场走势产生显著影响。同时，区域内企业的季度财报也将成为左右股市表现的关键因素。此外，全球风险情绪的变化，包括贸易关系动态和货币政策预期等，也将为亚洲各金融市场带来不确定性。总体而言，亚洲市场的未来走势将在很大程度上取决于上述多重因素的综合影响。
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: Lula cuts G20 discussion short on Ukraine, irking Europeans
item.content:encoded:
关键词：欧洲代表、G20峰会、巴西、卢拉、乌克兰战争 总结:
在巴西举行的G20峰会上，欧洲代表对总统卢拉·伊纳乔·卢拉·达席尔瓦决定提前结束会谈并提早一天发布集团最终声明表示不满。此举旨在避免就乌克兰战争问题进行尖锐讨论。
European delegates at the G20 summit in Brazil were unhappy with President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's decision to end talks and issue the group's final statement a day early to curtail prickly discussion on the war in Ukraine, sources said.

item.title: Senator says Trump cannot ignore law requiring ByteDance to divest TikTok by next year
item.content:encoded:
关键词：特朗普、法律、中国ByteDance、TikTok、美国禁令 总结:
美国总统当选人特朗普不能忽视一项法律规定，要求总部位于中国的ByteDance公司在明年年初之前剥离其在美国流行的短视频应用TikTok，否则将面临被禁止在美国运营的处罚。这一观点出自美国参议院某民主党委员会主席周二的表态。
President-elect Donald Trump cannot ignore a law requiring Chinese-based ByteDance to divest its popular short video app TikTok in the U.S. by early next year or face a ban, the Democratic chair of a U.S. Senate panel said on Tuesday.

item.title: Scholz: G20 not clear enough on Russian, Middle East conflicts
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 德国总理朔尔茨、G20联合声明、俄罗斯、乌克兰战争、第1000天 总结:
德国总理朔尔茨周二表示，他对G20联合声明未明确指出俄罗斯对乌克兰战争的责任，特别是在该全面入侵行动的第1000天这一时间节点上，感到遗憾。
German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Tuesday he regretted the fact the G20 communique did not underscore Russia's responsibility for the Ukraine war, particularly on the 1,000th day of its full-scale invasion.

item.title: Walmart, other US companies raise concerns over proposed Trump tariffs
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Corporate executives, wait-and-see, President-elect Donald Trump, tariffs, imports, inflation 总结:
企业高管们对候任总统唐纳德·特朗普打算在就职后对进口商品征收重税的誓言持观望态度。他们担心这样的关税举措将对通货膨胀产生不利影响。虽然许多高管保持谨慎，但普遍关注的是，一旦实施重税，可能会推高国内通胀水平，对企业运营和整体经济带来不确定性。
Corporate executives were taking a wait-and-see approach to President-elect Donald Trump's vow to impose heavy tariffs on imports when he takes office in January, but many have raised concerns about the effect such levies will have on inflation.

item.title: Iran offers to cap sensitive uranium stock as IAEA resolution looms
item.content:encoded:
关键词：伊朗、西方国家、联合国核监督机构、决议、铀储量上限 总结:
伊朗试图阻止西方国家在联合国核监督机构董事会会议上推动针对其的决议，方法是承诺将铀库存限制在接近武器级水平以下，但这一努力未能成功。外交官和监督机构周二表示，伊朗的提议并未能阻止西方推动相关决议。
Iran has tried in vain to prevent a Western push for a resolution against it at the U.N. nuclear watchdog's board meeting by offering to cap its stock of uranium just shy of weapons grade, the watchdog and diplomats said on Tuesday.

item.title: Hilton plans to expand footprint in India amid boom in leisure travel demand
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Hilton Worldwide、印度、酒店房间、五年、增长四倍 总结:
希尔顿全球计划在未来五年内将其在印度的酒店房间数量增加三倍，以缩小与竞争对手之间的差距，同时抓住国内旅游市场蓬勃发展的机遇。公司亚太区负责人表示，这一举措表明希尔顿全球对于印度市场的强劲信心和深度布局。
Hilton Worldwide expects to quadruple the number of hotel rooms in its India pipeline in the next five years, the company's APAC chief said, as the hotel operator seeks to close the gap with rivals amid a booming domestic travel market.

item.title: Ogawa double moves Japan to cusp of World Cup qualification as rivals falter
item.content:encoded:
关键词：日本、2026世界杯资格赛、中国、3-1胜利、澳大利亚、2-2平局、小组C、亚洲预选赛第三轮、九分领先 总结:
在日本队于周二以3-1战胜东道主中国队的同时，澳大利亚队与巴林队战成2-2平局，使得由 Hajime Moriyasu 执教的日本队在亚洲预选赛第三轮小组赛C组中取得了九分的领先优势，从而接近了获得2026年世界杯资格赛的席位。
Japan moved to the cusp of qualifying for the 2026 World Cup on Tuesday as a 3-1 win over hosts China coupled with Australia's 2-2 draw in Bahrain took Hajime Moriyasu's side nine points clear in Group C of the third round of Asia's preliminaries.

item.title: Xi asks Germany's Scholz to help resolve issue of EU tariffs on Chinese EVs
item.content:encoded:
关税 电动汽车 德国 欧盟 习近平

总结: 中国国家主席习近平于周二与德国总理奥拉夫·朔尔茨会面，表达了希望德国能协助欧盟和中国尽快解决针对中国电动汽车的关税问题。此次会谈强调了通过国际合作解决贸易壁垒的重要性。
Chinese President Xi Jinping told German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Tuesday he hoped Germany could help the EU and China to resolve the issue of tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles as soon as possible, state television CCTV reported.

item.title: Healthcare executives expect more IPOs and corporate dealmaking in 2025
item.content:encoded:
关键词：healthcare executives, investors, initial public offerings, corporate dealmaking, geopolitical tensions

总结: 根据Jefferies的年度医疗保健报告，医疗行业的高管和投资者预测在2025年将出现初始公开募股（IPOs）和企业并购活动的增加。与此同时，地缘政治紧张局势将超越融资挑战，成为该行业面临的最大风险因素。
Healthcare executives and investors expect an uptick in initial public offerings and corporate dealmaking in 2025, with geopolitical tensions overtaking funding challenges as the biggest risk to the sector, Jefferies' annual healthcare report showed on Tuesday.

item.title: China's Xi meets Argentina's Milei for the first time in Rio
item.content:encoded:
关键词：习近平、阿根廷总统、马克里、G20峰会、Rio de Janeiro、中国国家电视台CCTV 总结:
中国国家主席习近平在巴西里约热内卢举行的二十国集团（G20）峰会期间，与阿根廷总统马克里举行了会晤。这一消息由中国国家电视台CCTV报道。
China's President Xi Jinping met with Argentine President Javier Milei on the sidelines of the Group of 20 summit in Rio de Janeiro on Tuesday, Chinese state television CCTV reported.

item.title: Germany's Scholz to Xi: no one must fear their neighbour
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：德国总理朔尔茨、俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰、中国国家主席习近平、经济大国、讨论敏感议题
总结: 德国总理朔尔茨与中国经济大国地位的中国国家主席习近平周二就俄罗斯对乌克兰的全面入侵进行了交谈，表示双方讨论敏感议题十分重要。 <div> German Chancellor Olaf Scholz discussed Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine with China's President Xi Jinping on Tuesday, saying it was important that the two economic powers discuss difficult topics.

item.title: Spectator runs onto field during China-Japan World Cup qualifier
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、日本、世界杯预选赛、球迷、爱国标语 总结:
在周二举行的一场位于中国东部城市厦门的中日世界杯预选赛足球比赛中，一名身穿印有爱国标语中文的T恤并身绘标语的观众冲入球场，短暂地扰乱了比赛秩序。
A spectator with patriotic slogans written in Chinese on his t-shirt and body ran onto the field and briefly disrupted the China-Japan soccer World Cup qualifier in China's eastern city Xiamen on Tuesday.

item.title: Mass casualty attacks in China put focus on mental health as economy slows
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中国、大规模杀戮、车祸、小学、经济压力、心理健康问题
总结: 近一周内，中国连续发生了两起高调的大规模杀戮事件以及一起发生在小学的汽车撞人事故，引发了关于中国应对经济放缓带来的压力及相关心理健康问题的能力的质疑。这些问题凸显了中国在处理社会心理问题和公共安全方面所面临的挑战。
Two high-profile mass killings and a car crash at a primary school in just over a week are raising questions about how well-equipped China is to deal with the stresses of a slowing economy and related mental health issues.

item.title: Hennessy plan to trial bottling cognac in China to avoid tariffs prompts strike
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Hennessy、LVMH、中国、瓶装、罢工
总结: 法国奢侈品巨头LVMH旗下的轩尼诗公司计划在中国进行干邑白兰地的灌装工作，这一消息引发其位于法国西南部工厂的数百名工人罢工。 <div> Hennessy is studying a plan to bottle cognac in China, the company owned by French luxury giant LVMH said on Tuesday, prompting hundreds of workers at its plant in southwestern France to go on strike.

item.title: XPeng forecasts upbeat fourth quarter revenue as new launches improve demand
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：XPeng、第四季度、营收预测、华尔街估计、电动车辆
总结: 中国汽车制造商XPeng周二预计，其第四季度营收将超过华尔街分析师的预期，这得益于公司产品线的更新以及国内市场需求的提升。随着新产品的推出和国内市场状况的好转，XPeng看到了更高的需求潜力。 <div> Chinese electric vehicle maker XPeng forecast fourth quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as a refreshed product line-up and improving domestic market help the company see higher demand.

item.title: U.S.-Philippines alliance will transcend administrations, Austin says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国国防部长奥斯汀、菲律宾、同盟关系、政权更迭、东南亚国家 总结:
美国国防部长奥斯汀周二表示，美菲同盟关系将超越政权更迭的影响，他重申了对东南亚国家菲律宾的支持。
United States Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said on Tuesday the U.S. alliance with the Philippines would transcend changes in administrations, as he reiterated his support for the Southeast Asian nation.

item.title: New Zealand prepares to tighten espionage laws to stop foreign interference
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：新西兰、立法、间谍法、新罪名、初步通过
总结: 新西兰于周二通过了一项旨在强化现有间谍法并引入新罪名的立法初步审议。这项法律将对现有的反间谍法规进行加强，并新增一系列犯罪行为，以更好地应对国家安全面临的挑战。 <div> Legislation that strengthens existing espionage laws and introduces new offences passed a first legislative hurdle in New Zealand on Tuesday.

item.title: Iran, Israel among rivals to showcase their arms at Vietnam defence expo
item.content:encoded:
关键词：伊朗、以色列、中国、俄罗斯、美国、越南、国防部、武器展览会、 Hanoi、 December

总结: 越南国防部宣布，来自伊朗、以色列、中国、俄罗斯和美国的公司将在12月于河内的一个武器博览会上展示军事装备。这是一个罕见的情况，表明地缘政治竞争对手将共同在一个展会上展出他们的军备产品。
Companies from Iran, Israel, China, Russia and the United States will showcase military equipment at an arms expo in Hanoi in December, Vietnam's defence ministry said on Tuesday, a rare case of geopolitical rivals exhibiting their wares together.

item.title: EU to demand tech transfers from Chinese companies, FT reports
item.content:encoded:
关键词：欧洲联盟、中国公司、技术转移、欧盟补贴、金融时报 总结:
据《金融时报》报道，两位欧盟高级官员透露，欧盟计划要求中国公司在获得欧盟补贴的条件下，向欧洲企业转让技术。
The European Union is planning to compel Chinese companies to transfer technology to European businesses in return for EU subsidies, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing two senior EU officials.

item.title: G20 leaders turn focus to climate change on Rio summit's last day
item.content:encoded:
关键词：领导人、可持续发展、清洁能源、会议、讨论 总结:
各国领导人齐聚一堂，就推动可持续发展和加快向清洁能源转型展开深入讨论。会议上，各方强调了可持续发展对全球未来的重要性，并认识到清洁能源在应对气候变化、保护环境以及实现经济增长与社会进步间的平衡中起到的关键作用。各国领导人表示将共同努力，制定并实施相关政策，加速能源结构的绿色低碳转型，以确保地球生态环境的可持续性和人类社会的繁荣发展。
Leaders meet to discuss sustainable development and the transition to cleaner energy.

item.title: Russia, Chinese foreign ministers discuss ties, Ukraine, Korean Peninsula on G20 sidelines
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、俄罗斯、外长、乌克兰冲突、朝鲜半岛局势

总结: 中国和俄罗斯两国外交部长在巴西举行的二十国集团会议期间就双边关系、乌克兰冲突以及朝鲜半岛形势进行了讨论。双方外交部门于周二宣布了这一消息。
Chinese and Russian foreign ministers discussed bilateral ties, the conflict in Ukraine and the situation on the Korean Peninsula on the sidelines of the Group of 20 meeting in Brazil, the foreign ministries of both countries said on Tuesday.

item.title: 'Hong Kong 47': Reaction to jailings of democrats
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：重大打击、金融中心、法治精神、批评人士、规定
总结: 批评人士指出，这一事件被视为对这个金融中心法治精神的重大打击。他们认为这将对该地区长期以来基于法治原则运行的金融体系和国际声誉产生负面影响。 <div> Critics say it's a major blow to the financial hub’s rule of law.

item.title: China's foreign minister meets Indian counterpart, calls for resumption of direct flights
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国外长 王毅 印度外长 苏杰生 里约热内卢 直航恢复 总结：
中国外长王毅与印度外长苏杰生于周一在里约热内卢会面，中方外交部周二发表声明称。在会谈中，王毅呼吁恢复两国间的直飞航班。
China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi met his Indian counterpart Subrahmanyam Jaishankar on Monday in Rio de Janeiro, a statement from his ministry said on Tuesday, during which he called for the resumption of direct flights between the two countries.

item.title: Asian stocks rise, dollar weak as US yields tick down
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 亚洲股票、上涨、美国债券收益率、美元、特朗普内阁选择
总结: 亚洲股市周二上涨，而美国债券收益率和美元则从数月高点回落。交易员们正等待着当选总统特朗普的内阁人选公布，并试图评估美联储货币政策放松的可能性。在这种观望气氛下，市场表现受到未来政策预期的影响。 <div> Asian stocks rose on Tuesday while U.S. bond yields and the dollar hung back from multi-month highs as traders awaited President-elect Donald Trump's cabinet selection and sought to gauge the outlook for Federal Reserve easing.

item.title: Hong Kong court sentences pro-democracy activist Benny Tai to 10 years in prison
item.content:encoded: Hong Kong's High Court on Tuesday jailed a leading pro-democracy activist for 10 years at the start of sentencing in a years-long national security trial that has damaged the city's once feisty pro-democracy movement and drawn global criticism.

item.title: Students hurt in China school crash as nerves fray over recent attacks
item.content:encoded:
关键词：SUV、学生、行人、中国南部、暴力攻击

总结: 一辆SUV在中国南部一所小学外撞向了学生和行人，导致数人受伤。此事件引起人们对过去一周中国连续发生多起暴力袭击事件的关注。
A driver in an SUV ploughed into students and pedestrians outside a primary school in southern China on Tuesday, leaving several people injured, state media said, as worries spread over a spate of violent attacks in the country over the past week.

item.title: Alibaba delivers initial price guidance on $5 billion dual-currency bond, term sheet shows
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：阿里巴巴集团、投资者、初始价格指导、50亿美元、双币债券
总结: 阿里巴巴集团向投资者提供了其50亿美元双币债券发行的初步价格指引，这一消息来源于路透社周二审查的一份条款说明书。 <div> Alibaba Group has delivered investors initial price guidance on its $5 billion dual currency bond, according to a term sheet reviewed by Reuters on Tuesday.

item.title: Jailing of 45 Hong Kong democrats in landmark trial draws criticism
item.content:encoded:
关键词： Benny Tai、法律学者、组织者、10年监禁、2020年国家安全法 总结:
香港前法律学者Benny Tai被认定为“组织者”，因触犯2020年实施的国家安全法而被判处10年有期徒刑，这是迄今为止依据该法判决的最长刑期。
Benny Tai, a former legal scholar identified as an "organiser," was sentenced to 10 years in jail, the longest sentence so far under the 2020 national security law.

item.title: China courier group S.F. Holding to raise up to $792.7 mln in Hong Kong listing
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：S.F. Holding、香港上市、筹资、HK$6.17亿、美元792.71万
总结： 快递巨头顺丰控股周二宣布，计划在香港上市筹集最多达61.7亿港元（约合79271万美元）的资金。这一消息显示出香港资本市场正在呈现出复苏迹象。 <div> China's largest express delivery company S.F. Holding , said on Tuesday it plans to raise up to HK$6.17 billion ($792.71 million) in a Hong Kong listing, the latest sign of a revival in the city's capital markets.

item.title: UK's Starmer calls for 'consistent, durable' ties with China in Xi meeting
item.content:encoded:
关键词：英国首相 星mer 中国国家主席 习近平 建立 关系 G20峰会 解冻关系 总结:
英国首相基尔·斯特默在周一的G20峰会上呼吁中国国家主席习近平建立两国之间“稳定、持久”的关系，继续努力缓解伦敦与北京之间的紧张态势，寻求改善双边关系。
British Prime Minister Keir Starmer called on Chinese President Xi Jinping on Monday to establish "consistent, durable" relations between their two nations, pressing on with efforts to thaw ties between London and Beijing at a G20 summit.

item.title: Suriname signs debt rescheduling with China, finance minister says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Suriname、中国、债务重组、财政部长Stanley Raghoebarsing、国家 assembly

总结: 财政部长Stanley Raghoebarsing向国家议会宣布，苏里南已与中方达成债务重新安排协议。据南美国家债务管理办公室负责人表示，今年将开始向债权人进行首批偿还款项。
Suriname signed a debt rescheduling with China, Finance Minister Stanley Raghoebarsing told the National Assembly on Monday, with the head of the South American country's debt management office saying first repayments to creditors will come this year.

item.title: US Senate panel to hold hearing on Chinese hacking incidents
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国参议院司法委员会、技术问题、中国黑客事件、美国电信公司、听证会
总结: 美国参议院司法委员会下属负责技术问题的小组委员会将于周二举行一场关于中国黑客事件的听证会，其中包括近期涉及美国电信公司的事件。这场听证会将聚焦中国黑客对美国企业构成的安全威胁以及可能采取的应对措施。 <div> A U.S. Senate Judiciary subcommittee overseeing technology issues will hold a hearing Tuesday on Chinese hacking incidents, including a recent incident involving American telecom companies.

item.title: Morning Bid: Seeking global steer, watching Fed pendulum swings
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市表现、中国经济数据、日韩央行会议、美国就业报告 总结: 在即将来临的一天中，亚洲市场的关注焦点预计包括各地股市的表现，特别是中国经济数据的发布，可能会对区域市场产生影响。此外，日本和韩国央行的货币政策会议也将吸引投资者的目光，任何有关利率调整或经济展望的信号都可能引发市场波动。同时，前一天公布的美国就业报告也会持续为全球市场情绪提供指引。

A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: China's Xi tells G20 Summit AI should not be a 'game of rich countries,' Xinhua reports
item.content:encoded: Chinese President Xi Jinping warned at the Group of 20 Summit in Rio de Janeiro that artificial intelligence should not be a "game of rich countries and the wealthy," state news agency Xinhua reported on Monday.

item.title: US SEC charges Bit Mining with violating Foreign Corrupt Practices Act
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Securities and Exchange Commission、Bit Mining、违反、Foreign Corrupt Practices Act、贿赂案

总结: 美国证券交易委员会(SEC)周一表示，它已指控比特矿业(Bit Mining)涉及一起违反《外国腐败行为法》的贿赂案，该案件与企图影响日本议会成员有关。
The Securities and Exchange Commission has charged Bit Mining with violating the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act in connection with bribery scheme to influence members of Japanese Parliament, it said on Monday.

item.title: Germany's Scholz to address drones for Russia with China's Xi
item.content:encoded: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Monday he would discuss the delivery of dual-use goods with Chinese President Xi Jinping at the G20 summit, following a report that a Chinese factory is producing military drones for Russia.

item.title: Women's F1 Academy to hold Las Vegas finale in 2025
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Las Vegas, F1 Academy系列, 性别, 年度决赛, 三个大陆
总结: 明年全女性F1学院系列赛的总决赛将在拉斯维加斯举行。赛事组织者周一宣布，该系列赛将在三大洲举办多场比赛后，最终在拉斯维加斯迎来落幕之战。 <div> Las Vegas will host the finale of next year's all-female F1 Academy series after races on three continents, organisers announced on Monday.

item.title: China's Xi announces steps to support 'Global South' at G20 summit
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：习近平、中国、全球南翼、G20峰会、措施
总结: 中国国家主席习近平在CCTV报道中宣布，于巴西里约热内卢召开的二十国集团（G20）主要经济体领导人峰会上，提出了一系列旨在支持“全球南翼”的政策措施。 <div> Chinese President Xi Jinping announced a raft of measures designed to support the "Global South" at a gathering of leaders of the Group of 20 (G20) major economies in Rio de Janeiro, China's state television CCTV reported on Monday.

item.title: South Korea 'strongly confident' US alliance will thrive under Trump
item.content:encoded:
关键词：韩国外长 朴振 信心 美韩联盟 特朗普新政府 总结:
韩国外长朴振周一表示，他对美韩联盟在即将就任的特朗普总统领导下将继续繁荣发展持有“强烈的信心”。
South Korean Foreign Minister Cho Tae-yul said on Monday he is "strongly confident" the South Korea-U.S. alliance will continue to thrive under the incoming U.S. administration of President-elect Donald Trump.

item.title: Summit host Azerbaijan warns COP29 cannot succeed without G20 boost
item.content:encoded:
关键词：领导人、全球变暖、COP29气候峰会、阿塞拜疆、明确信号 总结:
阿塞拜疆作为即将举办的COP29气候峰会的东道国表示，世界最大经济体的领导人们必须发出关于应对全球变暖问题的明确信号。
Leaders of the world's biggest economies must send a clear signal on the need to tackle global warming, COP29 climate summit host Azerbaijan said on Monday.

item.title: China's relationship with Australia has achieved a turnaround, Xi tells Albanese
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、澳大利亚、关系转圜、积极发展势头、习近平、安东尼·阿尔巴内塞
总结: 中国国家主席习近平向澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞表示，中澳两国关系已实现转圜，并保持着积极的发展势头。据中国官方新华社报道，这一消息表明双方正在朝着正面的方向推进双边关系的发展。 <div> China's relationship with Australia has achieved a turnaround and the two countries are maintaining a positive momentum of development, Chinese President Xi Jinping told Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese on Monday, according to China's official Xinhua News Agency.

item.title: China and Britain enjoy vast space for cooperation, Xi tells Starmer
item.content:encoded:
关键词：习近平、英国首相、 Keir Starmer、合作空间、Xinhua News Agency 总结:
中国国家主席习近平向英国首相Keir Starmer表示，两国之间存在着广阔的合作空间。这一消息由官方媒体新华社报道。
Chinese President Xi Jinping told British Prime Minister Keir Starmer Monday that the two countries enjoy a vast space for cooperation, the official Xinhua News Agency reported.

item.title: Morning Bid: Bruised Wall Street keeps wary eye on Nvidia
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Mike Dolan、经济动态、市场趋势 总结:
Mike Dolan分析了即将来临的一天中，美国及全球市场的走势。他关注的重点可能包括当天的经济动态，如股市指数变化、国际贸易局势、货币政策影响以及重要公司财报等关键因素对市场趋势的影响。
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: Can a COP29 deal clean up scandal-ridden carbon offsets?
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 市场、赢回、警惕国家、社区、信任 总结: 市场需要首先赢得那些持谨慎态度的国家和社区的信任。这要求市场展示出可信赖的行为，解决这些国家和社区所关注的问题，建立起坚实的合作基础和正面形象，从而重新获得他们的支持与参与。

The market will first need to win over wary countries and communities.

item.title: Xiaomi CEO: SU7 deliveries surpass 100,000, aiming for 130,000 by year end
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Xiaomi, CEO, Lei Jun, EV旗舰车型SU7, 超过100,000辆交付
总结: 小米CEO雷军于周一日表示，公司旗下旗舰电动汽车系列SU7的交付量已超过100,000台。 <div> Xiaomi CEO Lei Jun said on Monday that deliveries of its flagship electric vehicle series SU7 has surpassed 100,000 units.

item.title: Chinese trade with Russia 'directly affecting' EU security, Dutch minister says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：荷兰、外交部、出口限制、ASML、中国-俄罗斯贸易、欧洲安全 总结:
荷兰外交部长表示，其负责监督顶级计算机芯片设备制造商ASML出口限制的外交部认为，中国与俄罗斯之间的贸易正在“直接影响”欧洲的安全。
The Netherlands' foreign minister, whose ministry oversees export restrictions on top computer chip equipment maker ASML , said on Monday that China-Russia trade was "directly affecting" European security.

item.title: German foreign minister: U.S. decision on Ukraine military support is 'important'
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、军事支持、乌克兰、德国、外交部长、Annalena Baerbock、战略 总结:
德国 Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock 表示，美国已对向乌克兰提供军事支持做出了重要决定。她强调，此举并不意味着西方阵营的战略转变。
The United States has taken an important decision in terms of its military support for Ukraine, German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock said on Monday, while stressing that this was not a shift in strategy by the West.

item.title: After long legal battle, Hong Kong's 47 democrats brace for sentencing
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、审判、有罪判决、政治动机、要求释放 总结：
美国认为这次审判及其有罪判决带有政治动机，并已要求释放被告。
The U.S. has described the trial and its guilty verdicts as "politically motivated," and has demanded that the defendants be released.

item.title: Morning Bid: EM conditions tighten, outflows heighten
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、开盘、股市动向、经济数据、风险情绪 总结: 随着新的一天开始，亚洲市场的开盘表现将备受关注。投资者将密切关注各地股市动向，特别是对于前一天全球市场走势的反应。此外，重要的经济数据发布也可能对市场产生显著影响，包括各国制造业和服务业PMI、贸易数据等。同时，全球风险情绪的变化，如美元指数、大宗商品价格以及地缘政治动态等也将左右亚洲市场的走势。

A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: Around 1,500 killed in Bangladesh protests that ousted PM Hasina
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Bangladesh、Sheikh Hasina、protests、abducted、Muhammad Yunus
总结: 孟加拉国今年发生针对总理谢赫·哈西娜的抗议活动，约有1500人死亡。此外，临时领导人穆罕默德·尤努斯表示，在哈西娜长达15年的统治期间，可能有多达3500人被强制失踪。 <div> About 1,500 people died in protests that brought down Bangladeshi prime minister Sheikh Hasina this year, and as many as 3,500 may have been forcibly abducted during her 15-year rule, interim leader Muhammad Yunus said on Sunday.

item.title: Tata seals deal with Pegatron for iPhone plant in India's Tamil Nadu, sources say
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Tata Electronics、Pegatron、iPhone工厂、印度、苹果供应商 总结:
印度塔塔电子已同意收购台湾合约制造商和苹果供应商 Pegatron 在印度的唯一一家 iPhone 工厂的多数股权。此举将促成两家公司成立一个新的合资企业，进而巩固了塔塔作为苹果供应商的地位。据两位消息人士透露，这一交易使塔塔在印度的电子制造业务中取得重要进展，并加强了其为苹果提供服务的能力。
India's Tata Electronics has agreed to buy a majority stake in Taiwanese contract manufacturer Pegatron's only iPhone plant in India, forming a new joint venture that strengthens Tata's position as an Apple supplier, two sources told Reuters.

item.title: Japanese troops to train with Australia, US militaries in Darwin
item.content:encoded:
关键词：日本、澳大利亚、美军、定期部署、军事合作 总结:
澳大利亚国防部长理查德·马尔斯周日表示，日本军队将开始在澳大利亚北部进行常规部署，这是与澳大利亚和美国加强军事合作的一部分。此举标志着三国之间军事协作的进一步加深。
Japanese troops will begin regular deployments in northern Australia as part of military cooperation with Australia and the U.S., Australia's Defence Minister Richard Marles said on Sunday.

item.title: Taiwan, democracy, development are China's 'red lines', Xi tells Biden
item.content:encoded: China's President Xi Jinping told his U.S. counterpart Joe Biden that the issues of Taiwan, democracy, human rights and rights to development are "red lines" for China and not to be challenged, the official state media Xinhua said on Sunday.

item.title: Japan's Mount Fuji eyes China-made tram to transport hikers, source says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：日本当局、碳足迹、过度拥挤、富士山、中国CRRC、无轨橡胶轮胎电车系统、运输登山者 总结：
日本当局为降低富士山的碳足迹和缓解登山者过度拥挤的问题，计划提议采用由中国CRRC公司制造的无轨橡胶轮胎电车系统来运送登山者。据知情人士透露，该电车系统将有助于改善山区交通状况并减少环境影响。
Japanese authorities seeking to reduce the carbon footprint and overcrowding at Mount Fuji will propose a trackless, rubber-tyred tram system made by China's CRRC to transport climbers, a person with direct knowledge of the plan said.

item.title: Biden, Xi agree that humans, not AI, should control nuclear arms
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：两国、首次、声明、关系、历史性的
总结: 这是两个国家历史上首次共同发表这样的声明，标志着两国关系迈出了具有历史性的一步。此举可能对双方的合作领域、国际影响力及地区局势产生深远影响。 <div> It is the first time the two countries have made such a declaration.

item.title: Taiwan's APEC representative says no handshake or dialogue with China's Xi, only wave
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 林锡耀、亚太经济合作组织(APEC)论坛、利马、中国国家主席习近平、握手、对话、台海紧张关系
总结: 台湾代表林锡耀在秘鲁利马举行的亚太经济合作组织(APEC)论坛上表示，他向中国国家主席习近平挥手致意，但双方并未进行握手或交谈，这反映出当前台北与北京之间的紧张关系。 <div> Lin Hsin-i, Taiwan's representative at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum in Lima, said on Saturday that he greeted China's President Xi Jinping with a wave, but there was no handshake or conversation, a sign of the tensions between Taipei and Beijing.

item.title: TikTok parent ByteDance’s valuation hits $300 billion amid US ban uncertainty, WSJ reports
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：TikTok、ByteDance、$300 billion、估值、美国禁令
总结： 据《华尔街日报》周六报道，TikTok的中国母公司ByteDance在最近的一次股票回购后，其自我估值约为3000亿美元。然而，该公司旗下的热门应用TikTok在美国可能面临即将实施的禁令。 <div> TikTok's Chinese parent company ByteDance is valuing itself at about $300 billion after a recent buyback offer, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday, even as the tech giant's popular TikTok app faces the prospect of a looming ban in the U.S.

item.title: Eight killed in stabbing attack at vocational college in eastern China
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 前学生、中国东部、职业教育学院、持刀伤人、八人死亡、十七人受伤、毕业证书、考试失败

总结: 周六，一名前学生在中国东部的一所职业学院发生持刀伤人事件，造成八人死亡，十七人受伤。警方表示，嫌疑人因未能获得毕业证书及考试不及格而心生怨恨，疑似为此行凶动因。
A former student went on a stabbing rampage at a vocational college in eastern China on Saturday, killing eight people and wounding 17 others, police said, adding it appeared the suspect was angry over not getting his graduation certificate and failing an exam.

item.title: As Trump return looms, China's Xi at APEC criticises protectionism
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：习近平、保护主义、特朗普、中国定位、全球贸易
总结: 习近平对保护主义的批评预示着一旦特朗普就职，中国将在全球贸易中如何定位自己。习近平强调开放合作，反对贸易保护主义，这表明中国可能会在全球经济舞台上扮演更加开放和支持自由贸易的角色，以对抗可能出现的美国保护主义政策倾向。 <div> Xi Jinping's critique of protectionism offers a preview of how China will position itself once Donald Trump takes office.

item.title: Biden, Xi begin final meeting in Peru as Trump era looms
item.content:encoded:
冲突 网络犯罪 贸易 台湾 俄罗斯

总结: 文章提到，由于网络犯罪、贸易、台湾和俄罗斯等问题引发的新冲突，使得降低紧张局势的目标面临挑战。这些矛盾发生在唐纳德·特朗普就职之前，表明国际关系中的复杂性和敏感性。这些问题不仅影响双边关系，也对全球稳定产生影响。
Fresh conflicts over cyber crime, trade, Taiwan and Russia are challenging their goal to lower tensions before Donald Trump's inauguration.

item.title: Troops, armored cars and patrol boats protect G20 summit
item.content:encoded:
关键词：巴西、部署、部队、装甲车辆、海军舰船、G20领导人峰会、周一、周二、里约热内卢、现代艺术博物馆 总结:
巴西已派遣部队、装甲车辆和海军舰船加强对G20主要经济体领导人峰会的安全保障工作。此次峰会将于周一和周二在里约热内卢海滨的现代艺术博物馆举行。
Brazil has deployed troops, armored vehicles and naval ships to reinforce security around the summit of leaders from the Group of 20 major economies who meet on Monday and Tuesday at Rio de Janeiro's bayside Museum of Modern Art.

item.title: Japan's Moriyasu tells team to focus in quest for World Cup trophy
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：日本教练、Hajime Moriyasu、球员、世界杯、2026年北美洲
总结:
日本教练Hajime Moriyasu要求他的队员们保持专注于一场一场比赛的胜利，他为球队设定了一项雄心勃勃的目标，那就是在2026年的北美世界杯上捧起冠军奖杯。 <div> Japan coach Hajime Moriyasu told his players to maintain their focus on winning one game at a time, having set his team the lofty target of lifting the World Cup in North American in 2026.

item.title: Indonesia's Shin retains World Cup qualification hope despite Japan loss
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印尼、教练、申台龙、世界杯预选赛、第三轮、小组垫底 总结:
印尼教练申台龙表示，尽管球队在亚洲区世界杯预选赛第三轮半程过后位居所在小组积分榜末位，但他仍坚信印尼队有能力继续争取晋级世界杯决赛圈的机会。
Indonesia coach Shin Tae-yong believes his team can continue to challenge for a place at the World Cup finals, despite reaching the halfway point in Asia's third round of preliminaries bottom of their qualifying group.

item.title: China willing to be partners, friends with US, Chinese envoy says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、美国、合作伙伴、朋友关系、对话加强
总结: 中国驻华盛顿大使表示，中国愿意成为美国的伙伴和朋友，并寻求强化两个全球最大经济体之间的对话交流。 <div> China is willing to be partners and friends with the United States, China's ambassador to Washington said, seeking to strengthen dialogue between the world's two largest economies.

item.title: Taiwan's APEC representative invites Biden to visit island
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：台湾、亚太峰会、美国总统拜登、访问邀请、热烈交流
总结: 台湾出席亚太峰会的代表与美国总统拜登于周五会面，并邀请拜登在近期内访台，双方进行了热烈的意见交流。据台湾代表团透露，此次会晤中，台湾代表与拜登展开了富有成果的对话。 <div> Taiwan's representative at an Asia-Pacific summit met U.S. President Joe Biden on Friday and invited him to visit Taiwan in the near future, with the two men having a "lively" exchange of views, the island's delegation to the summit said.

item.title: New Zealand PM Luxon, China's Xi Jinping pledge cooperation at APEC
item.content:encoded:
关键词：新西兰总理 克里斯托弗·卢克松 中国国家主席 习近平 首次会面

总结: 新西兰总理克里斯托弗·卢克松和中国国家主席习近平在秘鲁举行的亚太峰会上首次会晤，并承诺双方将在峰会上开展合作。
New Zealand Prime Minister Christopher Luxon and Chinese President Xi Jinping, in their first meeting, pledged cooperation at an Asia-Pacific summit in Peru.

item.title: Xi tells Ishiba China hopes Japan will 'properly handle' history, Taiwan issues
item.content:encoded:
关键词：习近平、日本首相、首次会面、历史问题、台湾问题、妥善处理 总结:
中国国家主席习近平在与日本首相石破茂的首次会晤中表示，中方希望日方能“妥善处理”关乎重大利益的历史和台湾等问题。据中国官方媒体周六报道。
Chinese President Xi Jinping told Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba in their first meeting that China hoped Japan would "properly handle" major issues such as history and Taiwan, according to Chinese state media on Saturday.

item.title: T-Mobile hacked in massive Chinese breach of telecom networks, WSJ reports
item.content:encoded:
关键词：T-Mobile、网络、黑客、中国、 cyber-espionage 总结:
据《华尔街日报》周五报道，T-Mobile的网络在美国和国际多家电信公司遭受到一起由中方进行的破坏性网络间谍行动的入侵，该行动成功进入了这些公司的系统。
T-Mobile's network was among the systems hacked in a damaging Chinese cyber-espionage operation that gained entry into multiple U.S. and international telecommunications companies, The Wall Street Journal reported on Friday citing people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Australia, US, Japan to hold defence trilateral in Darwin on Sunday
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：澳大利亚、日本、美国、国防部长、达尔文、军事合作
总结: 澳大利亚国防部长理查德·马尔斯表示，澳大利亚、日本和美国的国防部长将于周日在澳大利亚城市达尔文会面，讨论继续加强军事合作关系。 <div> The defence ministers of Australia, Japan and the United States will meet in the Australian city of Darwin on Sunday to discuss continued military cooperation, Australia's Defence Minister Richard Marles said on Saturday.

item.title: South Korea's Yoon tells China's Xi cooperation needed on Russia, North Korea
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 韩国总统尹锡悦、中国国家主席习近平、朝鲜、俄罗斯军事合作、韩中合作

总结: 韩国总统尹锡悦向中国国家主席习近平表示，面对朝鲜与俄罗斯的军事合作，两国应加强合作以维护地区和平。尹锡悦办公室周六称，双方应共同努力应对共同挑战。
South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol told Chinese President Xi Jinping that their two countries should cooperate for peace in the face of North Korea and Russia's military cooperation, Yoon's office said on Saturday.

item.title: Biden meets South Korea, Japan leaders for pre-Trump huddle on risk
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Joe Biden, 美国总统, 日本, 韩国, 特朗普政府 总结:
美国总统乔·拜登于上周五与日本和韩国领导人会面，力求在新一届特朗普政府即将上台之际巩固三国间的外交进展。外界担忧，特朗普政府可能会对全球同盟关系造成颠覆性影响。
U.S. President Joe Bidenmet with Japan and South Korea's leaders on Friday as they sought to cement their diplomatic progress ahead of a new Trump administration that many fear could upend alliances worldwide.

item.title: As Trump return looms, China's Xi at APEC criticises protectionism
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Donald Trump、Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC)峰会、习近平、单边主义、保护主义、经济全球化 总结:
在利马举行的亚太经合组织(APEC)峰会上，随着唐纳德·特朗普即将重返美国总统职位，中国国家主席习近平表示，应该拒绝单边主义和保护主义，转而支持经济全球化。他强调在全球化背景下，各国应秉持多边合作原则，共同促进经济发展与区域合作。
With Donald Trump's imminent return to the U.S. presidency looming over the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in Lima, Chinese President Xi Jinping said on Friday that unilateralism and protectionism needed to be rejected in favour of economic globalization.

item.title: LVMH unit to close historic Venice department store
item.content:encoded:
关键词：DFS集团、LVMH、威尼斯、历史建筑、Fondaco dei Tedeschi

总结: DFS集团，这家由奢侈品巨头LVMH控制的香港旅游零售商，宣布将关闭其位于威尼斯历史悠久的Fondaco dei Tedeschi建筑内的业务。
DFS Group, the Hong Kong-based travel retailer controlled by luxury giant LVMH , said on Friday it was shutting down its business in Venice's historic Fondaco dei Tedeschi building.

item.title: Unstoppable Japan thrash Indonesia to move closer to World Cup qualification
item.content:encoded:
关键词：日本、印尼、4-0、世界杯预选赛、亚洲、小组赛C组、Hajime Moriyasu、自动决赛资格 总结:
周五，日本队在雅加达以4-0大胜印尼队，在亚洲区2026年世界杯预选赛小组赛C组中领先七分，朝着获得自动决赛资格又迈进了一步。Hajime Moriyasu麾下的日本队展现出了强大的实力。
Japan thrashed Indonesia 4-0 in Jakarta on Friday as Hajime Moriyasu's relentless side moved seven points clear at the top of Group C of Asia's 2026 World Cup qualifiers and another step closer to an automatic finals spot.

item.title: Rescinding US EV tax credit would cede ground to China, Granholm says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、电动汽车税收抵免、取消、中国车企、詹妮弗·格兰霍姆、COP29气候大会、布加勒斯特 总结:
美国能源部长詹妮弗·格兰霍姆在布加勒斯特举行的COP29气候大会上对记者表示，取消美国电动汽车税收抵免政策将是反效果的，并将使美国在汽车制造业竞争中向中国厂商让步。
Cancelling the U.S. electric vehicle tax credit would be counterproductive and cede ground to car-makers in China, U.S. Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm told reporters on Friday at the COP29 climate conference in Baku.

item.title: China's Alibaba misses quarterly revenue estimates, beats on profit
item.content:encoded:
关键词：阿里巴巴集团、第二季度销售、分析师估计、中国经济不确定性、消费者支出下降 总结:
阿里巴巴集团在周五公布其第二季度销售业绩未达到分析师预期，原因在于持续存在的经济不确定性导致中国国内消费者的消费支出减少，进而对其电子商务业务造成了影响。
Alibaba Group Holding missed analysts' estimates for second-quarter sales on Friday, as persistent economic uncertainty sapped consumer spending in China and weighed on the e-commerce group's domestic business.

item.title: Morning Bid: Fed draws veil over post-election easing
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Mike Dolan、经济数据、股市表现
总结:
Mike Dolan展望了今日美国和全球市场的动态。重点关注今日将公布的经济数据对市场的影响，包括但不限于就业报告、消费者信心指数等关键指标。此外，他还将分析全球股市的表现，特别是美股主要股指如道琼斯、纳斯达克和标普500的走势，以及全球其他重要证券交易所的动向。投资者应密切关注这些因素可能带来的投资机会与风险。 <div> A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: Germany to warn US of damage from 'spiral of tariff hikes', Berlin says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：德国、美国政府、关税上涨、螺旋效应、G20峰会

总结: 德国一位政府官员于周五表示，德国将在即将召开的二十国集团（G20）领导人峰会上向未来美国政府表明，持续加征关税的“螺旋式上涨”将造成严重后果。这番言论是在德国总理朔尔茨准备参加该峰会之际提出的。
Germany will let the future U.S. administration know of the damage that a "spiral of tariff hikes" would cause, a German government official said on Friday ahead of Chancellor Olaf Scholz's participation in the Group of 20 leaders' summit.

item.title: Investors circle the Trump trade's global market victims
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 大型全球投资者、特朗普税改政策、关税政策、华尔街、市场受害者 总结:
大型全球投资者正在撤离那些押注美国总统当选人特朗普税改和关税政策将提振华尔街、并对海外造成损害的热门交易。他们转而投资于11月5日选举中的部分最大市场输家。
Big global investors are exiting popular trades that bet on U.S. President-elect Donald Trump’s tax and tariff policies boosting Wall Street and wreaking damage abroad and swooping in on some of the Nov. 5 election's biggest market victims.

item.title: China's former agriculture minister expelled from communist party, says state media
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、前农业部长、唐仁健、共产党、开除党籍、职务解除 总结:
中国前农业部长唐仁健因严重违反法律和纪律，被国家媒体通报开除党籍并免去其职务。
China's former agriculture minister Tang Renjian was expelled from the communist party and removed from his post due to serious violation of law and disciplines, state media reported on Friday.

item.title: Chinese defence firms to attend Vietnam arms fair as ties deepen
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中国国防企业、越南、军火展、军事关系、下月 总结:
中国国防企业将参加下月在越南举办的军火展览会，一位越南国防部官员于上周五表示。这可能表明两国之间正在深化军事合作关系。
Chinese defence firms will participate in an arms fair in Vietnam next month, a Vietnamese defence official said on Friday, a possible sign of deepening military ties between the two neighbours.

item.title: Asia Gold India premiums reach 4-month peak as price drop attracts customers
item.content:encoded:
关键词：实物黄金溢价、印度、四个月高点、需求反弹、价格下跌、中国、零售购买兴趣有限
总结: 本周，实物黄金在印度的溢价升至近四个月来的最高水平，这主要归因于金价下跌所引发的需求反弹。与此同时，全球最大的黄金消费国中国，其零售市场的购买兴趣较为有限。
Physical gold premiums in India climbed to a near four-month high this week, driven by a rebound in demand as prices dropped, while top consumer China saw limited retail buying interest.

item.title: Old scoring problems plague Australia on road to World Cup
item.content:encoded:
关键词：澳大利亚、克雷格·古德温、世界杯预选赛、巴林、2026年决赛 总结:
澳大利亚将在对阵巴林的世界杯预选赛中迎来边锋克雷格·古德温的回归，他们急切需要他带来的犀利进攻优势以顺利挺进2026年世界杯决赛圈。
Australia will be glad to welcome back winger Craig Goodwin for their World Cup qualifier in Bahrain on Tuesday, as they desperately seek a clinical edge to smooth their path to the 2026 finals.

item.title: Morning Bid: Chinese consumers spend more, just not on property
item.content:encoded:
关键词：欧洲市场、全球市场、Stella Qiu、经济动态、股市表现 总结：
Stella Qiu对即将到来的欧洲及全球市场的分析指出，重点关注当天欧洲市场和全球市场的经济动态以及股市表现。文章将揭示这些市场可能面临的机遇与挑战，同时提供有关市场趋势和关键数据的预期分析。
A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu

item.title: Exclusive: Taiwan president plans Hawaii visit on sensitive trip to Pacific, sources say
item.content:encoded: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te is planning to stop in Hawaii and maybe Guam on a visit to Taipei's diplomatic allies in the Pacific in the coming weeks, sources told Reuters, a sensitive trip coming shortly after the U.S. election.

item.title: New alumina supplies in 2025 poised to rupture record price rally
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：铝土矿、氧化铝、供应紧张、价格飙升、铝生产
总结: 随着明年即将新增的铝土矿转化为氧化铝的能力，预计将会缓解目前氧化铝供应紧张的情况，并有可能终止这种材料创纪录的价格上涨趋势。氧化铝是生产铝的重要原料，新产能的上线对于平抑市场价格和保障铝生产具有积极影响。 <div> New capacity for converting bauxite into alumina due online next year is set to ease tight supplies and potentially halt a record-breaking price rally of the material used to make aluminium.

item.title: Philippines braces for typhoon Man-yi as Usagi weakens
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Typhoon Usagi、菲律宾、北部城镇、房屋吹毁、另一场风暴 总结:
台风“天兔”于周五在袭击菲律宾北部城镇后强度大幅减弱，沿途卷走了一些房屋。同时，当局正在为可能于周末袭击首都马尼拉的另一场风暴做准备。
Typhoon Usagi weakened sharply on Friday after bearing down on the Philippines' northern towns, blowing away houses in its path as authorities brace for another storm that could hit the capital Manila over the weekend.

item.title: China's Oct data shows soft economic underbelly, Trump threat looms large
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、工厂产出增长、放缓、房地产市场、刺激措施 总结：
中国十月工厂产出增长出现放缓迹象，尽管消费者支出有所回升，但房地产行业的危机尚未明显好转。这使得外界呼吁北京方面继续加大近期刺激政策力度以重振经济。
China's factory output growth slowed in October and it was still too early to call a turn in the crisis-hit property sector even though consumers perked up, keeping alive calls for Beijing to top-up its recent blitz of stimulus to revitalise the economy.

item.title: China's home prices fall fastest in 9 years, but officials see signs of stabilisation
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中国、新建住宅价格、年同比下降、最大跌幅、2015年、月度环比下降收窄、房地产市场、政府支持、稳定迹象 总结:
中国十月新建住宅价格出现自2015年以来的最大同比下跌，但环比下降幅度收窄，显示出房地产市场在政府一系列支持政策的作用下开始呈现出企稳迹象。
China's new home prices fell the most year-on-year in October since 2015, but a narrowing monthly rate of declines suggested the property sector was beginning to stabilise with a barrage of support from the government.

item.title: China says Philippines sent supplies to disputed shoal
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、菲律宾、补给品、南中国海、Second Thomas Shoal
总结: 中国表示，菲律宾于上周五向位于南中国海争议区域——Second Thomas Shoal的搁浅军舰提供了补给品。此举涉及两国对该地区主权的争端。 <div> China said on Friday the Philippines had sent supplies to a beached warship on Second Thomas Shoal, a disputed atoll in the South China Sea.

item.title: Oil heads for weekly loss as Chinese demand continues to underperform
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：油价、下跌、中国、需求、经济复苏
总结: 油价在周五出现下跌，原因是中国这个世界最大原油进口国的需求持续疲软，其经济复苏态势不均衡。这表明市场对中国的需求前景感到担忧，从而影响了国际油价走势。 <div> Oil prices fell on Friday on signs demand in China, the world's biggest crude importer, continues to underperform amid its uneven economic recovery.

item.title: Dollar set for big weekly gain as Powell sends yields up, China data mixed
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美元、周涨幅、一年高点、美联储、短期国债收益率
总结: 美元本周有望录得大幅上涨，接近一年来的高点。这一变化源于美联储主席的鹰派立场导致短期美国国债收益率上升，进而使得华尔街和欧洲股市期货出现下跌。 <div> The U.S. dollar was poised for a big weekly gain on Friday, towering near one-year highs as a hawkish turn from the Federal Reserve chief sent short-term Treasury yields higher, leaving Wall Street and European stock market futures in the red.

item.title: China's Xi says Chancay Port the start of a new maritime-land corridor between China and Latin America
item.content:encoded:
关键词：习近平、秘鲁、迪娜·博卢阿尔特、中国、钦查港、海上陆地走廊、拉丁美洲 总结:
中国国家主席习近平在利马与秘鲁总统迪娜·博卢阿尔特会谈时表示，中国愿意以由中国国有企业中远海运建设并控制的钦查港为起点，打造一条连接中国和拉丁美洲的新海上陆地走廊。
Chinese President Xi Jinping said on Thursday during talks with Peru's Dina Boluarte in Lima that China is willing to take the Chancay port, built and controlled by Chinese state-owned Cosco Shipping, as a starting point to forge a new maritime-land corridor between China and Latin America.

item.title: Lenovo plans global factory expansion as Q2 results beat; eyes AI growth
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Lenovo, 供应链多元化, 加强制造业布局, 设立更多工厂, 中国之外, 全球地缘政治不确定性 总结:
联想集团董事长杨元庆表示，面对全球地缘政治不确定性，公司将进一步多元化其供应链，并计划在中国之外开设更多的制造工厂。此举旨在加强公司在海外的制造业布局，以适应不断变化的国际市场环境。
Lenovo will further diversify its supply chain and plans to open more manufacturing facilities outside China amid global geopolitical uncertainty, Chairman Yang Yuanqing said.

item.title: Morning Bid: Powell says no rush needed on more rate cuts
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市动向、经济数据、政策预期、风险情绪 总结:
亚洲市场的今日展望将重点关注各地股市动向，特别是对前一天全球市场走势的反应。投资者也将密切关注即将公布的关键经济数据，这些数据可能影响市场对未来经济增长和货币政策预期的判断。此外，国际贸易紧张局势、疫情发展以及主要经济体的政策信号等风险因素将继续左右市场情绪。
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: US Treasury finds no currency manipulation by major trading partners
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国财政部、贸易伙伴、货币操纵、拜登政府、特朗普
总结: 美国财政部周四表示，在截至6月30日的一年中，没有主要的美国贸易伙伴进行货币操纵。这是拜登政府任期内最后一份半年度外汇报告，之后监控外国汇率做法的任务将移交给即将上任的总统特朗普。 <div> No major U.S. trading partner manipulated its currency in the year to June 30, the Treasury Department said on Thursday in the Biden administration's final semi-annual currency report before turning over policing of foreign exchange practices to President-elect Donald Trump.

item.title: Chinese self-driving firm Pony AI seeks up to $4.5 bln valuation in US IPO
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Pony AI、估值、4.48亿美元、美国首次公开募股、纽约上市 总结：
中国自动驾驶公司Pony AI于本周四表示，其在美国的首次公开募股（IPO）寻求达到最高44.8亿美元的估值。该公司正推进其长期以来在纽约上市的计划。
Pony AI is seeking a valuation of up to $4.48 billion in its U.S. initial public offering, it said on Thursday, as the Chinese self-driving firm moves ahead with its long-sought plan for a New York listing.

item.title: Late Zhang winner reignites China's World Cup dream, Saudis hold Australia
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: China, World Cup qualification, 1-0, Bahrain, Zhang Yuning, Herve Renard, Saudi Arabia, 0-0, Australia
总结: 中国国家足球队在一场世界杯预选赛中，凭借张玉宁的绝杀进球以1-0战胜巴林，重新燃起了晋级世界杯的希望。与此同时，Herve Renard重返沙特阿拉伯国家队教练席，在对阵澳大利亚的客场比赛中以0-0握手言和。 <div> China reignited their World Cup qualification hopes with a last-gasp 1-0 win over Bahrain in Riffa thanks to a Zhang Yuning strike after Herve Renard marked his return to the Saudi Arabia dugout with a 0-0 draw against hosts Australia on Thursday.

item.title: China's Xi arrives in Lima for APEC, to open Pacific megaport
item.content:encoded:
关键词：习近平、秘鲁利马、拉丁美洲、Chanacy深水港、北京基础设施投资 总结:
中国国家主席习近平于周四抵达秘鲁利马，开启了一周对拉丁美洲的密集外交活动。他将为 Chanacy 深水港揭幕，这座港口是中国在拉丁美洲最具雄心的基础设施投资项目之一。
Chinese President Xi Jinping arrived in Lima on Thursday, kicking off a week-long diplomatic blitz in Latin America by inaugurating the massive Chancay deep-water port, one of Beijing's most ambitious infrastructure investments in Latin America.

item.title: ASML CEO says AI boom benefits the company
item.content:encoded:
关键词：ASML、CEO Christophe Fouquet、AI计算机芯片、先进逻辑芯片、内存芯片、销售增长、最佳工具 总结:
ASML的首席执行官Christophe Fouquet于周四表示，人工智能（AI）计算机芯片持续繁荣将对ASML产生积极影响。这会增加先进逻辑和内存芯片制造的比例，从而带动公司最尖端工具的销售额增长。
ASML CEO Christophe Fouquet said on Thursday the ongoing boom in AI computer chips would help ASML by increasing the relative share of advanced logic and memory chips being made, leading to more sales of the company's best tools.

item.title: China's Chery to delay Barcelona production start to Q4 2025, Spanish partner says
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Chery、西班牙、车辆生产、第四季度、2025年

总结: 中国车企奇瑞将其在西班牙启动汽车生产的计划推迟至2025年第四季度，比原计划晚约一年。这一消息来自其西班牙合作伙伴Ebro的一位高管的表述。
Chinese carmaker Chery will delay the start of vehicle production in Spain to the fourth quarter of 2025, an executive at its Spanish partner Ebro said on Thursday, about a year behind a previous schedule.

item.title: Merck signs up to $3.3 billion cancer drug deal with China-based LaNova
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Merck, 中国生物技术公司, 早期癌症药物, 33亿美元交易, Summit Therapeutics, Keytruda, 晚期试验, 中国 总结:
默克公司与一家中国生物技术公司达成了一项价值高达33亿美元的早期癌症药物许可协议。此前两个月，Summit Therapeutics的一款类似疗法在中国的一项晚期试验中表现优于默克的重磅炸弹药物Keytruda。
Merck has licensed an early-stage cancer drug from a China-based biotech in an up to $3.3 billion deal, two months after a similar therapy from Summit Therapeutics outperformed its blockbuster Keytruda in a late-stage trial in the country.

item.title: Biden to bid farewell at APEC and G20 under Trump's shadow
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Joe Biden, South America, global leaders, Donald Trump, return to power
总结: 美国总统乔·拜登将于本周四前往南美洲，与全球领导人会晤，为其50多年的美国政治生涯画上句号。然而，在这些会议中，他试图阻止重新掌权但未能成功的前总统唐纳德·特朗普可能会成为众多讨论的焦点。 <div> President Joe Biden heads to South America on Thursday for a curtain call with global leaders after over 50 years in U.S. politics, but the man he tried and failed to keep from returning to power is likely to be the focus of many meetings: incoming President Donald Trump.

item.title: Morning Bid: A twist in the U.S.'s inflation tale?
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Amanda Cooper、经济动态、股市表现
