总结: Amanda Cooper 对即将来临的美国及全球市场的交易日进行了展望。重点关注美国和全球市场的经济动态以及股市的表现。她可能会分析关键经济数据、企业财报、国际贸易形势等因素对市场的影响，并给出相应的投资策略建议。不过，由于缺乏具体信息，无法给出更详细的要点内容。 <div> A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.

item.title: Hong Kong protest bomb plot mastermind jailed for nearly 24 years
item.content:encoded:
关键词：香港、高等法院、男子、爆炸物袭击阴谋、2019年反华抗议 总结:
香港高等法院周四判决一名男子因策划在2019年城市亲民主和反华抗议期间使用爆炸物攻击警察而被判处有期徒刑23年零10个月。
Hong Kong's high court on Thursday sentenced a man to 23 years and 10 months in prison for being the mastermind of an alleged plot to attack police with explosives during the city's pro-democracy and anti-China protests in 2019.

item.title: In shadow of new Trump term, Japan and S.Korea join US in Asian naval drill
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国、日本、韩国、海军演习、东亚洲水域、拜登、特朗普
总结: 美国、日本和韩国的海军力量于周四在东亚海域进行了联合演习，这是在拜登总统将其标志性国家安全倡议移交给特朗普之前的最后一次复杂且最终的联合军演。 <div> U.S., Japanese and South Korean naval forces exercised together in East Asian waters on Thursday in their most complex and final joint drills before President Joe Biden hands over one of his signature national security initiatives to Donald Trump.

item.title: New BYD and BMW car plants in Hungary to start production in H2 2025
item.content:encoded:
关键词: BYD, 宝马, 匈牙利, 生产开始时间, 2025下半年, 经济提升, 匈牙利总理, 维克多·欧尔班, 首席幕僚 总结:
匈牙利总理维克多·欧尔班的首席幕僚表示，中国BYD和德国宝马汽车公司正在匈牙利建设的工厂预计将于2025年下半年开始生产。此举有望提振该国经济。这两家公司的新工厂将为匈牙利带来新的就业机会并增强其汽车产业实力。
Car plants under construction by Chinese BYD and Germany's BMW are expected to start production in Hungary in the second half of 2025, which could help boost the country's economy, Prime Minister Viktor Orban's chief of staff said on Thursday.

item.title: Malaysia to protest to Philippines over its new maritime laws
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：马来西亚、菲律宾、抗议 note、南中国海、海上权益
总结: 马来西亚表示将向菲律宾递交抗议照会，针对菲律宾新颁布的海洋法规，原因是这些法规与马来西亚在南中国海的海域主张存在重叠。 <div> Malaysia will send a protest note to the Philippines over its new maritime laws due to their overlapping claims in the South China Sea, its deputy foreign minister said on Thursday.

item.title: China's JD.com misses revenue estimates as consumption weakness lingers
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：JD.com、季度营收、市场预期、中国经济放缓、消费者支出
总结: 中国电商巨头京东集团在周四公布的数据中，其季度营收未达到市场预期，原因在于全球第二大经济体中国的经济持续放缓，导致消费者趋向于紧缩开支。 <div> Chinese e-commerce group JD.com missed market estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, as a persistent slowdown in the world's second-largest economy pressured consumers to keep a tight hold on their purse strings.

item.title: Top Russian official Shoigu visits Zhuhai air show on final trade day
item.content:encoded:
关键词：前国防部长、国家、年度战略安全磋商、访问 总结：
前国防部长抵达该国进行一年一度的战略安全磋商访问。此次访问旨在讨论和深化两国之间的战略安全合作与交流。
The former defence minister is in the country for annual strategic security consultations.

item.title: Safety, educational videos resurface online in China after deadly car attack
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、安全视频、交通事故、珠海、伤亡
总结: 近期，中国珠海发生一起因离婚纠纷男子驾车冲撞人群事件，导致35人死亡、43人受伤。该惨痛事故使得有关行人如何避免被超速车辆撞击的教育和安全警示视频再次引起网络关注。人们希望通过重申交通安全知识以防止类似悲剧的发生。 <div> Educational and safety videos on how to avoid being hit by speeding vehicles resurfaced online in China after a man angry over a divorce settlement barrelled into a crowd in Zhuhai, killing 35 people and injuring 43.

item.title: Former Taiwan president Tsai to visit Canada next week, sources say
item.content:encoded: Former Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen is planning to visit Canada next week, two diplomatic sources told Reuters, in a highly watched visit for a senior Taiwan politician who has a become a symbol of the island's defiance against China's military threat.

item.title: BRICS offered Turkey partner country status, Turkish trade minister says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：土耳其、BRICS集团、伙伴国家地位、贸易部长奥默·博拉特、东西方平衡 总结:
土耳其贸易部长奥默·博拉特表示，BRICS集团已向土耳其提供伙伴国家地位。此举正值安卡拉方面继续致力于平衡其与东西方国家间的关系之际。
Turkey was offered partner country status by the BRICS group of nations, Trade Minister Omer Bolat said, as Ankara continues what it calls its efforts to balance its Eastern and Western ties.

item.title: ASML sees growth continuing through 2030 on AI demand
item.content:encoded:
关键词：ASML、欧洲最大科技公司、计算机芯片设备制造商、销售增长、人工智能、先进工具 总结:
欧洲最大的科技公司，计算机芯片设备制造商ASML预计，未来五年其销售额将增长8%至14%。这一增长预期主要得益于人工智能领域的繁荣，进而推动了对该公司最先进工具的强劲需求。
Europe's largest tech firm, computer chip equipment maker ASML , said on Thursday it expects sales to grow by 8% to 14% over the coming five years, as a boom in AI fuels strong demand for its most advanced tools.

item.title: Rubio pick signals a Trump China policy that could go beyond tariffs
item.content:encoded:
关键词：提名、Marco Rubio、中国硬线派、美国总统当选人、Donald Trump、对华政策、关税、贸易、强硬立场、战略对手
总结：美国总统当选人唐纳德·特朗普提名中国硬线派参议员马可·卢比奥为国务卿，这表明他对北京的政策可能不仅限于关注关税和贸易问题，而是可能会采取更为强硬的立场来应对视中国为美国头号战略竞争对手的情况。
With his nomination of China hardliner Marco Rubio for secretary of state, U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has signaled his policy toward Beijing could go beyond his focus on tariffs and trade to a more hawkish stance towards China as the United States' top strategic rival.

item.title: Russian rescuers return a beached killer whale to sea
item.content:encoded:
关键词：俄罗斯救援人员、年轻雌性虎鲸、鄂霍次克海、搁浅、紧急情况部门 总结：
俄罗斯紧急情况部门表示，周四，俄救援人员成功将一头搁浅在远东地区的年轻雌性虎鲸送回了鄂霍次克海。
Russian rescuers returned a young female killer whale to the Sea of Okhotsk on Thursday after the orca beached in the far east, the emergency situations ministry said.

item.title: Exclusive: Zeekr to take control of Lynk in major Geely shake-up
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Zeekr、Lynk & Co、Geely、Volvo Cars、控制权转移
总结: Zeekr，一家中国高端电动汽车制造商，将接管其同属于吉利控股集团和沃尔沃汽车旗下的关联品牌——Lynk & Co，知情人士透露。此举表明吉利集团内部资源的整合与调整，Zeekr将在电动车领域进一步拓展其市场布局。 <div> Chinese premium electric vehicle maker Zeekr will take control of Lynk & Co, a sister brand owned by Geely and Volvo Cars, two sources with direct knowledge of the plans said.

item.title: Taiwan central bank chief doubts Trump administration will penalise Taiwan
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：台湾中央银行、美国候任总统特朗普、新政府、半导体产业、惩罚
总结: 台湾中央银行行长于周四表示，他怀疑特朗普的新政府会因台湾在全球半导体行业中的中心地位而对其进行惩罚。 <div> The head of Taiwan's central bank said on Thursday that he doubted that U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's new administration would penalise Taiwan given the island's central role in the semiconductor industry.

item.title: Philippines Marcos' says he will not block ICC if ex-president Duterte wants to be investigated
item.content:encoded:
关键词：菲律宾总统、Ferdinand Marcos Jr、国际刑事法院、ICC、Rodrigo Duterte、犯罪 against humanity、反毒品行动、调查 总结:
菲律宾总统费迪南德·马科斯表示，如果前总统罗德里戈·杜特尔特愿意接受调查，他的政府不会阻止国际刑事法院（ICC）对其在任期内反毒品行动中涉嫌犯下的危害人类罪进行调查。
Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr said on Thursday his government would not block the International Criminal Court (ICC) if former leader Rodrigo Duterte wants to be investigated for alleged crimes against humanity in his anti-drugs crackdown.

item.title: Record number of students to graduate college in China in 2025
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中国、2025年、大学生毕业生、1222万、历史新高

总结: 据新华社报道，预计到2025年，中国大学毕业生总数将达到创纪录的1222万人。这一数字表明中国高等教育的发展和人才供给规模将持续扩大。
China is projected to have a total of 12.22 million college graduates in 2025, state news agency Xinhua reported on Thursday, a record high.

item.title: Taiwan has no arms shopping list for Trump but keen to discuss, Taiwan security officials say
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：台湾、美国、特朗普政府、新军售清单、国防讨论
总结: 台湾方面表示并未向美国即将上任的特朗普政府提交具体的新增军售清单，但有意与美方探讨如何加强台湾自身的防卫能力。台湾高级安全官员强调了这一立场。 <div> Taiwan does not have a "concrete list" of new arms deals to put to the United States' incoming Trump administration but is keen to discuss how to boost the island's defence, senior Taiwan security officials said.

item.title: Asia shares stumble; long-end US bond yields rise with dollar
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲股票、下跌、美国长期债券收益率、上升、美元、投资者、货币政策、通胀预期、全球最大经济体。

总结: 周四亚洲股市普遍下跌，而美国长期债券收益率和美元则出现上涨。市场参与者正在评估全球最大经济体——美国的货币政策及其通胀前景。
Asian stocks fell broadly on Thursday, while longer-dated U.S. bond yields rose alongside the dollar as investors assessed the monetary policy and inflation outlook in the world's largest economy.

item.title: Chinese social media reels over young woman's illegal surrogacy case
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、非法代孕产业、22岁女性、流产、妇女权益、社会不平等 总结：
一名22岁的中国女性分享了自己如何被诱入国内非法代孕行业，随后不幸遭遇流产的经历，此事在中国社交媒体上引发热议并引起了关于妇女权益和社会不平等问题的深度讨论。
A 22-year-old Chinese woman's account of how she was lured into the country's illegal surrogacy industry before suffering a miscarriage went viral on Chinese social media this week and raised heated debates over women's rights and social inequality.

item.title: Indonesian president says he will safeguard sovereignty in South China Sea
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印尼总统、普拉博沃·苏比安托、南海问题、主权、合作伙伴关系 总结：
印尼总统普拉博沃·苏比安托表示，对于南海问题，他将“始终维护我国的主权”。他认为，建立合作伙伴关系优于发生冲突，并强调印尼尊重所有国家的力量。
Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto said he would "always safeguard our sovereignty" when asked about the issue of the South China Sea, adding partnerships are better than conflicts and that "we respect all powers".

item.title: Tropical storm Toraji shuts schools, some businesses in Hong Kong
item.content:encoded:
关键词：香港、台风警告、热带风暴Toraji、学校关闭、企业关闭 总结:
由于香港当局在夜间发布了第三高级别的台风警告，热带风暴Toraji在香港以南约150公里处掠过，导致香港的学校和许多企业在周四上午纷纷关闭。
Schools and many businesses shut in Hong Kong on Thursday morning after authorities issued the third highest typhoon warning overnight as tropical storm Toraji skirted about 150 km (93 miles) south of the financial hub.

item.title: Foxconn sees robust AI server demand, posts 14% rise in Q3 profit
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Foxconn、全球最大电子代工制造商、人工智能服务器业务、季度利润增长、预期强劲增长
总结: 台湾的全球最大电子代工制造商富士康表示，其人工智能服务器业务明年有望实现强劲增长。该公司在报告季度利润超预期增长14%后作出这一预测。 <div> Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, said on Thursday it expected robust growth in its artificial intelligence server business next year after reporting a better-than-expected 14% rise in quarterly profit.

item.title: Trump pick Rubio could harden oil sanctions on Iran, Venezuela
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Donald Trump, Marco Rubio, 秘书 of state, 石油制裁, 伊朗, 委内瑞拉, 中国, 复仇, 分析师 总结: 美国当选总统唐纳德·特朗普提名联邦参议员马可·卢比奥出任国务卿，这一举动可能预示着美国将对伊朗和委内瑞拉实施更严格的石油制裁。然而，分析师指出，对于来自中国的可能报复行为的担忧可能会抑制任何此类努力。

President-elect Donald Trump's pick of U.S. Senator Marco Rubio for secretary of state could signal stricter enforcement of oil sanctions on Iran and Venezuela, but concerns about retaliation by China could temper any efforts, analysts said on Wednesday.

item.title: China-linked hackers stole surveillance data from telecom companies, US says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国黑客、美国执法机构、监控数据、电信公司、美国当局 总结:
美国当局周三表示，与中国有关联的黑客侵入了若干电信公司的系统，拦截了一批原本打算提供给美国执法机构的监控数据。
China-linked hackers have intercepted surveillance data intended for American law enforcement agencies after breaking in to an unspecified number of telecom companies, U.S. authorities said on Wednesday.

item.title: British Museum to receive hefty donation of world-renowned Chinese ceramics
item.content:encoded:
关键词：英国博物馆、捐赠、中国瓷器、1700件、10亿英镑
总结: 英国博物馆周三宣布，将接收一批价值约10亿英镑（约合12.7亿美元）的世界知名中国瓷器，共计1700余件。这是该博物馆近300年历史上规模最大的一次捐赠。
The British Museum said on Wednesday it would receive 1,700 pieces of world-renowned Chinese ceramics worth around 1 billion pounds ($1.27 billion), in the largest donation in its nearly 300-year history.

item.title: Biden, China's Xi to meet on Saturday in Peru, US officials say
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Joe Biden, Xi Jinping, 美国总统, 中国国家主席, 最后一次会面
总结: 美国总统拜登预计将与中方国家主席习近平进行可能的最后一次会面，美国高级官员表示。此时，北京方面正准备应对在美国下一任总统特朗普领导下可能出现的更为对抗性的中美关系时期。 <div> U.S. President Joe Biden will meet Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping for likely the final time on Saturday, senior administration officials said, as Beijing prepares for a potentially more confrontational period with Washington under Donald Trump.

item.title: US concerned by Russia-North Korea ties and technology exchanges
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、俄罗斯、北韩、技术交换、关系发展 总结:
美国对俄罗斯与朝鲜日益增强的关系表示担忧，特别是两国可能正在进行的技术交流。美国首席军备控制官员周三指出，这种互动可能会带来潜在的战略影响和安全挑战。
The United States is concerned by Russia's growing relationship with North Korea and by what technology the two countries may be exchanging, the top U.S. arms control official said on Wednesday.

item.title: China, Philippines spar over new maritime laws, baseline drawings in South China Sea
item.content:encoded:
关键词：菲律宾、外国 ministry、中国大使、抗议、北京、南中国海、Scarborough Shoal、划界

总结: 菲律宾外交部周三表示，已召见中国大使，对中国在南中国海争议区域—— Scarborough Shoal 周边划定基线的行为提出抗议。
The Philippines' foreign ministry said on Wednesday it summoned China's ambassador to protest Beijing's drawing of baselines around the disputed Scarborough Shoal in the South China Sea.

item.title: Trump, China loom over chipmaker ASML's investor day
item.content:encoded:
关键词：ASML、美国、销售限制、中国、财务指引

总结: 在周四ASML的双年度投资者大会上，该公司将面临美国可能进一步对其向中国销售芯片设备实施限制的压力，届时ASML会提供新的中期和长期财务指导。这一事件凸显了ASML在未来发展中需要应对与美中贸易紧张关系相关的不确定性因素。
The threat of further U.S.-led restrictions on ASML's sales to China will hang over the leading computer chip equipment maker on Thursday when it offers up new medium- and long-term financial guidance at its biannual Investor Day.

item.title: Quinoa, ceviche and Chinese fusion on menu as Peru hosts Biden, Xi
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Peru、Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation Forum、ceviche、quinoa、Chinese fusion dishes
总结： 秘鲁希望在其著名的美食声誉下，在亚太经济合作论坛上为世界各国领导人献上标志性的菜肴——酸橘汁腌鱼（ceviche）、藜麦以及中餐融合料理，以此展现其烹饪文化的魅力。 <div> Peru is hoping its famous cuisine will live up to its reputation at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation Forum, serving world leaders its iconic ceviche, quinoa and Chinese fusion dishes.

item.title: China warns Philippines over new maritime laws, 'unilateral actions'
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国大使馆、菲律宾、单边行动、新海洋法律、领土、航道、航线 总结:
中国大使馆警告菲律宾停止任何“单边行动”，原因是马尼拉制定了两项新的海洋法律，旨在定义领土、航道和空中航线。
China's embassy warned the Philippines to cease any "unilateral actions" after Manila brought in two new maritime laws meant to define territory, sea lanes and air routes.

item.title: Trump trade policy seen as wild card for US soybean farmers
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: American farmers, Donald Trump, tariffs, China, soy, crushing plants
总结: 美国农民担心即将上任的特朗普总统的大规模关税计划将限制他们向中国这个世界最大的大豆购买国出口。然而，关税政策也可能吸引企业在美国境内建设更多的压榨工厂，这些工厂对国内大豆供应有着强劲需求。这表明，虽然关税可能带来出口挑战，但也有可能促进国内大豆产业链的发展。 <div> American farmers are worried that President-elect Donald Trump's sweeping tariff plans will curb their access to top soy buyer China, but tariffs could also lure companies to build more U.S. crushing plants, hungry for domestic supplies.

item.title: BioNTech buys China's Biotheus to support oncology strategy
item.content:encoded:
关键词: BioNTech, 收购, Biotheus, 癌症策略, BNT327 总结:
德国制药公司BioNTech宣布将收购中国生物技术公司Biotheus，以支持其癌症治疗战略，并获得双特异性抗体候选药物BNT327的全球完整权利。
German drugmaker BioNTech has agreed to acquire Chinese biotech company Biotheus to support its oncology strategy and gain full global rights to the bispecific antibody candidate BNT327, it said on Wednesday.

item.title: Morning Bid: All eyes on CPI
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国市场、全球市场、财经记者、Naomi Rovnick、市场前瞻 总结: 财经记者Naomi Rovnick将对即将来临的美国及全球市场的交易日进行展望。她将分析和解读美国市场以及全球市场的关键走势、重要经济数据以及可能影响市场表现的各种因素。

注意：由于未给出具体文章内容，以上总结基于题目提供的信息进行模拟生成。
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by markets correspondent Naomi Rovnick.

item.title: Dollar hits one-year high on Trump trades
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美元、一年高位、主要货币、特朗普交易、美国通胀、预期相符、联邦储备、降低利率 总结:
美元周三升至一年以来对主要货币的最高水平，这得益于所谓的“特朗普交易”，同时美国10月通胀数据符合预期，表明美联储可能会继续降息。
The U.S. dollar advanced to one-year high against major currencies on Wednesday powered by so-called Trump trades and after U.S. inflation for October came in as expected, suggesting the Federal Reserve will continue lowering interest rates.

item.title: Trump 2.0 looms as world leaders head to South America for summits
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：世界领袖、南美洲、双峰会、主题、Donald Trump 2.0
总结: 世界领袖本月将齐聚南美洲参加两场峰会，其中一个重要议题就是围绕着"Donald Trump 2.0"展开。此次会议将深入讨论和应对在特朗普政治理念影响下的新阶段国际关系及其对南美洲地区的影响。 <div> World leaders are heading to South America for twin summits this month, with one major theme dominating: Donald Trump 2.0.

item.title: Taiwan central bank sees peril in Trump tariffs
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：台湾中央银行、特朗普政府、贸易政策、警告、经济风险
总结： 台湾中央银行周三发出警告，认为即将上任的美国总统当选人唐纳德·特朗普提出的贸易政策可能会带来经济风险。台湾方面担心，特朗普政府的贸易措施可能对全球经济及两岸经贸关系产生负面影响。 <div> Taiwan's central bank warned on Wednesday that it sees peril in the proposed trade policies of the incoming administration of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump.

item.title: Exclusive: Glencore-Chandra Singapore refinery to earmark 20% of output for Shell, sources say
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Glencore、Chandra Asri、Shell、新加坡炼油厂、新运营公司 总结:
嘉能可和昌德里亚斯里已经成立了一家新的运营公司，准备完成对壳牌新加坡标志性炼油厂的收购。据知情人士透露，他们将把该工厂约20%的产量分配给即将离任的所有者壳牌。
Glencore and Chandra Asri, gearing up to complete their takeover of Shell's landmark Singapore refinery, have set up a new operating company and will earmark roughly 20% of output for the plant's outgoing owner, sources familiar with the matter said.

item.title: Embraer sees Chinese role in strengthening supply chain, executive says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Embraer、巴西航空工业公司、中国、最大航展、珠海、供应链强化、中国企业角色。 总结:
巴西航空工业公司(Embraer)在中國珠海举行的中国规模最大的航展上表示，该公司计划重点加强其供应链建设，并期望中国企业在这一过程中发挥重要作用。
Brazilian planemaker Embraer said on Wednesday at China's largest air show in Zhuhai that it planned to focus on strengthening its supply chain, with Chinese companies able to play a role.

item.title: China showcases its latest military hardware, and ambitions, at Zhuhai
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、军事硬件、珠海航展、能力突破、专家观点
总结: 中国在珠海举办的国内最大规模航展上展示了其军事硬件，揭示了国家的雄心壮志。专家表示，这些展出的装备在某些方面可能展现出中国军力能力的突破性进展。 <div> The Chinese military hardware on display at the country's largest air show in Zhuhai illustrates its ambitions, and in some cases may show breakthroughs in capability, experts say.

item.title: BNP lays off a dozen China dealmakers amid fee plunge
item.content:encoded:
关键词：BNP Paribas、法国、中国、香港、裁员 总结: 法国巴黎银行(BNP Paribas)已在中国大陆和香港裁减了十几名员工，知情人士向路透社透露。此举是全球银行业因中国市场并购活动放缓而进行裁员行动中的最新一例。

France's BNP Paribas has cut a dozen jobs in mainland China and Hong Kong, a source with knowledge of the matter told Reuters, the latest among global banks to trim headcount amid a slowdown in dealmaking in the Chinese market.

item.title: Tencent's gaming rebound drives Q3 revenue up 8% amid fintech weakness
item.content:encoded:
关键词：腾讯控股、营收增长、第三季度、游戏业务、金融科技增长放缓、中国经济挑战 总结:
腾讯控股周三公布了第三季营收增长8%的成绩单，其游戏业务继续保持增长势头；然而，在中国经济面临压力的背景下，该公司金融科技板块的增长出现放缓。
Chinese technology giant Tencent Holdings posted on Wednesday a 8% rise in third-quarter revenue, extending momentum in its gaming business, while growth in its fintech segments softened amid China's economic headwinds.

item.title: Investors expect more growth and inflation after Trump win, BofA survey shows
item.content:encoded:
关键词：全球投资者、特朗普选举胜利、全球经济预期、增长预期、通胀预期 总结:
在全球投资者对经济前景的预期中，特朗普赢得选举后带来了显著变化。根据Bank of America的月度基金经理调查，现在投资者认为全球经济增长将比之前更高，同时预期中的通货膨胀率也会有所上升。
Global investors changed their expectations on the global economy in the wake of Donald Trump's election win, and now see higher growth than they did before, as well as higher inflation, according to Bank of America's monthly fund manager survey.

item.title: Zhuhai attack: List of previous mass killings in China
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Zhuhai attack, China, car ramming, 35 deaths, dozens injured 总结: 在广东珠海发生的一起汽车冲撞人群事件导致35人死亡，数十人严重受伤，这使得中国近期一系列类似的攻击事件受到了广泛关注。这起事件再次引发了对于公共安全和袭击事件预防措施的关注与讨论。

The Zhuhai attack in which a driver in southern China ploughed his car into a crowd of people and killed 35 people, severely injuring dozens more, has put the spotlight on a recent spate of similar attacks in China.

item.title: India's Apr-Oct finished steel imports at seven-year high
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度、成品钢材进口、四月至十月、七年高点、570万吨

总结：根据路透社周三审查的政府临时数据，印度今年四月至十月期间的成品钢材进口量飙升至七年来的新高，总量达到570万吨。
India's finished steel imports during April-October surged to a seven-year high at 5.7 million metric tons, according to provisional government data reviewed by Reuters on Wednesday.

item.title: Palau president wins second term, will seek to diversify tiny Taiwan ally's economy
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Surangel Whipps Jr、Palau、总统、第二任期、全国选举
总结: 太平洋岛国帕劳的总统苏拉格尔·惠普斯 Jr 在上周举行的全国选举中获胜，获得连任第二个任期。根据帕劳选举委员会周三公布的最终计票结果，他成功蝉联总统职位。 <div> The president of the Pacific Islands nation of Palau, Surangel Whipps Jr, was returned for a second term after a national election held last week, a final tally by the Palau Election Commission showed on Wednesday.

item.title: Cold War bomber enhances China’s ability to strike US bases
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中国H-6轰炸机、现代化版本、核弹头、反舰导弹、远程陆攻导弹、空中加油

总结: 中国对H-6轰炸机进行了现代化升级，部分版本现在具备发射装有核弹头的弹道导弹的能力，同时还可以携带多枚长程反舰和陆地攻击导弹。此外，某些版本的H-6轰炸机还能够进行空中加油，从而提升了其作战半径和持久性。
Some modernized versions of China’s H-6 bomber are now capable of launching ballistic missiles armed with nuclear warheads while others can carry multiple long-range anti-ship and land attack missiles. Some versions can be refueled in flight.

item.title: Exclusive: China battery giant CATL would build US plant if Trump allows it
item.content:encoded:
关键词: CATL、世界顶级电池制造商、美国工厂、中国投资、电动车供应链、Donald Trump、董事长Robin Zeng
总结: 作为全球领先的电池制造商，CATL的创始人兼董事长曾毓群向路透社表示，如果当选总统Donald Trump开放对中国在电动车供应链领域的投资，CATL将考虑在美国建设一座工厂。
CATL , the world's top battery maker, will consider building a U.S. plant if President-elect Donald Trump opens the door to Chinese investment in the electric-vehicle supply chain, the company's founder and chairman, Robin Zeng, told Reuters.

item.title: China's CATL pushes beyond batteries into power grids, EV platforms
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Robin Zeng、CATL、绿色能源提供商、电池成本降低、电动车行业 总结:
CATL 的创始人、亿万富翁 Robin Zeng 计划将全球最大的电池制造商转型为绿色能源供应商，并大幅削减电动车辆的开发成本，从而颠覆支撑其成长的电池行业的经济模式。他希望通过这一策略，引领电动车行业的创新变革。
Robin Zeng, the billionaire founder of CATL , aims to reinvent the world’s largest battery maker as a green-energy provider and to slash the cost of developing electric vehicles, upending the economics of the industry that has powered its growth.

item.title: Stocks struggle on unease about higher bond yields as focus turns to US inflation
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 世界股票、下跌、连续两天、美国国债收益率、美联储政策宽松步伐、通胀数据 总结:
全球股市连续第二天下滑，受到美国国债收益率再次上升的影响。市场正密切关注即将出炉的通胀数据，这些数据可能会为美联储调整政策宽松步伐提供指引。
World stocks dropped for a second successive day on Wednesday, jolted by another push higher in U.S. Treasury yields ahead of inflation data that could inform the pace of Federal Reserve policy easing.

item.title: China says TSMC chip curbs undermine interests of Taiwan companies
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国台湾事务办公室、美国、台积电、芯片禁运、台湾海峡紧张局势 总结：
中国台湾事务办公室发言人朱凤莲周三表示，路透社报道的美国要求台积电停止向部分中国客户供应先进芯片的命令，证明了美国正在“打台湾牌”，企图加剧台湾海峡的紧张局势。
China's Taiwan Affairs Office said on Wednesday that a U.S. order to Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co to halt shipments of advanced chips to some Chinese customers - as reported by Reuters - proved that the United States was "playing the Taiwan card" to raise tensions in the Taiwan Straits. Zhu Fenglian, spokeswoman for China's Taiwan Affairs Office, said the United States aimed to worsen th

item.title: Zhuhai car attack: China clears memorial as government scrambles to respond
item.content:encoded:
关键词：珠海、中国、最大航空展览、袭击事件、关注 总结:
珠海举办中国最大的航空展览之际，发生了一起袭击事件，吸引了全国的关注。该袭击事件与正在进行的盛大的航空展览会形成了鲜明对比，使得此次展览的安全问题和组织管理受到了舆论的额外审视。
The attack happened as Zhuhai captured China’s attention with the largest aviation exhibition.

item.title: Morning Bid: Trump bets cashed in before US CPI
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市、经济数据、投资者情绪、美元指数 总结:
随着新的一天开始，亚洲市场的关注焦点将落在各地股市的表现上，预计投资者会密切关注重要的经济数据发布，这些数据可能对市场走势产生影响。此外，全球投资者的情绪以及美元指数的变化也将成为左右亚洲金融市场动向的关键因素。各国市场表现可能会因上述因素而呈现波动，投资者料将谨慎行事。
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: North Korean soldiers joining Russia in combat, US State Dept says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：朝鲜、俄罗斯、美国国务院、乌克兰战争、战斗行动

总结: 美国国务院表示，朝鲜军队已经开始与俄罗斯部队并肩进行战斗行动，这表明俄罗斯可能已求助于朝鲜，为其在与乌克兰的战争中提供士兵。这一情况引发了美国方面的关切。
North Korean troops have begun engaging in combat operations alongside Russian forces, the U.S. State Department said on Tuesday, expressing concern that Russia had turned to North Korea for soldiers to fight in its war with Ukraine.

item.title: France, China have resumed dialogue on brandy duties, spirits groups say
item.content:encoded:
关键词：法国、中国、关税、欧洲品牌干邑进口、欧盟、中国产电动车辆、法国酒类行业协会 总结:
法国和中国已经恢复讨论关于北京对欧洲品牌干邑进口所施加的关税问题。这一讨论发生在上月欧盟投票决定对中国制造的电动汽车实施关税之后。法国酒类行业协会于周二宣布了这一消息。
France and China have resumed discussing the duties Beijing has imposed on European brandy imports after the European Union voted last month for tariffs on Chinese-made electric vehicles (EVs), French spirits lobby groups said on Tuesday.

item.title: NATO chief warns of threat from Russian ties with China, Iran, North Korea
item.content:encoded:
关键词：俄罗斯、经济军事合作、中国、北韩、伊朗、欧洲、北约、马克·吕特、周二 总结:
北约秘书长马克·吕特于周二表示，俄罗斯与中国的经济和军事合作以及与北韩、伊朗的关系日益增强，对欧洲、印太地区及北美构成威胁。
Russia's growing economic and military cooperation with China, North Korea and Iran is threatening Europe, the Indo-Pacific and North America, NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte said on Tuesday.

item.title: AstraZeneca: 450 million pound investment in UK under review amid talks with govt
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：AstraZeneca、投资计划、英国、疫苗研发、政府谈判
总结: 伦敦上市制药公司阿斯利康表示，其今年3月宣布的将在英国投资4.5亿英镑（约合57.67亿美元）用于疫苗研究和开发的计划正在审查中，因为与政府关于激励措施的讨论仍在继续。 <div> London-listed drugmaker AstraZeneca said its plan to invest 450 million pounds ($576.7 million) in Britain for vaccine research and development, announced in March, is under review while talks with the government over incentives continue.

item.title: Saudis look to Renard to recapture past glories and reignite World Cup challenge
item.content:encoded:
关键词：沙特阿拉伯、澳大利亚、亚洲世界杯预选赛、墨尔本、绿鹰、罗伯托·曼奇尼、赫维·雷纳德 总结：
沙特阿拉伯将在亚洲世界杯预选赛中对阵澳大利亚，期待重振过去的辉煌。此役在墨尔本进行，沙特阿拉伯希望能够从罗伯托·曼奇尼时代的低迷表现中走出来，随着赫维·雷纳德的回归，球队将瞄准新的开始和进步。
Saudi Arabia will look to rekindle past glories when they take on Australia in Asia's World Cup preliminaries in Melbourne on Thursday with the Green Falcons aiming to move on from the lacklustre Roberto Mancini era with the return of Herve Renard.

item.title: Earnings, China worries drag FTSE 100 to 3-month low
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：伦敦基准指数、三个月最低点、特朗普、中国鹰派、企业更新
总结: 伦敦的基准股指在周二触及超过三个月以来的最低点，这主要源于市场担忧美国当选总统特朗普可能会任命一位对华强硬的外交官，同时一些企业发布的业绩更新也令人失望。 <div> London's benchmark index hit its lowest point in over three months on Tuesday, fuelled by concerns that U.S. president-elect Donald Trump could appoint a China hawk as a leading diplomat, along with some disappointing corporate updates.

item.title: AstraZeneca says detained China head has lawyer, but company still in dark
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：AstraZeneca、中国、Leon Wang、拘留、CEO
总结: 英国制药公司阿斯利康（AstraZeneca）的中国区总裁王磊上月被中国当局拘留。该公司首席执行官表示，王磊目前已经与律师取得联系，但公司对于此案的具体情况了解甚少。 <div> AstraZeneca's China president Leon Wang, who was detained last month by Chinese authorities, is in touch with a lawyer but the company has very little information about the case, its CEO said on Tuesday.

item.title: Iraq shortlists 11 firms for Grand Faw port operation, decision in January 2025
item.content:encoded:
关键词：伊拉克、Grand Faw 港口、运营合同、航运公司、短名单
总结: 伊拉克港口总局负责人向路透社透露，伊拉克已将11家航运公司列入短名单，这些公司将竞标Grand Faw港的运营合同。最终的中标结果预计将于2025年1月公布。
Iraq has shortlisted 11 shipping companies to compete for the Grand Faw port operation contract, with a decision on the winners expected in January 2025, Iraq's director general of the General Company for Ports told Reuters on Tuesday.

item.title: China jitters, earnings drag Europe's STOXX 600 to three-month low
item.content:encoded:
关键词：欧洲主指数、下跌2%、三个月低位、美中关系、疲软财报 总结:
欧洲主要股指周二下挫2%，触及近三个月来最低点，因市场担忧美中关系的不确定性对那些对中国这个世界第二大经济体有大量曝险的股票构成压力。同时，一些疲弱的企业业绩也对股市造成拖累。
Europe's main index plunged 2% to a near three-month low on Tuesday, as concerns over the fate of U.S.-China relations cast a shadow over stocks with significant exposure to the world's No. 2 economy, while some downbeat earnings also weighed.

item.title: Thirty five people killed in hit-and-run incident in Zhuhai, China
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、珠海、汽车冲撞、体育中心、死伤 总结：
中国南部城市珠海一家体育中心外，周一晚间发生一起汽车冲撞人群事件，据央视新闻周二报道，该事件导致35人死亡，43人受伤。
Thirty-five people were killed and 43 others injured after a car drove into a group of people outside a sports centre in China's southern city of Zhuhai on Monday evening, state television CCTV reported on Tuesday.

item.title: Morning Bid: Bitcoin: to $90,000 and beyond?
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Dhara Ranasinghe、经济数据、股市动态
总结: <div> A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Dhara Ranasinghe

item.title: Zhuhai air show opens with orders for COMAC and a glimpse of a future spaceplane
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、航空航天、野心、首日、中心舞台
总结: 中国在第一天将航空航天领域的雄心壮志展现出来，凸显其在此领域的重要地位。随着中国持续推进航天事业的发展，不仅在火箭发射、空间站建设等方面取得显著成就，而且在探月工程、火星探测等深空探索上也展现出了强大的实力和决心。这标志着中国已将航空航天发展置于国家发展战略的核心位置，并正在逐步实现其成为全球航天大国的目标。 <div> China's aerospace ambitions took centre stage on the first day.

item.title: Exclusive: Beijing pushes to join security efforts for citizens in Pakistan, sources say
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 北京、巴基斯坦、安全人员、中国公民、卡拉奇爆炸事件
总结: 北京正在与巴基斯坦进行会谈，要求允许中国的安保人员为在南亚国家工作的数千名中国公民提供保护。这一举措是在卡拉奇发生汽车爆炸案后提出的，该事件被视为重大的安全漏洞。此次爆炸事件促使中国对在巴国项目中的人员安全保障问题采取了更为积极主动的态度。 <div> Beijing is pushing Pakistan to allow its own security staff to provide protection to thousands of Chinese citizens working in the South Asian nation, during talks after a car bombing in Karachi that was seen as a major security breach, sources said.

item.title: China's AVIC reveals uncrewed cargo spaceplane at Zhuhai air show
item.content:encoded:
关键词: AVIC、中国、首架、商业无人空间飞机、中国空间站

总结: 国有航空航天企业AVIC在中国最大的航空展——珠海航展上展示了中国首架商用无人驾驶空间飞机。这架空间飞机的任务是为中国的空间站提供补给。
State-owned aerospace company AVIC unveiled China's first commercial uncrewed spaceplane at the country's biggest air show in Zhuhai on Tuesday, with a mission of supplying the Chinese space station.

item.title: COP29: Pay up or face climate-led disaster for humanity, warns UN chief
item.content:encoded:
关键词：联合国秘书长安东尼奥·古特雷斯、COP29峰会、支付资金、气候灾害、全球气温上升 总结:
联合国秘书长安东尼奥·古特雷斯在COP29峰会上敦促各国领导人增加资金投入，以防止由气候变化导致的人道主义灾难。他强调，时间正在流逝，国际社会必须尽快采取行动，限制全球气温破坏性上升。
United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres told world leaders at the COP29 summit on Tuesday to "pay up" to prevent climate-led humanitarian disasters, and said time was running out to limit a destructive rise in global temperatures.

item.title: India thermal coal imports fall at fastest pace in 15 months
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 印度、进口、热煤、下降、电力生成、清洁能源产量
总结: 印度热煤进口量在十月份同比锐减约三分之一，根据大数据分析公司Bigmint和Kpler的数据。这主要归因于国内电力生成增速放缓以及更高水平的清洁能源产出。 <div> India's imports of thermal coal plunged by about a third on an annual basis in October, according to data analytics firms Bigmint and Kpler, due to slowing power generation and higher clean energy output.

item.title: Philippines says China is pushing it to cede claims in South China Sea
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、菲律宾、南中国海、主权权利、国防部长
总结： 中国正在加大向菲律宾施压，要求其放弃在南中国海的主权权利，这是菲律宾国防部长Gilberto Teodoro周二在与澳大利亚防长会面后所表述的。此举表明中国在该海域的立场进一步强化，同时凸显了两国之间在这一问题上的紧张态势。 <div> China is putting ever greater pressure on the Philippines to cede its sovereign rights in the South China Sea, Manila's Defense Secretary Gilberto Teodoro said on Tuesday after meeting his Australian counterpart in Canberra.

item.title: Russia and China must counter any U.S. attempt at containment, Shoigu says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：俄罗斯、中国、美国、遏制、普京盟友
总结: 俄罗斯和中国的共同关键任务是抵制美国试图遏制两国的行为。俄罗斯总统普京的一位盟友在周二对中国的外交部长表示了这一立场。双方强调了面对美国潜在的遏制策略时，中俄两国需共同努力、相互支持。 <div> The key task for Russia and China is to counter any attempt by the United States to contain their countries, an ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin told China's foreign minister on Tuesday.

item.title: Vietnam expands chip packaging footprint as investors reduce China links
item.content:encoded:
关键词：越南、外资企业、芯片测试、封装、中国、工业转移、贸易紧张、国内企业、投资 总结:
由于与西方国家的贸易紧张关系导致工业活动从中国转向越南，外资企业正在越南扩大芯片测试和封装产能。与此同时，国内企业也在密切关注并考虑进行相关领域的投资。这一趋势显示出全球产业链调整的步伐正在加快。
Foreign companies are expanding capacity in Vietnam for testing and packaging chips while domestic firms are eyeing investments, as a shifting of industrial activity away from China gathers pace due to trade tensions with the West, executives said.

item.title: China military displays upgraded Z-20 helicopter at Zhuhai air show
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Z-20、中国海军、潜艇保护能力、海上潜力、审视
总结: Z-20直升机因其在海上的潜在能力，被外界密切关注，因为它有可能填补中国海军在保护自身免受潜艇威胁方面的能力缺口。这款直升机的发展和服役将对中国海军的反潜战力产生重要影响，进一步提升其在海域防御和作战中的综合实力。 <div> The Z-20's potential at sea to plug gaps in the Chinese navy's ability to protect itself from submarines is attracting scrutiny.

item.title: Airbus defends free trade amid growing tariff jitters
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Airbus、自由贸易、航空业、经济紧张、贸易保护主义
总结: 欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司在周二表示支持自由贸易，此时航空航天行业正面临日益加剧的经济紧张局势。在全球贸易保护主义倾向上升的背景下，空客此番表态凸显了其对维持开放贸易环境的重视和立场。 <div> European planemaker Airbus defended free trade on Tuesday as the aerospace industry faces a growing cluster of economic tensions.

item.title: Hong Kong construction titan turned Macau casino boss Lui Che-Woo dies aged 95
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Lui Che Woo、赌场大亨、澳门、拉斯维加斯、逝世 总结：
赌场大亨Lui Che Woo去世，享年95岁。他帮助推动澳门赌博业发展，使其收入超越了竞争对手拉斯维加斯。他的公司于周一晚发布声明确认了这一消息。
Lui Che Woo, the casino tycoon who helped propel Macau to eclipse rival Las Vegas in gambling revenues, has died at the age of 95, his company said in a statement late on Monday.

item.title: COMAC says Air China is the first customer for C929 widebody jet
item.content:encoded:
关键词：COMAC、Air China、C929宽体飞机、空中客车、波音 总结:
中国商飞（COMAC）周二表示，中国国航（Air China）成为其正在研发的C929宽体客机的首位客户。这款飞机旨在与空客和波音的双通道机型展开竞争。
COMAC said on Tuesday that Air China was the first customer for the Chinese planemaker's C929 widebody aircraft under development that is designed to compete with twin-aisle models from Airbus and Boeing .

item.title: Baidu bolsters AI lineup with text-to-image generator, no-code app builder
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国百度公司、人工智能技术、文本转图像生成器、无代码软件开发工具、新应用发布

总结：中国百度公司在周二发布了一系列人工智能技术的新应用，其中包括一款文本转图像生成器和一个能让用户无需编程经验即可开发软件的应用工具。这些新应用展示了百度在人工智能领域的创新和对降低技术使用门槛的努力。
China's Baidu Inc unveiled a slew of new applications for its artificial intelligence technology on Tuesday, including a text-to-image generator and a tool that enables users to develop software applications without coding expertise.

item.title: Asia stocks slip, bitcoin at record high as Trump trade whipsaws markets
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲股市、下跌、中国股市、芯片股、特朗普政策、比特币、历史新高、资产受益、新政府
总结: 亚洲股市周二大幅下挫，受中国股市和芯片股拖累，投资者对美国当选总统特朗普的政策感到担忧。与此同时，比特币价格创下历史新高，市场预期其可能从新一届美国政府的政策中受益。
Asian stocks tumbled on Tuesday dragged by Chinese markets and chip shares as investors worried about U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's policies, while bitcoin hit a record peak on bets on assets that are set to benefit from the new administration.

item.title: Chinese police detain man after hit-and-run attack leaves several wounded
item.content:encoded:
关键词：珠海、警方、62岁男子、体育中心、撞人逃逸事件

总结：中国南部城市珠海的警方逮捕了一名62岁的男子，该男子涉嫌在一体育中心发生的一起导致多人伤亡的撞人逃逸事件后被抓获。
Police in the southern Chinese city of Zhuhai have arrested a 62-year-old man after a suspected hit-and-run attack at a sports centre that resulted in multiple casualties.

item.title: China's COMAC rebrands regional jet to C909 in marketing push
item.content:encoded:
关键词：move, aligns, plane, state-owned firm, naming convention, other models. 总结:
该举措使这架飞机与这家国营企业的其他型号命名规则保持一致。此举表明该公司正在对其产品线进行统一和标准化，遵循已有的命名体系，以强化品牌识别度和市场策略。
The move aligns the plane with the state-owned firm's naming convention for other models.

item.title: China's Singles' Day wraps up super-sized sales event with volume, shopper growth
item.content:encoded:
关键词：阿里巴巴集团、双十一、销售额增长、创纪录消费者数量、购物狂欢期 总结:
阿里巴巴集团宣布，今年的双十一购物狂欢期结束于周日晚十二点，期间实现了强劲的销售额增长，并创下有史以来最高消费者数量记录。这个持续数周的促销活动见证了中国最大电商巨头的强劲商业活力。
China's largest e-commerce company Alibaba Group said it recorded "robust growth" in sales and a "record number" of shoppers over this year's Singles' Day sales period, a weeks-long event that ended at midnight on Monday.

item.title: What is China’s Singles Day and how is it celebrated?
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Singles Day、中国、全球最大购物活动、黑色星期五、网络星期一、亚马逊Prime Day

总结: 单身节（Singles Day）是中国每年举行的全球最大规模的购物盛事，相比于美国的黑色星期五、网络星期一以及亚马逊的Prime Day，它的规模更大。这个以11月11日为日期的节日，已演变成全球电商巨头阿里巴巴旗下电商平台和其他零售商的重要销售促销日。
Black Friday? No. Cyber Monday? Nope. Prime Day? Absolutely not. The world's biggest shopping event happens in China each year - and it's called Singles Day.

item.title: China's Huawei Technologies seeks dismissal of US criminal charges
item.content:encoded:
关键词：华为技术(HWT.UL)、美国法官、联邦指控、盗窃技术秘密、美国对手、误导银行、伊朗业务
总结： 华为技术(HWT.UL)请求美国法官驳回大部分联邦起诉内容，这些起诉指控华为试图窃取美国竞争对手的技术秘密，并在关于其在伊朗开展业务的问题上误导了多家银行。
Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) asked a U.S. judge to dismiss much of a federal indictment accusing the Chinese telecommunications company of trying to steal technology secrets from U.S. rivals and misleading banks about its business in Iran.

item.title: German junior economy minister travels to Taiwan
item.content:encoded:
关键词：德国、Udo Philipp、台湾、经济部长、TSMC芯片工厂 总结:
德国的初级经济部长Udo Philipp将于本周前往台湾，与当地政府官员进行会谈并参观台积电（TSMC）的芯片工厂。此行旨在讨论双方经济合作事务，尤其是在半导体产业方面。
Germany's junior economy minister Udo Philipp will go to Taiwan this week for talks with government officials and a visit to a TSMC chip factory, a ministry statement said on Monday.

item.title: Security tightens in Lima as Peru prepares to host APEC summit
item.content:encoded:
关键词：学校、大学、公共员工、远程工作、安全力量、秘鲁首都、亚太经济合作组织(APEC)论坛、抗议威胁
总结： 由于亚太经济合作组织(APEC)论坛即将在秘鲁首都召开，面临抗议威胁，该国采取了一系列防范措施。学校和大学暂停上课，公共部门员工实行远程办公，而安全力量则全面部署在首都以确保会议期间的安全稳定。
Schools and universities were closed, public employees worked from home and security forces blanketed Peru's capital on Monday on the eve of a gathering of world leaders for an Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Forum amid threats of protests.

item.title: India, Saudi Arabia top buyers of Russian VGO and fuel oil in October, LSEG data shows
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度、沙特阿拉伯、俄罗斯、燃料油、真空汽油油(VGO)出口 总结:
俄罗斯在10月份的海上燃料油和真空汽油油(VGO)出口中，印度和沙特阿拉伯成为了最大的目的地，贸易商透露并有LSEG数据显示。
India and Saudi Arabia were the top destinations for Russian seaborne fuel oil and vacuum gasoil (VGO) exports in October, traders said and LSEG data showed.

item.title: Morning Bid: Post-election dollar revs up, China battles deflation
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国市场、全球市场、经济数据、股市动向、货币政策 总结： 随着一天交易的到来，关注焦点将落在美国市场和全球市场的表现上。重要经济数据的发布可能会对股市走势产生影响，投资者将从中寻找关于全球经济健康状况的线索。同时，任何有关各国央行货币政策动态的消息也将牵动市场神经，特别是美联储的政策走向将对全球金融市场带来显著影响。此外，贸易关系的变化和其他地缘政治事件也可能左右当日市场情绪与投资决策。

A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: South Korea's ruling party plans chips law to avert Trump threat
item.content:encoded:
关键词：韩国、执政党、芯片法案、补贴、工作时间上限、美国新任总统特朗普、潜在风险

总结： 韩国执政党提出一项特别芯片法案，计划为芯片制造商提供补贴并豁免其国内工时限制，以应对美国新任总统特朗普可能实施的措施所带来的潜在风险。该法案旨在支持韩国芯片产业应对可能面临的挑战。
South Korea's ruling party proposed a special chips act on Monday to give chipmakers subsidies and an exemption from a national cap on working hours, to tackle potential risks from measures threatened by incoming U.S. President Donald Trump.

item.title: In South America, Trump already losing a trade battle with China
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 秘鲁、特朗普政府、贸易战争、中国、南美洲资源
总结: 在南美铜业大国秘鲁，新当选的特朗普政府将发现自己在中国的贸易争端中已经处于下风。这背后反映出华盛顿在自己后院——这片资源丰富的地区——面临的权力格局调整问题。 <div> In South American copper giant Peru, the incoming Donald Trump White House will find itself already on the losing side in a trade battle with China, part of a bigger power realignment around the resource-rich region in Washington's backyard.

item.title: China chip index nears 3-year high as TSMC order fuels self-reliance bets
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国半导体指数、三年高点、美国禁令、台湾积体电路制造公司、北京自给自足努力
总结: 中国半导体指数周一飙升至接近近三年来的最高点，市场预期美国针对台积电停止向中国大陆客户供应先进芯片的命令可能会加快北京方面实现半导体自给自足的努力。 <div> China's semiconductor index leapt close to a three-year high on Monday on bets a U.S. order halting Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co's shipments of advanced chips to Chinese customers could accelerate Beijing's self-reliance efforts.

item.title: Indonesia says it has no overlapping South China Sea claims with China, despite joint agreement
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：印尼、中国、南中国海、联合海洋开发协议、主权权利
总结: 印尼周一表示，虽然已与北京签署了联合海洋开发协议，但印尼并不承认中国在南中国海的领土主张。一些分析人士警告称，该协议可能会危及印尼的主权权利。 <div> Indonesia said on Monday it does not recognise China's claims over the South China Sea despite signing a joint maritime development deal with Beijing, as some analysts warned the agreement risked compromising the country's sovereign rights.

item.title: Chinese study recommends region-specific diets, amid rising obesity risks
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国科学家、区域特定饮食、肥胖、生活方式疾病、自然资源保护
总结: 中国科学家建议推行区域特定饮食，以应对国内日益增长的肥胖和生活方式疾病问题，并提出该举措同时有利于保护自然与环境资源。他们认为改善饮食习惯对于国民健康和环境保护具有重要意义。 <div> Chinese scientists have recommended a region-specific diet they say is crucial to improving eating habits in the country amid a rise in obesity and lifestyle diseases, and as a means to conserve natural and environmental resources.

item.title: India to summon Amazon, Flipkart executives as regulatory scrutiny grows, source says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度金融犯罪机构、Flipkart、Amazon、高管、外国投资法违返调查 总结:
印度金融犯罪机构将传唤Flipkart和亚马逊的高管，因该机构正在加大对其涉嫌违反外国投资法规行为的调查力度。此前不久，这些电商公司的部分卖家遭到了突击搜查。
India's financial crime agency will summon Flipkart and Amazon executives as it steps up an investigation into alleged foreign investment law violations, days after raiding some of the e-commerce firms' sellers, a senior government source said.

item.title: Morning Bid: Markets feel familiar frustration with Beijing
item.content:encoded: <div> 很抱歉，您并未给出具体的文章内容。请您提供有关欧洲和全球市场未来一天走势分析的文章细节，以便我可以为您进行总结。 <div> A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.

item.title: China clamps down on quest for soup dumplings by 'Night Riding Army'
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中国中部、警方、交通管制、大学生、共享单车、夜间骑行、城市开封、早餐热潮 总结:
中国中部地区的警方在周末实施了交通管制措施，以制止一场席卷数千名大学生的病毒式热潮。这些大学生借用了共享单车，在夜间骑行前往开封市寻找早餐。这场被称为“早餐热潮”的活动引起了广泛关注和交通管理问题。
Police in central China imposed traffic curbs at the weekend to halt a viral craze in which thousands of university students borrowed share bikes to ride overnight to the city of Kaifeng in search of breakfast.

item.title: Taiwan businessman Tsao to sue Chinese officials over sanctions
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Robert Tsao、台湾商人、中国官员、制裁、起诉、台湾法院、反制、中国威慑、合法活动 总结:
台湾商人Robert Tsao周一表示，他将在台湾法院起诉多位对中国施加制裁他的高级官员。他表示，此举旨在对抗中国对他合法活动的威慑和恐吓行为。
Taiwanese businessman Robert Tsao said on Monday he would sue in a Taiwan court senior Chinese officials over sanctions they had placed on him, saying he was seeking to counter China's intimidation of lawful activity.

item.title: Asian stocks slide as China stimulus disappoints; bitcoin extends record rally
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 香港股票、亚洲市场、北京刺激措施、投资者预期、华尔街记录高点
总结: 香港股市周一领跌亚洲市场，因北京最新推出的刺激措施未能达到投资者预期，这使得华尔街上周五创下的历史高点以及期货指向的开盘强势被黯然掩盖。 <div> Hong Kong stocks led declines in Asia on Monday after Beijing's latest stimulus fell short of investor expectations, overshadowing Wall Street's record highs from Friday and futures pointing to further strength at the reopen.

item.title: Vietnam says Temu, Shein must register with government or be blocked
item.content:encoded:
关键词：越南、中国在线零售商、Shein、Temu、政府注册、截止日期、11月底、封锁域名、应用禁用。 总结：
越南要求中国在线零售商Shein和Temu需在11月底前向越南政府注册，否则将封停其在当地使用的互联网域名和应用程序。
Vietnam said Chinese online retailers Shein and Temu need to register with the government before the end of November or it will block their internet domains and apps from being used in the country.

item.title: Oil little changed as US storm threat abates, China stimulus disappoints
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 油价、美国风暴、供应中断威胁、中国刺激计划、燃油需求增长 总结:
周一油价变动不大，因美国风暴对供应中断的威胁缓解，同时中国推出的刺激计划未能满足投资者对这个世界第二大石油消费国燃油需求增长的期待。
Oil prices were little changed on Monday as the threat of supply disruptions from a U.S. storm eased and after China's stimulus plan disappointed investors seeking fuel demand growth in the world's No. 2 oil consumer.

item.title: Buddhist Bhutan to build 'mindfulness city' to woo investment, create jobs
item.content:encoded:
关键词：不丹、国民幸福指数、正念城市、1亿美元债券发行、项目启动 总结:
不丹，这个引入全球国民幸福指数概念的喜马拉雅王国，计划建设一座“正念城市”，并将于周一推出一项价值1亿美元的债券发行，以助力该项目的启动。
Bhutan, the Himalayan kingdom that brought the world the concept of gross national happiness, is set to build a "mindfulness city" and will launch a $100 million bond issue on Monday to help start the project.

item.title: China's J-35A stealth fighter is 'black box' despite splashy debut
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、J-35A隐形战机、珠海航展、十年研发、性能未知 总结:
中国备受期待的J-35A隐形战机在本周的珠海航展上亮相，这款战机的研发工作已耗时超过十年。然而，专家表示，关于J-35A的具体性能细节目前仍知之甚少。
China's much-anticipated J-35A stealth aircraft, centrepiece of this week's Zhuhai air show, has been more than a decade in the making, but experts say little is known about its capabilities.

item.title: What you need to know about China's $1.4 trillion debt package
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、10万亿元、债务套餐、地方财政压力、经济稳定增长、直接经济刺激 总结：
中国于上周五宣布了一项规模达10万亿元人民币（约合1.4万亿美元）的债务计划，旨在缓解地方政府财政压力并稳定经济增长。但官员们同时表示，该计划并不会包含直接的经济刺激措施。
China unveiled a 10 trillion yuan ($1.4 trillion) debt package on Friday to ease local government financing strains and stabilise flagging economic growth, but officials refrained from announcing direct economic stimulus.

item.title: Morning Bid: China caution cools sizzling US optimism
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市动向、经济数据、风险情绪、货币政策 总结:
随着全球市场的联动，今日亚洲市场将关注各地股市动向，特别是隔夜美股的表现可能对亚太地区股市产生影响。此外，重要的经济数据发布也将牵引市场走势，包括中国的贸易数据或日本的通胀数据等。投资者的风险情绪变化以及各主要经济体的货币政策动态也将在日内左右市场气氛。预计亚洲市场将会呈现波动行情，交易者需密切关注各类信息与指标的出炉情况。
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: China opposes new Philippine maritime law, vows to protect South China Sea 'sovereignty'
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、菲律宾、海上领土声索、南中国海、立法、严重侵犯、领土主权、权利、保护自身利益。
总结: 中国于周日表示，菲律宾的新立法“严重侵犯”了北京在南中国海的领土主权和权益，并誓言将坚决捍卫自身的利益。
China rejected Philippine maritime claims on Sunday, saying new legislation "severely infringes on" Beijing's territorial sovereignty and rights in the South China Sea, and vowing to protect its own interests.

item.title: China, Indonesia enhance ties with key deals on lithium, green energy, tourism
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、印尼、合作、锂、新能源汽车、绿色能源、旅游业
总结: 中国和印尼达成一致，将在关键领域加强合作，包括锂资源开发、新能源汽车、绿色能源以及旅游业。根据周六发布的联合声明，双方将深化这些领域的互利合作关系，共同推动两国经济的可持续发展和共赢局面。 <div> China and Indonesia have agreed to strengthen cooperation in key sectors, including lithium, new energy vehicles, green energy and tourism, according to a joint statement released on Saturday.

item.title: Exclusive: US ordered TSMC to halt shipments to China of chips used in AI applications
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：US order, TSMC, Commerce Department, chip, Huawei AI processor
总结: 美国政府下达新命令，这一行动发生在台积电通知美国商务部在其为华为生产的AI处理器中发现了一枚芯片之后。此举可能进一步影响到华为与全球半导体供应商的合作关系以及其获取关键芯片的能力。 <div> The US order comes after TSMC notified the Commerce Department that a chip had been found in a Huawei AI processor.

item.title: Mauritius holds election with cost of living on everyone's minds
item.content:encoded:
关键词：毛里求斯、议会选举、现任总理普拉文·库马尔·贾格纳特、生活成本危机、印度洋群岛。

总结： 毛里求斯将于周日举行议会选举，现任总理普拉文·库马尔·贾格纳特与其主要竞争对手均承诺将解决该国印度洋群岛中的生活成本危机问题。
Mauritius holds a parliamentary election on Sunday with incumbent Prime Minister Pravind Kumar Jugnauth and his main rivals all promising to tackle a cost of living crisis in the Indian Ocean archipelago.

item.title: China and Indonesia sign multiple cooperation deals
item.content:encoded:
关键词：习近平、印尼总统、合作协议、关键领域、伙伴关系 总结:
中国国家主席习近平与印尼总统普拉博沃·苏比安托周六签署了多项合作协议，据中国国家电视台CCTV报道，两国旨在关键领域寻求增强合作伙伴关系。
Chinese President Xi Jinping signed multiple cooperation deals with his Indonesian counterpart Prabowo Subianto on Saturday, Chinese state TV CCTV reported, as the two countries seek increased partnerships in key areas.

item.title: EU does not want trade war with Beijing, says bloc's ambassador to China
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：欧盟、中国、贸易战争、市场准入、医疗器械
总结: 欧盟驻华大使表示，尽管欧盟并不希望与北京爆发贸易战，但过去五年的谈判并未取得实质性进展。同时，欧盟对于其医疗器械在中国市场的准入问题日益感到担忧。 <div> The EU does not want a trade war with Beijing but five years of talks have yielded no real progress, the bloc's ambassador to China said on Saturday, adding that concern was growing over Chinese market access for European medical devices.

item.title: China summons Philippine ambassador over new maritime laws
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、菲律宾、大使、南中国海、海洋权益

总结: 中国外交部表示，已召见菲律宾大使，对东南亚国家近期通过的两部法律表达反对意见。这两部法律声称菲律宾对于南中国海存在争议的海域拥有海上权利与主权。
China summoned the Philippines' ambassador on Friday to express its objection to two new laws in the Southeast Asian nation asserting maritime rights and sovereignty over disputed areas of the South China Sea, its foreign ministry said.

item.title: Exclusive: Toyota aims to ramp up China production in a strategy pivot, sources say
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Toyota、中国、2030年、250万辆汽车、产销一体化、本土化决策
总结: 丰田计划到2030年在中国实现每年至少生产250万辆汽车的目标，为此将对中国业务进行全面调整，使销售和生产运营更加紧密地结合在一起。此外，丰田还将赋予本地高管更大的决策权，以促进产品的本土化开发。
Toyota aims to make at least 2.5 million vehicles a year in China by 2030, three people said, an overhaul that will see it bring its Chinese sales and production operations closer together and allow local executives a freer hand in development,

item.title: Coach Stajcic relieved after Western Sydney secure first win
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Western Sydney Wanderers, Alen Stajcic, A-League, 第一场胜利, Newcastle Jets 总结: 西悉尼漫步者队教练阿伦·斯泰吉奇表示，他对球队在A联赛赛季中取得首场胜利感到如释重负。周五，他们以4比1战胜纽卡斯尔喷气机队，这场胜利使俱乐部在新赛季初期的排行榜上排名上升。

Western Sydney Wanderers coach Alen Stajcic admitted he was relieved to see his side pick up their first win of the A-League campaign, with Friday's 4-1 victory over the Newcastle Jets moving the club up in the early season standings.

item.title: China consumer prices rise slowest in 4 months, despite stimulus
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、消费者价格、涨幅放缓、生产者价格、通缩加剧、刺激措施、经济支持

总结: 中国10月消费者价格涨势创下四个月以来最低水平，同时生产者价格通缩情况加重。尽管如此，北京方面仍在加大力度推出刺激措施以支撑疲软的经济。
China's consumer prices rose at the slowest pace in four months in October while producer price deflation deepened, data showed on Saturday, even as Beijing doubled down on stimulus to support the sputtering economy.

item.title: China's consumer prices rises slow to 0.3% on year in October
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、消费者价格、上涨放缓、生产者价格、通缩加深、刺激政策、经济支持

总结: 中国10月消费者价格上涨势头减缓，而生产者价格通缩情况加剧。尽管如此，北京方面仍在加大力度实施刺激政策，以支撑其增长乏力的经济体。
China's consumer prices rose more slowly in October, while producer price deflation deepened, even as Beijing doubled down on stimulus policies to prop up its sputtering economy.

item.title: Exclusive: Peru and China to sign strengthened free-trade agreement in Xi's APEC visit
item.content:encoded:
关键词：秘鲁、中国、自由贸易协定、习近平访问、 commerce增长 总结:
秘鲁外长表示，在中国国家主席习近平即将对安第斯国家进行访问期间，两国将签署一项升级版的自由贸易协定。该协议预计会使得双边贸易额至少提高50%。
Peru and China will sign an updated free-trade agreement during President Xi Jinping's upcoming visit to the Andean nation that would boost commerce by at least 50% between the countries, Peru's foreign minister said on Friday.

item.title: Who will Trump pick as regulators? Here are the contenders
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 唐纳德·特朗普, 美国总统选举, 胜利, 内阁选择, 高级别官员任命 总结:
唐纳德·特朗普在美国总统选举中获胜后，已开始着手挑选内阁成员以及其它高级别行政官员的过程。
Donald Trump has begun the process of choosing a cabinet and selecting other high-ranking administration officials following his U.S. presidential election victory.

item.title: Tesla hits $1 trillion market value as Musk-backed Trump win fans optimism
item.content:encoded:
关键词：特斯拉(Tesla)、市值、万亿、美元、埃隆·马斯克(Elon Musk)、唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)、总统选举、支持、优惠政策 总结:
特斯拉的市值在上周五急剧上涨，首次突破1万亿美元大关。市场预期因埃隆·马斯克在总统选举期间对唐纳德·特朗普的大力支持，特斯拉及其公司有望在美国新任总统特朗普治下获得优惠政策。
Tesla's market value closed above the $1 trillion mark in a sharp rally on Friday, on expectations that CEO Elon Musk's companies will get favorable treatment under President-elect Donald Trump for his extensive support during the poll campaign.

item.title: Oil settles down 2% on receding hurricane risk, lackluster China stimulus
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 原油价格、下跌、2%、美国墨西哥湾飓风、中国经济刺激包
总结: 原油价格在周五收盘时下降超过2%，因交易员对美国墨西哥湾飓风导致的长期供应中断担忧减缓。同时，中国推出的最新一轮经济刺激方案未能充分提振部分石油交易商的信心。
Oil prices settled more than 2% lower on Friday as traders grew less fearful of prolonged supply disruptions from a hurricane in the U.S. Gulf of Mexico, while China's latest economic-stimulus packages failed to impress some oil traders.

item.title: Gauff downs Sabalenka to set up Zheng showpiece clash at WTA Finals
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Coco Gauff、Aryna Sabalenka、WTA总决赛、半决赛、Zheng Qinwen 总结:
美国选手高芙（Coco Gauff）在WTA总决赛的半决赛中以7-6(4)、6-3战胜了世界排名第一的萨巴伦卡（Aryna Sabalenka），成功晋级。她将在决赛中对阵中国选手郑钦文（Zheng Qinwen）。
American Coco Gauff defeated world number one Aryna Sabalenka 7-6(4) 6-3 in the semi-finals of the WTA Finals on Friday and will take on China's Zheng Qinwen in the showpiece match.

item.title: McMahon seen as frontrunner to lead Trump's Commerce Department
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Linda McMahon、专业摔跤、Small Business Administration、Donald Trump、Department of Commerce
总结: 美国职业摔跤大亨及前小企业管理局局长琳达·麦克马洪被三位知情人士透露，有望成为唐纳德·特朗普政府商务部部长的热门人选。 <div> Professional wrestling magnate and former Small Business Administration director Linda McMahon is seen as the frontrunner to lead Donald Trump's Department of Commerce, three sources briefed on the plans said on Friday.

item.title: US lawmakers press top chip equipment makers for details on China sales
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国强硬派、国会、半导体设备制造商、KLA、LAM、Applied Materials、东京电子、ASML、销售详情、中国
总结: 美国国会中的中国强硬派正呼吁全球领先的半导体设备制造商，包括KLA、LAM、Applied Materials、东京电子和ASML，提供它们向中国销售的具体细节。 <div> China hardliners in Congress are calling on the world's foremost semiconductor equipment makers - KLA , LAM , Applied Materials , Tokyo Electron and ASML - to provide details of their sales to China.

item.title: WTO head unopposed in bid for second term, but could face opposition from Trump
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala、World Trade Organization、第二任期、挑战者、Donald Trump 总结:
世界贸易组织（WTO）总干事恩戈齐·奥孔乔-伊韦阿拉寻求连任，据两位消息人士称，目前暂无其他候选人提出挑战。然而，随着唐纳德·特朗普有可能重返白宫，这可能意味着奥孔乔-伊韦阿拉的连任仍存在不确定性。
No other candidate has come forward to challenge World Trade Organization head Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala's bid for a second term at the Geneva-based trade body, two sources said, although Donald Trump's return to the White House may mean her reappointment is still not guaranteed.

item.title: IKEA ready for potential tariffs under Trump, CFO says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：IKEA、供应链中断、贸易壁垒、关税、特朗普总统
总结: 已经从近期的供应链中断中吸取教训，并为潜在的贸易壁垒做好了准备。公司正在为Donald Trump总统任期内可能实施的关税措施做准备。这表明全球最大的家具品牌对自己的供应链管理和适应贸易战的能力充满信心。 <div> IKEA has learned from recent supply chain disruptions and is well prepared for potential trade barriers, the owner of the world's biggest furniture brand said on Friday as companies seek to ready themselves for tariffs under Donald Trump's presidency.

item.title: European shares log third week of declines on China, tariff jitters
item.content:encoded:
关键词：STOXX 600、连续第三周下跌、中国刺激措施、特朗普关税政策、经济增长担忧

总结: 欧洲基准指数STOXX 600在周五录得连续第三周下滑，原因包括中国推出的刺激措施不及预期，以及市场对于特朗普总统任期内可能实施的关税政策对全球经济成长带来的负面影响。
Europe's benchmark STOXX 600 logged its third consecutive week of declines on Friday, hurt by underwhelming stimulus measures from China as well as concerns about tariffs under a Trump presidency hurting economic growth.

item.title: CMA CGM's profit jumps on buoyant shipping demand
item.content:encoded:
关键词：CMA CGM、全球需求、第三季利润、美国关税、中国货物运输 总结:
法国船运公司CMA CGM表示，由于强劲的全球需求推动，其第三季度利润实现增长。目前，第四季度正出现从中国大量运输货物的现象。该公司淡化了美国可能实施的关税对贸易构成的风险影响。
Strong global demand pushed up CMA CGM's third-quarter profit while the current quarter was seeing a rush to ship goods from China, the shipping group said on Friday as it played down the risk to trade from possible U.S. tariffs.

item.title: Luxury shoemaker Manolo Blahnik enters China market after 22-year legal tussle
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Manolo Blahnik、高端鞋品牌、中国大陆、22年法律纠纷、首家店铺 总结:
经过22年的法律纠纷，知名高端鞋履品牌Manolo Blahnik终于在中国大陆开设了其第一家专卖店。这个深受名人喜爱并频繁出现在电视剧《欲望都市》中的品牌，将正式进入中国市场开展业务。
Manolo Blahnik, the high-end shoe brand with many celebrity fans and often worn in the TV hit "Sex and the City", has opened its first store in mainland China after a 22-year battle over the legal right to use its name.

item.title: Exclusive: Stellantis, partner Leapmotor scrap plan to make second EV model in Poland, sources say
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Stellantis, 中国伙伴Leapmotor, 波兰工厂, 第二款电动车型, 计划取消 总结:
Stellantis与其中国合作伙伴Leapmotor已决定取消在波兰工厂生产第二款电动车型的计划。据两位知情人士透露，双方已经放弃了这一合作项目。
Stellantis and its Chinese partner Leapmotor have scrapped a plan to make a second electric vehicle model at the European automaker's plant in Poland, two people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.

item.title: Brazilian firms tout U.S. plants, leaning into Trump trade wars
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 巴西、Gerdau、Braskem、美国运营、保护主义、特朗普
总结: 巴西两大工业公司，钢铁制造商Gerdau和塑料生产商Braskem，正在强调它们在美国的庞大业务运营，作为对美国总统当选人特朗普可能采取的保护主义政策风险的一种对冲策略。这两家公司通过在美国的业务布局，试图降低因特朗普政府潜在的贸易保护措施对其造成的影响。 <div> Two of Brazil's biggest industrial firms, steelmaker Gerdau and plastics producer Braskem , are already touting their substantial U.S. operations as a hedge against the risk of protectionism from President-elect Donald Trump.

item.title: Sinochem executives on Pirelli board may be in breach of Italian rules
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Italy, Sinochem, Pirelli, board, autonomy measures
总结: 意大利政府正调查中化集团高管是否违反了罗马为保护轮胎制造商倍耐力(Pirelli)自主权而实施的措施，一位高级官员表示。意大利政府关注的是Sinochem高管在Pirelli董事会中的存在是否与之前为保障Pirelli自治所采取的措施相冲突。 <div> Italy is checking whether the presence of Sinochem executives on Pirelli's board is in breach of measures Rome imposed to protect the tyremaker's autonomy, a senior government official said.

item.title: China's latest stimulus falls short of expectations
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、额外财政缓冲、经济、特朗普总统、失望
总结: 中国并未在周五宣布针对预期中的特朗普连任所准备的额外财政缓冲措施，令投资者感到失望。中国经济正在为可能面临的另一届特朗普政府做好准备，但市场期待的刺激政策并未如期而至。 <div> Investors hoping China would announce extra fiscal buffers for an economy girding for another Donald Trump presidency were disappointed on Friday.

item.title: Morning Bid: Post-election Wall St booms as Fed cuts, China spurs
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Mike Dolan、经济数据、股市动态 总结:
迈克·多兰展望了美国和全球市场的未来走势。当天重点关注美国及全球市场的经济数据发布，这些数据将对股市动态产生影响。投资者将据此调整策略，预期市场可能会因关键指标的变化而出现波动。
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: TSMC to suspend production of advanced AI chips for China from Monday, FT reports
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：台湾半导体制造公司、中国芯片设计公司、暂停生产、先进AI芯片、周五报告
总结: 台湾半导体制造公司（TSMC）据《金融时报》上周五报道，已通知中国的芯片设计企业，从本周一起暂停为他们生产先进的AI芯片。这一决定基于三位知情人士的透露。此举可能会对中国的AI芯片产业产生影响。 <div> Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company has notified Chinese chip design companies that it is suspending production of their advanced AI chips from Monday, Financial Times reported on Friday, citing three people familiar with the matter.

item.title: India's rice inventories hit record high, triples govt target
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度、大米库存、历史最高、2970万吨、出口限制 总结:
印度的大米库存于11月创下历史新高，达到2970万吨，消息人士周五透露，这一数字几乎是政府目标的三倍。过去两年实施的出口限制导致国内供应增加，从而推动了库存激增。
India's rice inventories surged to an all-time high of 29.7 million metric tons in November, sources said on Friday, nearly three times the government's target, as export curbs imposed over the past two years bumped up local supplies.

item.title: Analysts react to China raising local government debt ceilings
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国最高立法机构、债券发行、6万亿元、三年期限、经济刺激
总结: 中国最高立法机构批准了一项法案，允许地方政府在未来三年内发行价值6万亿元人民币（约合8388亿美元）的债券，用于置换资产负债表外或所谓的“隐性”债务。这一举措旨在通过置换地方政府的隐形债务来刺激疲软的经济。 <div> China top legislative body approved a bill on Friday to allow local governments to issue 6 trillion yuan ($838.8 billion) in bonds to swap for off-balance sheet or "hidden" debt over three years, as policymakers sought to spur the sluggish economy.

item.title: Make new friends and boost hiring: How China's chip industry plans to deal with Trump
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国半导体行业、特朗普、美国、芯片制造设备、海外人才、新联盟
总结: 中国半导体行业正准备在唐纳德·特朗普继续担任美国总统的未来四年中应对更具挑战性的环境。为了提升自身实力，中国正在加大购买外国芯片制造设备的力度，并寻求招聘海外专业人才以及建立新的国际合作关系。
China's semiconductor industry is readying itself for four more combative years under Donald Trump as U.S. president by ramping up purchases of foreign chipmaking equipment and looking out for opportunities to hire overseas talent and forge new alliances.

item.title: Taiwan, excluded from climate summit, sets up 'war room' to watch talks
item.content:encoded:
关键词：台湾、战争室、COP29气候峰会、政治原因、环境部长彭振明

总结: 台湾因政治原因无法参加即将于下周举行的COP29气候峰会，其环境部长彭振明表示，台湾已设立了一个“战情室”，用于观看峰会的直播。
Taiwan has set up a "war room" to watch the live stream from next week's COP29 climate summit given it is not allowed to attend for political reasons, Environment Minister Peng Chi-ming said on Friday.

item.title: China steelmakers gird for indirect Trump tariffs hit
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国钢铁业、产能过剩、国内需求疲软、美国候任总统特朗普、60%关税、中国制造、合金商品
总结: 随着中国钢铁行业正在应对产能过剩和国内需求疲软的问题，如果美国候任总统特朗普推行针对中国商品（如使用合金制造的产品）的60%关税政策，中国钢铁业将面临间接打击。 <div> China's steel industry, already struggling with overcapacity and weak domestic demand, faces an indirect hit if U.S. President-elect Donald Trump pursues 60% tariffs on Chinese goods such as manufactured items made from the alloy.

item.title: India's April-Sept steel imports led by China, govt data shows
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度、钢铁进口、中国、净进口、政府数据 总结:
根据路透社周五审查的临时政府数据，从4月至9月期间，印度的钢材进口主要来自中国。在此期间，南亚国家印度仍然是钢铁的净进口国。
India's imports of steel over the period from April to September were led by shipments from China, according to provisional government data reviewed by Reuters on Friday, and the South Asian nation remained a net importer of the alloy.

item.title: Southeast Asia prepares for factories fleeing Trump tariffs on China
item.content:encoded:
关键词：公司、中国、东南亚、关税、特朗普 总结:
随着特朗普赢得选举，预计他将对中国施加高额关税，多家公司将工厂从中国迁往东南亚的趋势正在加速。这一动作得到了该地区工业园区开发商的证实。他们表示，企业早已预料到这种情况，并为此做出了提前布局。
Companies have been moving factories from China to Southeast Asia, anticipating Donald Trump would slap high tariffs on Beijing if he regained the White House, a move set to accelerate with his election win, industrial park developers in the region say.

item.title: China sends vice premier to COP29 climate summit in Baku
item.content:encoded: China's vice premier, Ding Xuexiang, will travel to Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, to attend the COP29 climate summit next week, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Friday.

item.title: China unveils $1.4 trillion local debt package but no direct stimulus
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、10万亿元债务包、地方财政压力缓解、经济增长放缓、特朗普连任美国总统
总结：
中国宣布了一项规模达10万亿元人民币（约1.40万亿美元）的债务计划，旨在缓解地方政府财政压力并稳定正在放缓的经济增速。这一举措出台之际，中国正面临因特朗普再次当选美国总统带来的新的外部压力。 <div> China unveiled a 10 trillion yuan ($1.40 trillion) debt package on Friday to ease local government financing strains and stabilise flagging economic growth, as it faces fresh pressure from the re-election of Donald Trump as U.S. president.

item.title: New green steel firms could reap rewards as EU carbon tariffs loom
item.content:encoded:
关键词：泰国、东部海岸、电动弧炉、绿色钢铁、欧洲、关税、高碳进口 总结:
泰国东部海岸正在规划建设一座电动弧炉，旨在生产绿色钢材供应欧洲市场。这一举措将得益于颇具争议的新规，即买家将被要求对高碳排放的进口产品支付关税。这意味着使用低碳技术生产的绿色钢材将在市场上更具竞争优势。
On Thailand's eastern coast, plans are underway to build an electric arc furnace that will deliver green steel to Europe and benefit from contentious new rules that will force buyers to pay tariffs on high-carbon imports.

item.title: Stellantis to halt production at Mirafiori for another month from end-Nov, report says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Stellantis、Mirafiori工厂、Turin、停产、十二月
总结: 汽车制造商Stellantis将在十二月再次暂停其位于都灵的Mirafiori工厂的汽车生产，这一停产措施将至少持续一个月。此消息来源于MF日报周五的一篇报道，该报道援引了两位知情人士的说法。 <div> Carmaker Stellantis will once again halt car production in December at its Mirafiori plant in Turin, for at least another month, daily MF reported on Friday, citing two sources.

item.title: How a Trump White House could actually help China, Japan markets
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 亚洲、中国、投资市场、唐纳德·特朗普、关税
总结: 随着唐纳德·特朗普重返白宫，亚洲及中国的投资市场展现出令人惊讶的韧性，基金管理人对地区抵御关税的能力持乐观态度，认为相较于欧洲，亚洲能更好地应对这一挑战。 <div> Asia and even China are shaping up as surprisingly resilient investment markets as Donald Trump returns to the White House, with fund managers optimistic the region can withstand tariffs better than Europe.

item.title: No winners in trade wars, says Chinese envoy, as U.S. confrontation looms
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国最高级别外交官、美国、关税贸易战、科技产业战争、特朗普胜选 总结:
中国驻美最高级别外交官认为，在特朗普赢得总统选举后，可能再度出现与中国的激烈对抗。他强调，在关税贸易战、科技及产业战争中并无赢家。
There are no winners in tariff or trade wars, nor in wars over science and technology or industry, said China's top envoy to the United States, as Donald Trump's presidential election win raised the spectre of another bruising confrontation with China.

item.title: Richemont's profit miss, China caution spark luxury stocks drop
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Cartier、Richemont、利润预测、中国、欧洲奢侈品股票 总结:
瑞士奢侈品巨头历峰集团（Richemont）旗下的卡地亚（Cartier）未能实现上半年的利润预期，并于上周五对中国经济复苏持谨慎态度，导致欧洲奢侈股遭遇抛售。这一消息使得市场对中国市场的前景感到担忧，并影响了投资者对整个奢侈品行业的信心。
Cartier owner Richemont missed first half profit forecasts and remained cautious about a recovery in China on Friday, sparking a sell-off in European luxury stocks.

item.title: United Nations warily awaits Donald Trump's return to power
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：United Nations, Donald Trump, 美国资金削减, 世界卫生组织, 第二任期
总结: 联合国正在为可能的唐纳德·特朗普赢得第二任期做准备，预计在他的第二个任期内，美国将再次削减对联合国的资金支持和参与程度。这可能会对世界卫生组织等国际机构的合作与交流带来负面影响。 <div> The United Nations has been planning for the possible return of Donald Trump and the cuts to U.S. funding and engagement with world body that are likely to come with his second term as president.

item.title: Ready or not? How China scrambled to counter the second Trump shock
item.content:encoded:
关键词：唐纳德·特朗普、白宫、关税、激烈言论、贸易战、全球经济、中美关系、多年度低点
总结：八年前，唐纳德·特朗普首次入主白宫后，面对他发起的关税和激烈的言论，中国领导人采取强硬回应，导致了全球最大的两个经济体间的贸易战，使两国关系降至多年来的最低点。
After Donald Trump first stormed the White House eight years ago, rattled Chinese leaders responded to his tariffs and fiery rhetoric with force, resulting in a trade war that plunged ties between the globe's largest economies to multiyear lows.

item.title: Sunscreen-maker Edgewell looks to lock in Chinese chemicals supply ahead of Trump tariff hikes
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Edgewell Personal Care、美国、中国、化学品合同、关税增涨
总结: Edgewell Personal Care公司，一家美国防晒产品制造商，计划与中国的供应商签订新的为期二至三年的化学品采购合同。该公司首席运营官Dan Sullivan在接受路透社采访时表示，此举是因为他们预计一旦当选总统唐纳德·特朗普实施其竞选承诺，将会对来自中国的商品征收“有意义”的关税增涨。 <div> U.S. sunscreen-maker Edgewell Personal Care will look to ink new two- to three-year contracts for chemicals from China as it anticipates "meaningful" tariff hikes if President-elect Donald Trump delivers on his campaign pledge, Chief Operating Officer Dan Sullivan told Reuters on Thursday.

item.title: Morning Bid: 'Risk on' as Powell signals Fed still on easing track
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市动向、经济数据、政策动态、企业财报 总结: 今天在亚洲市场，投资者将关注各地股市动向，特别是主要经济体的股指表现。经济数据方面，预计会有重要的经济指标发布，这些数据可能对市场情绪产生影响。同时，各国的政策动态也是市场的焦点，包括货币政策和财政政策的变化。此外，一批重点企业的财报公布也将成为影响相关股票乃至整体市场走势的关键因素。

请注意，以上内容仅为前瞻性的概括，具体情况需结合实际市场发展进行分析。
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: Putin says China is Russia's ally, backs its stance on Taiwan
item.content:encoded:
关键词：俄罗斯总统普京、中国、盟友、台湾、中俄合作 总结:
俄罗斯总统普京表示，中国是俄罗斯的盟友，并对北京关于台湾的主权主张表示支持。他强调，不断深化的中俄合作关系不会给任何国家带来威胁或恐惧。
Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday described China as Russia's ally and threw his weight behind Beijing's claims over Taiwan, while stating that no countries had anything to fear from deepening Sino-Russian cooperation.

item.title: Putin suggests Russia could hold military drills with North Korea
item.content:encoded: President Vladimir Putin suggested on Thursday that Russia could hold military drills with North Korea.

item.title: Steven Madden to cut sourcing from China on tariff worries under Trump
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Steven Madden、公司、产品采购、中国、Donald Trump、美国总统选举胜利
总结: Steven Madden公司的高管于周四表示，该公司正在迅速调整其产品采购策略，将原本在中国的采购转移至其他国家。这一决策是在Donald Trump赢得美国总统选举之后做出的。 <div> Steven Madden executives said on Thursday the company was working quickly to shift product sourcing out of China to other countries after Donald Trump's U.S. presidential election victory.

item.title: Chinese rover helps find evidence of ancient Martian shoreline
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、Zhurong火星车、科学家、古老海洋、火星
总结: 中国Zhurong火星车帮助科学家收集到新的证据，表明数十亿年前火星上可能存在一片浩渺的海洋，与如今干燥荒芜的现状形成鲜明对比。这一发现进一步揭示了火星过去可能拥有适宜生命存在的环境条件。 <div> With the assistance of China's Zhurong rover, scientists have gathered fresh evidence that Mars was home to an ocean billions of years ago - a far cry from the dry and desolate world it is today.

item.title: China-listed TV maker halts work at Russian factory over payment issues
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Philips、Sharp、Sony、中国制造商、俄罗斯工厂、停止工作、支付问题、外国供应商、备用零件、圣彼得堡。 总结：
一家在中国注册的生产飞利浦、夏普和索尼电视机的制造商宣布，由于其位于圣彼得堡附近的俄罗斯工厂无法解决与国外供应商在备用零件方面的支付问题，已暂停该厂的工作。
A manufacturer of Philips, Sharp and Sony televisions listed in China has halted work at its Russian factory near St Petersburg due to payment problems with foreign suppliers for spare parts, the plant told Reuters on Thursday.

item.title: US banks to gain from looser capital, merger policies under Trump
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 银行业、唐纳德·特朗普、白宫、共和党监管者、资本规则、合并批准 总结:
随着前总统唐纳德·特朗普重返白宫并可能带来倾向于放松监管的共和党监管者，银行业有望获得显著利益。业界专家和分析师指出，预计这些监管者将放宽资本规则，并加速合并批准流程。
The banking industry is expected to win big as former President Donald Trump returns to the White House, ushering in Republican regulators who are expected to ease capital rules and merger approvals, industry experts and analysts said.

item.title: Italy cuts automotive industry support to avoid funding cars made in China
item.content:encoded:
关键词：意大利政府、基金削减、汽车工业支持、中国生产汽车、经济部长 总结:
意大利政府计划削减原先用于支持国内汽车产业的资金，以避免资助在中国制造的汽车。这一决定是由该国经济部长于周四宣布的。
Italy's government plans to cut funds previously set aside to support the country's automotive industry to avoid funding cars made in China, the economy minister said on Thursday.

item.title: Audi unveils new EV brand in China without four ring logo
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Audi、电动车辆品牌、中国、AUDI、年轻顾客
总结: 奥迪周四在中国推出了一款新的电动汽车品牌，该品牌的汽车将仅使用“AUDI”字样作为标识，而不会采用其标志性的四环Logo。此举旨在吸引全球最大的汽车市场——中国的年轻消费者群体。 <div> Audi on Thursday unveiled a new electric vehicle brand in China whose cars will sport just the name AUDI and not its signature four-ring logo, a move aimed at attracting younger customers in the world's largest auto market.

item.title: Germany arrests U.S. citizen suspected of offering military intel to China
item.content:encoded:
关键词：德国、美国公民、涉嫌、向中国泄露、美国军事情报 总结:
德国逮捕了一名涉嫌向中国提供其所为美军驻德部队工作期间获取的美国军事情报的美国公民。据联邦检察官办公室周四发表的声明，该名嫌疑人向中国提供了有关美国军事情报。
Germany has arrested a U.S. citizen suspected of offering intelligence on the U.S. military to China that he had acquired while working for troops stationed in Germany, the federal prosecutor's office said in a statement on Thursday.

item.title: Prolonged Chinese imports may hit Indian steel industry's investments, Tata Steel CEO says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度、中国、钢铁进口、不公平定价、投资计划 总结:
塔塔钢铁公司首席执行官表示，印度从中国的钢铁进口存在“不公平定价”问题，长期大量进口可能会损害国内钢铁行业的投资计划。他向路透社透露，这种状况对印度本土钢铁产业构成了潜在威胁。
India's steel imports from China were "unfairly priced" and prolonged shipments could hurt investment plans of the domestic steel industry, the chief executive of Tata Steel told Reuters on Thursday.

item.title: Exclusive: Unilever, Procter & Gamble face risk from Trump's threatened Mexico tariffs
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Procter & Gamble, Unilever, 美国总统当选人, 唐纳德·特朗普, 关税, 威胁, 墨西哥
总结: 美国总统当选人唐纳德·特朗普威胁要对墨西哥实施关税，据路透社独家获取的数据所示，这将使大型消费品公司如宝洁(Procter & Gamble)和联合利华(Unilever)等面临风险。 <div> Procter & Gamble and Unilever are among big packaged goods companies that would be exposed if U.S. President-elect Donald Trump goes ahead with a threat to impose tariffs on Mexico, data seen exclusively by Reuters shows.

item.title: First Chinese sailor in Vendee Globe aims to inspire future generations
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Vendee Globe、第10届、非法国选手、徐京坤、中国首位、独臂、环球帆船赛
总结： 在即将举行的第10届Vendee Globe环球帆船赛中，将有12位非法国籍船长参赛。其中，徐京坤将成为首位参加这一非stop单人环游世界的中国水手。值得注意的是，他在12岁时就失去了左臂。这场比赛对于徐京坤来说无疑是一次巨大的挑战与突破。 <div> Among the 12 non-French skippers starting the 10th edition of the Vendee Globe on Sunday, Xu Jingkun will be the first Chinese sailor to embark on the non-stop solo around-the-world race, despite losing his left arm at the age of 12.

item.title: Thai PM meets Myanmar junta chief on sidelines of summit in China
item.content:encoded:
关键词：泰国总理Paetongtarn Shinawatra、缅甸军方领导人、中国、区域峰会、罕见海外访问 总结：
泰国总理Paetongtarn Shinawatra在中国举行的一场区域峰会上与缅甸军方领导人会面。这是这位缅甸将军在面临国内持续的内战局势下少有的海外访问。此次会晤标志着双方在国际场合的非正式接触。
Thai Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra met Myanmar's junta chief on the sidelines of a regional summit in China on Thursday, in a rare overseas trip by a general grappling with a civil war at home.

item.title: Morning Bid: Fed and BoE decide as US House awaited, Germany jarred
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Mike Dolan、经济动态、市场预期 总结:
Mike Dolan对即将到来的一天中，美国及全球市场的表现进行了展望。他将关注美国市场的最新经济动态以及全球市场的相互影响，同时分析市场参与者对于未来走势的预期和可能的风险因素。
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: Years after historic summits, Trump faces an emboldened North Korea
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Donald Trump、Kim Jong Un、峰会、朝鲜导弹武库、俄罗斯关系 总结:
特朗普曾强调与金正恩的良好关系，但若他作为总统寻求再次举行美朝峰会，将会发现朝鲜领导人因其扩大的导弹武库和与俄罗斯更为密切的关系而更加自信。这表明朝鲜在核导能力上取得进展，同时在国际外交舞台上可能有更多筹码与美国博弈。
Donald Trump has long touted his relationship with Kim Jong Un, but if the U.S. president-elect seeks another summit he will find a North Korean leader emboldened by an expanded missile arsenal and a much closer relationship with Russia.

item.title: U.S. farm producers brace for hit to exports to China in Trump administration
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 美国农业生产商、贸易战争、特朗普总统、农产品出口、中国关税
总结: 美国农业生产商正在为可能出现的特朗普总统任期内的新一轮对华贸易战争做准备，这可能再次打击美国农产品对中国的出口。虽然新的关税会对他们造成伤害，但他们表示自己比以前更有应对准备。如果新关税实施，将影响美国农产品销往中国市场的状况，但农业生产商认为他们已具备更好的适应和应战能力。 <div> U.S. agriculture producers are bracing for the prospect of a fresh trade war under U.S. President-elect Donald Trump again hitting exports of farm goods to China, but they said while any new tariffs would hurt, they felt better prepared.

item.title: Trump's tariff threat puts US farm exports to China at risk
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国进口、美国农产品、贸易战、关税冲突、特朗普重返总统职位

总结: 专家表示，自从特朗普首个总统任期内爆发的贸易战以来，中国对美国农产品的进口已经放缓。如果特朗普在明年1月重返总统办公室并导致关税敌对行动再次升级，那么美农商品对中国市场的进口可能会遭受进一步打击。
Chinese imports of U.S. farm goods, which have slowed since the trade war during Donald Trump's first presidential term, could be hit again if tariff hostilities resume when he returns to office in January, experts say.

item.title: Philippines confident in US alliance under Trump amid China tensions, envoy says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：菲律宾、美国政策、印太地区、同盟关系、南中国海紧张局势、唐纳德·特朗普 总结:
菲律宾驻美大使表示，尽管存在唐纳德·特朗普的影响，但预计美国对于印太地区的政策以及对菲律宾这一条约盟友的支持在美国国内两党之间存在坚实共识，因此将保持稳定。在此背景下，面对南中国海紧张局势，菲律宾期待美国持续提供支持。
The Philippines expects U.S. policy in the Indo-Pacific and support for its treaty ally amid South China Sea tensions to remain steady under Donald Trump, driven by bipartisan resolve in Washington, its ambassador to the U.S. said on Thursday.

item.title: Nissan plans 9,000 job cuts, slashes annual profit outlook
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Nissan Motor、$2.6 billion、成本节省计划、9,000 job cuts、全球生产产能削减20%
总结: 日产汽车公司周四宣布了一项价值26亿美元的成本节约计划，内容包括裁员9,000人以及在全球范围内削减20%的生产能力。这是该公司应对在中国和美国市场销量下滑所采取的举措。 <div> Nissan Motor announced a $2.6 billion cost saving plan on Thursday, including 9,000 job cuts and a 20% reduction in global production capacity as it battles falling sales in China and the United States.

item.title: UBS pilots blockchain-based payment system
item.content:encoded:
关键词：UBS、区块链、支付系统、跨境交易、UBS Digital Cash 总结：
瑞士银行UBS宣布已成功试点其开发的一种基于区块链技术的支付系统——UBS Digital Cash。该系统旨在提高跨境交易效率，优化跨-border交易流程。
Swiss bank UBS said on Thursday it had successfully piloted a blockchain-based payment system it has developed to improve efficiency of cross-border transactions known as UBS Digital Cash.

item.title: Trump win casts fresh doubts over Wall Street's China strategy
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国金融公司、剥离地方部门、风险最小化、扩张计划暂停、应对策略
总结: 美国金融公司可能会选择剥离其地方部门以降低风险，或者暂时搁置扩张计划。这些举措是为了更好地管理风险并调整业务战略，确保公司在面临不确定性时能保持稳健运营。 <div> US financial firms may hive off local units to minimise risks or pause expansion plans.

item.title: German exports and industrial output fall more than expected
item.content:encoded:
关键词：德国、出口、工业产出、下跌、第四季度 总结:
德国九月的出口和工业产值下降幅度超出预期，显示出作为德国经济模式两大支柱的领域在第四季度之初的疲软态势。
German exports and industrial output fell more than expected in September, showing the weakness of two of the pillars of the German economic model at the start of the fourth quarter.

item.title: Explainer: China-U.S. talks on critical issues under threat as new Trump era looms
item.content:encoded:
关键词：特朗普, 中美关系, 拜登, 习近平, 台湾

总结: 美国总统当选人唐纳德·特朗普即将接手中美关系，该关系在近一年来由拜登和习近平领导的两国政府努力下得到改善。此前，两国关系因新冠疫情和台湾问题而处于紧张状态。中美双方通过努力，成功将双边关系从低谷中拉起，为未来的合作奠定了基础。特朗普将面临如何继续维持并深化这一积极趋势的挑战。
U.S. President-elect Donald Trump inherits a United States-China relationship reset by presidents Joe Biden and Xi Jinping over the last year to lift ties off a diplomatic nadir after COVID-19 and tension over Taiwan.

item.title: India should join China-backed Asian trade bloc, government think tank CEO says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度、加入、区域全面经济伙伴关系（RCEP）、政府智库官员、中国支持、亚洲贸易联盟 总结:
印度一家政府智库的高级官员表示，印度应考虑加入由中国支持的亚洲贸易集团——区域全面经济伙伴关系（RCEP）。此前，印度已经决定退出这一贸易协定。
India should join the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP), a top official at a government think tank said on Thursday, years after the country decided to walk out of the China-backed Asian trade bloc.

item.title: China, Solomon Islands agree to mutual visa-free arrangement
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、所罗门群岛、免签协议、公民、旅行签证要求 总结:
中国与所罗门群岛达成协议，两国公民将被免除对方国家的旅行签证要求。这一决定由中国外交部领事司通过社交媒体平台发布。这意味着双方国民前往对方国家旅游、访问等将更加便捷。
China and the Solomon Islands have agreed to exempt citizens of both countries from travel visa requirements, the Chinese foreign ministry's consular affairs department said in a social media post on Thursday.

item.title: Glovo owner Delivery Hero expects growth at upper end of forecast, posts solid Q3
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Delivery Hero、年度GMV增长、预测范围上限、德国、在线外卖食品公司 总结:
德国在线外卖食品公司Delivery Hero于周四表示，预计其年度总商品价值(GMV)增长率将处于其预测区间的高端。此前，该公司报告了第三季度的强劲增长。
Delivery Hero said on Thursday it expects annual gross merchandise value (GMV) growth at the upper end of its forecast range, after the German online takeaway food company reported solid growth for the third quarter.

item.title: ArcelorMittal tops core profit forecast despite 'unsustainable' China exports
item.content:encoded:
关键词: ArcelorMittal、世界第二大连锁钢铁制造商、第三季度核心利润、市场预期、巴西业务改善、北美和欧洲持续疲软 总结:
全球第二大钢铁生产商ArcelorMittal星期四报告称，其第三季度核心利润超出市场预期。这主要得益于公司巴西业务的改善，但同时，北美洲和欧洲市场的持续疲软部分抵消了这一积极影响。
ArcelorMittal , the world's second-largest steelmaker, on Thursday reported third-quarter core profit above market expectations, as improvement in its Brazil business partly offset continued weakness in North America and Europe.

item.title: MSCI adds five Indian stocks to key index; Nuvama sees $2.5 bln inflows
item.content:encoded:
关键词：MSCI、全球标准指数、印度公司、权重增加、中国差距缩小 总结:
MSCI于周三晚些时候将五家印度公司纳入其全球标准指数，据经纪商Nuvama表示，这一举动将使印度在该指数中的权重提升至20%，进一步缩小了与中国的差距。
MSCI added five Indian companies to its Global Standard Index late on Wednesday, a move that brokerage Nuvama said would lift the country's weightage on the index to 20%, further narrowing the gap with China.

item.title: China pledges support for Myanmar's political transition
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、李强、缅甸、政治和解、2025年选举计划 总结:
中国国务院总理李强与缅甸军方领导人敏昂莱会面，据官方媒体报导，李强表示支持缅甸的政治和解进程以及其2025年的选举计划。
China's Premier Li Qiang expressed support for Myanmar's political reconciliation and 2025 election plans in a meeting with Myanmar junta leader Min Aung Hlaing on Wednesday, according to state media outlets.

item.title: Thailand would benefit from any U.S-China trade war, says minister
item.content:encoded:
关键词：泰国、美国、中国、贸易战争、经济增长 总结:
泰国商业部长披切·纳里普塔潘表示，泰国经济可能会从美中贸易战中受益。他指出，泰国与中美两国都保持着良好关系，在这场争端中无需选边站队。他认为，由于泰国与两国的良好关系，其经济有望在这场贸易冲突中实现增长。
Thailand's economy stands to gain from any U.S.-China trade war, Thai Commerce Minister Pichai Naripthaphan said on Thursday, adding the Southeast Asian country had good relations with both nations and would not need to take sides in a dispute.

item.title: China's exports to Russia grow at quickest pace in 11 months
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、俄罗斯、出口、增长、关系
