总结: 中国海关数据显示，今年10月中国对俄罗斯的出口同比增长了24.4%，为去年11月以来最快增速。这表明北京方面与莫斯科之间的经贸关系保持强劲态势。 <div> China's exports to Russia in October rose 24.4% from a year earlier, the fastest pace since November last year, Chinese customs data showed on Thursday, as Beijing affirmed strong ties with Moscow.

item.title: China congratulates Trump, says it respects America's choice
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：习近平、特朗普、美国总统胜利、美中关系、关税、贸易战争
总结： 中国国家主席习近平向美国当选总统特朗普表示祝贺，并呼吁两国找到正确的相处之道。此时，美国酝酿中的关税措施有可能使双方重蹈几年前的贸易战争覆辙。 <div> China's President Xi Jinping congratulated Donald Trump on his U.S. presidential win and urged both nations to find the "right way to get along", as looming U.S. tariffs threatened to return them to the days of a trade war years ago.

item.title: Canada orders wind up of TikTok's Canadian business, app access to continue
item.content:encoded:
关键词：加拿大、TikTok、国家安全风险、业务关闭、内容创作不受影响
总结： 加拿大政府于周三以存在国家安全风险为由，下令关闭TikTok在该国的业务。但同时澄清，此举并不会阻止加拿大国内用户访问TikTok应用，或限制他们继续创作内容。
Canada on Wednesday ordered the wind up of TikTok's business in the country citing national security risks, but added the government was not blocking Canadians' access to the short-video app or their ability to create content.

item.title: Morning Bid: Bracing for higher US yields, dollar, inflation
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市动向、经济数据、投资者情绪、风险偏好 总结:
随着新的一天开始，关注亚洲市场的投资者将聚焦于各地股市动向。今天的关键经济数据发布可能会影响市场走势，包括中国、日本和韩国等主要经济体的数据表现。投资者情绪将继续受全球宏观经济环境以及国际贸易紧张局势的影响。此外，风险偏好变化也将对区域内金融市场产生重要影响。总体而言，今日亚洲市场的表现将取决于上述因素的综合效应。
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: China's Xi called Trump to congratulate on election victory, CNN reports
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：习近平、特朗普、周三、美国总统选举胜利、CNN报道
总结： 中国国家主席习近平于周三致电唐纳德·特朗普，祝贺其在美国总统选举中获胜。这一消息由CNN引用未透露姓名的消息源进行报道。 <div> Chinese President Xi Jinping called Donald Trump on Wednesday to congratulate the Republican on his U.S. presidential election victory, CNN reported, citing unidentified sources.

item.title: Italy opens procedure against Sinochem over Pirelli possible governance breach
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Pirelli、意大利总理办公室、中国化工集团、可能违规、自治保护措施 总结:
意大利轮胎制造商Pirelli表示，意大利总理办公室已对其最大股东——中国的中国化工集团启动了一项行政程序，原因是后者可能存在违反罗马政府为保护Pirelli自主权而设定的相关规定。
Pirelli said on Wednesday that Italy's Prime Minister's Office opened an administrative procedure against its largest shareholder, China's Sinochem, for a possible breach of provisions Rome imposed to shield the tyremaker's autonomy.

item.title: US suppliers, importers prepare for promised Trump tariffs
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：美国企业、特朗普、关税、中国、墨西哥
总结： 随着总统当选人唐纳德·特朗普承诺将对来自中国和墨西哥等国家的广泛商品征收新的、可能较高的关税，一些美国企业正在启动计划以保护自身商业免受潜在影响。这些企业正针对可能实施的高额关税制定应对策略，以防其业务受到与两大主要贸易伙伴——中国和墨西哥之间贸易关系紧张带来的冲击。 <div> Some U.S. businesses are activating plans to protect their businesses from President-elect Donald Trump's promise to slap new and potentially hefty tariffs on a wide swath of goods from countries including China and Mexico - the top U.S. trading partners.

item.title: For Europe's markets, Trump's return spells euro pain but bond gains
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：欧洲经济、欧元损失、股票、特朗普二任、重税
总结： 随着市场担忧特朗普可能再次赢得总统大选，投资者正在准备应对欧洲可能出现的进一步经济困境。这可能导致欧元汇率下跌以及欧洲股市受到打击，因为特朗普二度执政可能会实施大规模关税政策。 <div> Investors are bracing for further economic pain in Europe that could deepen euro losses and hurt its stocks, as a second Donald Trump presidency raises the prospects of hefty tariffs.

item.title: Trump could harden Iran oil stance but struggle to stem flow to China, analysts say
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Donald Trump、White House、美国油制裁、伊朗、中国 总结:
如果前总统特朗普重返白宫，可能会导致美国对伊朗石油制裁的执行力度加大，进而可能减少全球石油供应。但分析人士指出，他的政府在争取伊朗最大原油购买国——中国方面的合作上可能会面临困难。
Former President Donald Trump's return to the White House could mean tougher enforcement of U.S. oil sanctions against Iran, potentially trimming global supplies, but his administration could struggle to get China, Iran's top crude customer, to cooperate, analysts said.

item.title: Trump's economic plan hinges on tax cuts, tariffs, immigration crackdown
item.content:encoded:
关键词：唐纳德·特朗普、美国、总统选举、关税、移民限制、税削减、经济短期提振、预算赤字、劳动力增长放缓、通胀上升。
总结： 美国总统当选人唐纳德·特朗普计划重新入主白宫后，将实施大规模进口关税、严格的移民限制以及进一步的减税政策。分析师认为，这些举措短期内可能会对经济产生提振作用，但也将导致预算赤字扩大、劳动力增长放缓和通货膨胀率上升等长期问题。
U.S. President-elect Donald Trump will retake the White House with ambitious plans for broad import tariffs, immigration restrictions and additional tax cuts that analysts see delivering a short-term boost to the economy but also larger budget deficits, weaker workforce growth and higher inflation.

item.title: Zheng marches into WTA Finals semis, Rybakina beats Sabalenka
item.content:encoded:
关键词：郑钦文、WTA总决赛、半决赛、意大利、贾斯汀·帕拉尼

总结: 郑钦文在中国网球运动员中取得了重大突破，她在WTA总决赛利雅得站比赛中以压倒性的比分6-1和6-1战胜了意大利第四种子选手贾斯汀·帕拉尼，成功挺进半决赛。
China's Zheng Qinwen reached the semi-finals of the WTA Finals in Riyadh after claiming an impressive 6-1 6-1 win over Italian fourth seed Jasmine Paolini on Wednesday.

item.title: China pledges support for Myanmar's political transition
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、李强、缅甸、政治和解、过渡努力 总结:
中国国务院总理李强与缅甸军方领导人会晤时表示，北京支持缅甸的政治和解及过渡努力。据官方媒体报道，这次会晤中，李强强调了中国对缅甸局势稳定和民族和解进程的支持。
China's Premier Li Qiang expressed Beijing's support for Myanmar's political reconciliation and transition efforts in a meeting with Myanmar's junta leader on Wednesday, state media reported.

item.title: Facing tariff threat, Europe eyes options to appease Trump
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：欧洲联盟、唐纳德·特朗普、美国关税、贸易威胁、中国处理方式
总结: 随着唐纳德·特朗普可能重返白宫，欧洲联盟正在考虑采取措施缓和与美国的关系，预料将面临美国恢复实施关税和其他贸易威胁的情况。同时，欧盟也准备应对来自特朗普政府关于如何对待中国的强硬对话和立场。 <div> The European Union is considering options to appease Donald Trump on his return to the White House as it braces for a resumption of U.S. tariffs and other trade threats plus tough exchanges on how to treat China.

item.title: AstraZeneca's China chief in custody, believes unrelated to insurance probe
item.content:encoded:
关键词：AstraZeneca、中国、Leon Wang、拘留、健康保险欺诈案 总结:
阿斯利康（AstraZeneca）宣布，其中国区总裁王黎明（Leon Wang）被中国当局拘留。虽然公司尚不清楚拘留的具体原因，但表示相信此事与此前涉及公司的大规模健康保险欺诈案件无关。
AstraZeneca said on Wednesday its China president Leon Wang had been detained by Chinese authorities and, although it did not know the reason, it did not believe it was linked to a large health insurance fraud case involving the company.

item.title: Mexico to feel initial blow from Trump victory but has room to negotiate
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：墨西哥、特朗普、回归、美国总统、谈判、贸易、移民、安全
总结: 随着唐纳德·特朗普重新入主白宫，墨西哥需要谨慎应对。然而，墨西哥总统克劳迪娅·希恩鲍姆仍有空间进行谈判，以缓解在贸易、移民和安全方面可能受到的影响。她可以通过积极协商，努力减轻美国政策变化对墨西哥带来的冲击。 <div> Mexico must maneuver carefully now that Donald Trump has secured his return to the U.S. presidency, but Mexico's President Claudia Sheinbaum still has room to negotiate and soften the impact on trade, migration and security.

item.title: Marinos climb Asian Champions League standings with Buriram thrashing
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Yokohama F Marinos, Buriram United, 日本, 泰国, 亚洲冠军联赛精英组
总结: Yokohama F Marinos 在周三的比赛中以 5-0 大胜泰国球队Buriram United，使得日本队伍在亚洲冠军联赛精英组的联赛阶段排名上升至第三名。 <div> Yokohama F Marinos handed 10-man Buriram United from Thailand a 5-0 thrashing on Wednesday as the Japanese side moved up to third in the league phase of the Asian Champions League Elite standings.

item.title: Why Trump tariffs pose a bigger threat to China’s economy this time
item.content:encoded:
关键词：特朗普、美国、中国、进口商品、关税、经济增长风险
总结：新当选的美国总统特朗普威胁要对从中国进口的商品征收60%的关税，这一举动可能会给作为全球第二大经济体的中国带来重大的增长风险。
A threat by Donald Trump, who has been elected as the next U.S. president, to impose 60% tariffs on U.S. imports of Chinese goods poses major growth risks for the world's second-largest economy.

item.title: Barry Callebaut does not see cocoa bean prices returning to 2022/2023 levels
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Barry Callebaut, 巧克力制造商, 可可豆价格, 2022/2023赛季, 不会回升 总结:
瑞士巧克力制造商Barry Callebaut周三表示，预计可可豆价格不会回到2022/2023季度的水平。
Swiss chocolate maker Barry Callebaut on Wednesday said it does not see cocoa bean prices returning to the levels of the 2022/2023 season.

item.title: Kremlin aide says Germany car industry plight shows green transition risks
item.content:encoded:
关键词：俄罗斯、工业、化石燃料、德国汽车制造商、裁员 总结:
克里姆林宫顾问周三表示，如果俄罗斯过快地替换化石燃料，其工业可能会遭受类似德国汽车制造商的经历，即面临大规模裁员的命运。他警告称，在能源转型过程中需要谨慎行事，以避免对本国工业造成严重冲击。
Russian industry may suffer the fate of car makers in Germany, which have shed tens of thousands of jobs, if it moves too fast to replace fossil fuels, a Kremlin adviser said on Wednesday.

item.title: South Korean trade minister sees firms investing more in US if Washington imposes tariffs
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词： South Korea、trade minister、domestic companies、United States、higher tariffs
总结: 韩国贸易部长周三表示，如果下一届美国政府实施更高的关税政策，预计国内企业将增加对美国的投资。 <div> South Korea's trade minister said on Wednesday he saw domestic companies investing more in the United States if the next U.S. administration introduces higher tariffs.

item.title: Musk's ties to Trump will reverberate through Tesla, other interests
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：埃隆·马斯克、亿万富翁、特斯拉CEO、唐纳德·特朗普、美国总统当选人、2024竞选、支持者、利益
总结: 埃隆·马斯克，身为亿万富翁及特斯拉CEO，在2024年美国总统竞选期间成为特朗普的重要支持者。随着特朗普赢得总统选举，马斯克与这位当选总统的紧密联系将为他带来巨大的利益。 <div> Billionaire Elon Musk stands to benefit greatly from his ties with U.S. President-elect Donald Trump after the Tesla CEO became one of Trump's most important supporters during the 2024 campaign.

item.title: Trump presidency lifts Wall St to record high; dollar, Treasury yields surge
item.content:encoded:
关键词：华尔街、纪录高点、股市飙升、比特币、美元跳涨

总结: 周三，华尔街股市创下历史新高，全球主要股票市场也大幅上涨。与此同时，比特币价格触及历史最高点，而美元则因唐纳德·特朗普当选美国总统预计将录得四年来的最大单日涨幅。
Wall Street tore to record highs on Wednesday and major stock markets around the world surged, while bitcoin hit an all-time-high and the dollar was set for its biggest one-day jump in four years after Donald Trump was elected U.S. president.

item.title: What would Trump 2.0 mean for trade, migrants, climate change and electric cars?
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Donald Trump、总统选举胜利、美国贸易政策、气候变化、乌克兰战争、电动汽车、税收、非法移民。

总结： 如果唐纳德·特朗普赢得总统选举，将会对美国产生多方面影响。首先，他将可能重塑美国贸易政策，可能导致更为强硬或保护主义的立场；其次，对于气候变化问题，他的政策可能会降低减排承诺或取消相关法规支持；在乌克兰战争问题上，其外交策略可能存在变化，可能调整对俄罗斯的立场；此外，特朗普可能会对电动汽车产业的支持减少，影响其发展；同时，他的减税政策可能延续，影响美国人的税收负担；最后，针对非法移民问题，他可能会加强边境管控和遣返力度，继续推行强硬措施。
A Donald Trump presidential election victory would have huge implications for U.S. trade policy, climate change, the war in Ukraine, electric vehicles, Americans' taxes and illegal immigration.

item.title: China's markets drop as Trump presidency looms
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国人民币、股市、大幅下跌、特朗普连任前景、美国国会共和党控制、贸易摩擦、科技竞争 总结：
周三，由于市场担忧如果唐纳德·特朗普再次当选美国总统以及共和党控制美国国会，可能会加剧中美之间的贸易和科技紧张关系，中国人民币和股票市场均出现显著下跌。
China's yuan and stock markets fell sharply on Wednesday as the prospect of another Donald Trump presidency and Republican control of U.S. Congress risked heightened tensions over trade and technology.

item.title: Sauber sign Bortoleto to complete driver line-up
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Sauber、Gabriel Bortoleto、巴西车手、Audi、Formula One车队、2025年

总结: Sauber 车队宣布与巴西车手加布里埃尔·博托莱托签约，他将加入未来的奥迪Formula One车队，并在2025年的赛季中完成该车队的车手阵容。
Sauber announced the signing of Brazilian driver Gabriel Bortoleto on Wednesday to complete the future Audi Formula One team's driver line-up for 2025.

item.title: UK orders China-registered firm to sell stake in Scottish chip company
item.content:encoded:
关键词：英国政府、中国注册、Future Technology Devices International Holding Ltd、FTDI、国家安全风险 总结:
英国政府周三下令，要求中国注册的Future Technology Devices International Holding Ltd公司出售其所持有的苏格兰芯片制造商FTDI的80.2%股份，原因是存在国家安全风险。
The British government on Wednesday ordered China-registered Future Technology Devices International Holding Ltd to sell 80.2% of Scotland-based chip company FTDI over national security risks.

item.title: China's Xpeng bets on extended-range hybrid tech to boost sales
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Xpeng、电动车辆制造商、延长续航混合技术、成本竞争力、纯电动汽车

总结: 中国电动车制造商Xpeng于周三发布了其延长续航混合技术。该公司期望通过转向这类更具成本竞争力的产品，相较于纯电动汽车，能提升销量和改善盈利能力。
Xpeng unveiled its extended-range hybrid technology on Wednesday, as the Chinese electric vehicle maker bets on a pivot to such products that are more cost-competitive than pure EVs to boost sales and improve profitability.

item.title: Pandora's 2024 operating profit growth now seen at upper end of guided range
item.content:encoded:
关键词：丹麦、Pandora、全球最大的珠宝制造商、今年运营利润增长预期、上端预测范围、季度运营利润、略低于预期。 总结:
丹麦全球最大珠宝制造商Pandora周三表示，该公司现在预计今年的运营利润增长将位于其预估区间的高端。同时，该公司报告称其季度运营利润稍低于市场预期。
Denmark's Pandora , the world's biggest jewellery maker, said on Wednesday it now expects operating profit growth this year at the upper end of its forecasted range while it reported quarterly operating profit a tad below forecasts.

item.title: BMW profit dives, misses expectations due to weak China sales, brake issues
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：BMW、第三季度利润、下滑、中国销量、刹车问题、全年财务展望
总结: 宝马周三报告称，其第三季度利润下降了61%，逊于分析师预期，原因是中国销量下滑和刹车问题。不过，该公司表示仍有望实现调整后的全年财务展望。 <div> BMW on Wednesday reported a 61% drop in its third-quarter profit that missed analyst expectations because of slumping China sales and brake problems, but said it was on track to meet its adjusted full-year financial outlook.

item.title: Siemens Healthineers meets annual sales view despite China weakness
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Siemens Healthineers、德国、医疗技术公司、营收增长、调整后息税前利润(EBIT)、中国、持续疲软
总结: 德国医疗技术公司西门子健康ineers周三报告称，尽管面临中国市场持续疲软的情况，但其营收增长和全年调整后息税前利润(EBIT)符合市场预期。 <div> German medical technology company Siemens Healthineers reported revenue growth and full-year adjusted earnings before interest and taxes (EBIT) in line with estimates on Wednesday, despite facing continued weakness in China.

item.title: Afghan opium cultivation bounces and shifts two years after ban, UN says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：鸦片生产 塔利班 禁令 上升 联合国报告

总结:
阿富汗作为全球主要鸦片生产国，其罂粟产量在塔利班禁令后的第二年上升了五分之一，但依然远低于禁令前的水平。联合国报告显示，尽管产量有所增加，但仍然只是此前水平的一部分。这一变化反映了禁令对控制鸦片生产的影响。
Opium poppy production in Afghanistan, long the world's dominant supplier of the raw material for heroin, has risen by a fifth in the second full year since the Taliban banned it but remains a fraction of pre-ban levels, a U.N. report said on Wednesday.

item.title: Morning Bid: 'Trump trades' in full swing
item.content:encoded:
关键词：欧洲市场、全球市场、 Wayne Cole、经济前景、风险情绪 总结: 韦恩·科尔展望了当天欧洲和全球市场的走势。他可能会关注经济前景的变化以及市场风险情绪对股市、汇市和其他资产类别的影响。投资者将等待重要的经济数据发布和企业财报，以指导他们的投资决策。同时，全球贸易动态和央行政策走向也可能成为影响市场表现的关键因素。

请注意，以上内容是基于提供的关键词进行推测的总结，并非原文翻译。
A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.

item.title: Taiwan, Britain hold new round of trade talks
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：台湾、英国、贸易谈判、投资、绿色能源
总结: 台湾与英国本周展开新一轮贸易谈判，重点讨论投资和绿色能源议题。双方于去年达成一项协议，台北方面期望借此提升台湾这个科技强国在全球的参与度和影响力。 <div> Taiwan and Britain are holding a new round of trade talks this week focusing on investment and green energy, officials said on Wednesday, after a deal last year that Taipei hopes will boost global engagement of the tech powerhouse.

item.title: Toyota posts first quarterly profit drop in two years, hit by production woes
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Toyota Motor、季度利润下跌、两年来首次、日本、美国、销售下滑、生产问题、汽车制造商、记录中断。

总结: 丰田汽车周三宣布其两年来的首次季度利润下降，原因是其在日本和美国这两个关键市场的销量下滑以及生产问题导致这家日本车企近期创纪录的增长势头受阻。
Toyota Motor posted on Wednesday its first quarterly profit drop in two years as its weaker sales and production issues in two crucial markets - Japan and the U.S. - stalled the Japanese automaker's recent record run.

item.title: China's state secrets leak prompts rare death sentence for ex-employee
item.content:encoded:
关键词：前员工、中国国家机构、死刑、泄露国家秘密、USB驱动器、外国情报机构 总结:
中国国家安全部周三表示，一名曾任职于国内某国家机构的前员工因向外国情报机构泄露“国家秘密”而被罕见地判处死刑。此人被控将他的USB驱动器交给了境外间谍机构。
A former employee working for one of China's state agencies has been given a rare death sentence for leaking "state secrets," the Ministry of State Security said on Wednesday, after he was accused of handing over his USB drive to foreign spy agencies.

item.title: China's export growth likely picked up speed in Oct on better weather, discounts — Reuters poll
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、出口、十月、增长、全球需求下降 总结:
中国十月份的出口增速可能加快，得益于良好的天气条件和大幅折扣。尽管制造商和其他主要出口商报告称全球需求出现下滑，但中国的出货量仍然保持了增长态势。
China's outbound shipments likely rose at a faster pace in October, buoyed by better weather and steep discounts even as manufacturers and other major exporters report a drop off in global demand.

item.title: Russia, China 'emerging axis' troubling, says Australia intelligence chief
item.content:encoded:
关键词：澳大利亚、国家情报办公室、俄罗斯、中国、伊朗、北朝鲜、战略发展、西方国家、赶超困难 总结:
澳大利亚国家情报办公室负责人表示，中国、伊朗和北朝鲜等国对俄罗斯的支持形成了一条“新兴轴心”，这是一个极其令人担忧的战略发展。他指出，西方国家正在努力追赶这一动态变化，但显得力有未逮。
The head of Australia's national intelligence office said an "emerging axis" of countries providing support to Russia, including China, Iran and North Korea, was "a profoundly troubling strategic development" that western countries were struggling to catch up with.

item.title: Japan manufacturers less confident in November on worries over China, inflation: Reuters poll
item.content:encoded:
关键词：日本制造商、信心下滑、商业环境、中国经济放缓、高通胀率 总结:
日本制造商对11月的商业环境信心较10月有所下降，路透社的一项月度调查显示。这一变化的原因在于中国经济发展放缓以及持续高位的通胀率使得企业情绪转淡。
Japanese manufacturers were less confident about business conditions in November than in October, a Reuters monthly poll showed on Wednesday, as China's economic slowdown and a persistently high rate of inflation soured sentiment.

item.title: From Taiwan to trade, China braces for more rivalry as close US presidential race ends
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、总统选举、中国、超级大国竞争、贸易、技术、安全问题 总结:
随着美国进行一场激烈的总统选举，无论选举结果如何，中国都预计将会迎来四年持续紧张的超级大国竞争，特别是在贸易、技术和安全议题方面。这场竞争将会对两国关系产生深远影响。
As Americans voted in one of the tightest presidential elections in decades, China braced for an outcome that - regardless of who wins - would spell four more years of bitter superpower rivalry over trade, technology and security issues.

item.title: AstraZeneca shares fall on report of potential China probe fallout
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：AstraZeneca、股价、最差表现、保险欺诈案、中国高管
总结: 英国制药公司阿斯利康(AstraZeneca)周二股价创下自2020年3月以来的最糟糕表现，原因是据报道，该公司数十名在中国的高级管理人员可能牵涉到中国医药行业近年来最大的一起保险欺诈案件中。 <div> AstraZeneca shares on Tuesday recorded their worst day since March 2020 after a report that dozens of the drugmaker's senior executives in China could be implicated in the largest insurance fraud case in the country's pharma sector in years.

item.title: US needs to crack down on Chinese chipmaker SMIC, Republican lawmaker says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：拜登政府、中国、半导体制造国际公司(SMIC)、芯片制造行业、军事工业复合体 总结:
美国一位资深共和党议员指责拜登政府在阻止中国半导体制造国际公司（SMIC）增强其芯片制造业及军事工业综合体方面做得不够。他认为，此举可能有助于中国提升其在全球芯片产业和国防能力方面的竞争力。
A top Republican lawmaker has accused the Biden administration of not doing enough to prevent China's Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp (SMIC) from strengthening the country's chipmaking industry and military-industrial complex.

item.title: Kobe end Gwangju's perfect start to go top in Asian Champions League
item.content:encoded:
关键词：日本、Vissel Kobe、亚洲冠军联赛精英、J-League冠军、Gwangju FC 总结:
Vissel Kobe在周二的比赛中以2-0战胜Gwangju FC，跃居亚洲冠军联赛东部赛区积分榜首位。这场胜利终结了Gwangju FC在联赛阶段的全胜战绩。作为J-League的冠军队伍，Vissel Kobe展现出了强大的实力。
Japan's Vissel Kobe moved top of the standings in the eastern zone of the Asian Champions League Elite on Tuesday as the J-League champions ended Gwangju FC's perfect start to the league phase with a 2-0 win in Kobe.

item.title: China wants talks on trade measures at COP29 climate summit, document shows
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、COP29联合国气候峰会、碳边境税、贸易限制措施、发展中国家
总结： 中国已要求各国在下周举行的COP29联合国气候峰会上就碳边境税及其他对发展中国家造成不利影响的“贸易限制措施”进行讨论。据路透社看到的一份文件显示，北京对此类措施表示关切。
China has requested that countries hold talks at next week's COP29 U.N. climate summit on carbon border taxes and other "restrictive trade measures" that Beijing says are hurting developing countries, according to a document seen by Reuters.

item.title: India recalls Flipkart antitrust probe report after Xiaomi complaint
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度反垄断机构、沃尔玛、Flipkart、竞争法违规、调查报告

总结: 印度反垄断机构已撤回对电商巨头沃尔玛旗下子公司Flipkart违反竞争法的调查报告，这是继8月份撤销关于苹果公司的类似报告后的第二起此类事件。这份文件显示，该调查报告被召回。
India's antitrust body has recalled its investigation report into competition law breaches by e-commerce giant Walmart's Flipkart, a document shows, the second such move after a report on Apple was revoked in August.

item.title: Shein, Temu gear up for 2026 UK trial over copyright and competition claims
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Shein、Temu、2026年、伦敦高等法院、版权侵权、反竞争行为
总结: Shein和Temu这两个在线快时尚平台将在2026年于伦敦高等法院进行一场审判。双方互相提出针对对方的诉讼，指控彼此存在版权侵权及反竞争行为。 <div> Online fast-fashion platforms Shein and Temu are gearing up for a 2026 trial at London's High Court, with the rivals trading allegations of copyright infringement and anti-competitive behaviour in competing lawsuits.

item.title: Morning Bid: World markets firm as America decides
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Mike Dolan、经济数据、投资者情绪 总结:
本文由Mike Dolan提供了对美国和全球市场未来一天走势的展望。重点关注当天将公布的重要经济数据以及这些数据可能对投资者情绪和市场走势产生的影响。文章可能会分析股票、债券、商品及货币等各类资产类别的表现预期，并就潜在的市场风险和机遇给出见解。
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: China's messy EV dispute with Europe keeps trade tensions in check
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、关税战、欧洲联盟、电动车贸易谈判、外交关系
总结: 随着中国与其他主要出口国之间可能扩大的关税战争的担忧，中国与作为世界第二大经济体的欧盟之间的外交关系依然活跃。尽管关于电动汽车的贸易谈判陷入僵局，双方仍在努力保持沟通，以应对潜在的贸易战风险。 <div> Fears of a widening tariff war between China and other major exporting nations are keeping diplomacy between the world's second-largest economy and the European Union alive, even as trade talks over electric vehicles stall.

item.title: Former Sinopec gas executive gets jail time for taking bribes, Chinese media reports
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中石化、前高管、受贿罪、14年监禁、中国新闻服务社 总结：
中石化一名前高管因受贿罪被判处有期徒刑14年。这一消息由中国半官方新闻机构——中国新闻服务社于周二报道。
A former Sinopec Corp executive was sentenced to 14 years in jail for taking bribes, China's semi-official news agency China News Service reported on Tuesday.

item.title: NATO-type Southeast Asian security group not feasible, Philippines minister says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：东南亚、安全集团、北约、菲律宾国防部长、利益分歧、联盟差异
总结: 菲律宾国防部长表示，由于东南亚地区各国利益相异和同盟关系的不同，目前难以建立类似北约的安全集团。 <div> A security grouping in Southeast Asia similar to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) is not possible at present given diverging interests and alliances in the region, the Philippines' Defense Secretary said on Tuesday.

item.title: Schroders hit by big ticket client exits, shares slide
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Schroders、第三季度、净流出、大额客户委托、股价下跌、新任CEO Richard Oldfield
总结: 英国投资管理公司施罗德斯（Schroders）于周二宣布，其第三季度的净流出情况比预期更为严重，并将面临更多重要客户委托的流失。这一悲观的消息导致公司股价大幅下挫，而这一切都发生在新任首席执行官Richard Oldfield即将上任的前几天。 <div> Schroders reported worse-than-expected third quarter outflows and the imminent loss of further big-ticket client mandates on Tuesday, in a gloomy update that sent shares tumbling days before new CEO Richard Oldfield steps into his role.

item.title: China warns young soldiers against online dating, gambling
item.content:encoded:
关键词：军事人员、身份、暴露、网络、海军 总结:
海军强调，军事人员的身份不得在网上被曝光。他们要求确保军队人员的个人信息安全，防范潜在的网络安全风险和情报泄露问题。
The identity of military personnel must not be exposed online, the navy said.

item.title: China's latest cry for more babies may fall on deaf ears
item.content:encoded:
关键词：政策、法国、瑞典、东亚、性别不平等 总结: 政策在法国和瑞典等国家取得了一定成效，但在东亚地区并未产生明显影响。人口学家认为，这可能是由于东亚地区存在较高的性别不平等问题所致。

Policies like those laid out last week have been helpful in countries such as France and Sweden, but they have not moved the needle in east Asia, most likely due to high gender inequality, according to demographers.

item.title: Q3 earnings half-time in Europe: Investors reward beats but fret about China
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 欧洲、第三季收益、市场预期、投资者奖励、中国需求疲软 总结:
欧洲公司在第三季的收益大多超出了市场较低的预期，投资者对超出预期的表现给予了比近年来更为慷慨的回报。然而，尽管如此，对中国需求减弱的情况仍然引起了谨慎的关注。
Europe's third-quarter earnings have mostly topped markets' low expectations and investors are rewarding beats more handsomely than they have in years, even though weak China demand is a cause for caution.

item.title: Shooting in Pakistan's Karachi injures two Chinese nationals
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国公民、巴基斯坦、卡拉奇、枪击、受伤 总结:
两名中国公民于周二在巴基斯坦商业中心卡拉奇遭枪击受伤。这一事件发生在一系列针对中国人的袭击之后，这些袭击引发了北京方面要求对本国公民采取更严厉的安全保障措施。
Two Chinese nationals were shot at and injured on Tuesday in Pakistan's commercial hub of Karachi, police and hospital officials said, after a string of attacks that spurred Beijing to demand tougher security for its citizens.

item.title: Trump warns, if elected, he'll impose tariffs on Mexico, China over fentanyl
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Donald Trump、共和党总统候选人、关税、墨西哥、中国、芬太尼、美国 总结:
共和党总统候选人特朗普警告称，如果当选，他将对墨西哥和中国实施关税惩罚，除非两国政府采取措施阻止芬太尼流入美国。
Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump warned on Monday that, if elected, he would punish Mexico and China with tariffs unless both governments moved to stop the flow of fentanyl into the United States.

item.title: China must open up further to combat rising unilateralism, premier says
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中国、自由贸易区、投资协议、开放政策、单边主义 总结:
中国总理李强表示，中国将提升自由贸易区水平，并探索与其他国家的投资协议。他认为，面对全球日益增长的单边主义倾向，扩大开放是“必由之路”。此举显示了中国持续推动贸易自由化和经济全球化，通过深化国际合作来应对单边主义挑战的决心。
China will upgrade its free trade zones and explore investment agreements with other countries, Chinese Premier Li Qiang said on Tuesday, adding that opening up was a "must" to combat rising unilateralism globally.

item.title: China gives Morgan Stanley approval to launch local futures unit
item.content:encoded:
关键词：摩根士丹利、中国、期货业务、新设立单位、美国第二大市场进入者 总结:
摩根士丹利已获得最终批准，将通过新成立的子公司在中国开展期货业务，成为继第二家大型美国公司之后，进军这个世界第二大经济体衍生品市场的参与者。
Morgan Stanley has won final approval to launch a futures business in China via a newly established unit, becoming the second major U.S. entrant in the derivatives market of the world's second-largest economy.

item.title: China's services activity picks up as conditions improve, Caixin PMI shows
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、服务业活动、最快扩张速度、三个月、北京刺激政策
总结： 中国的服务业活动在10月份以三个月来最快的增速扩张，私营部门调查显示，这得益于北京大规模刺激政策带来的早期迹象，表明该政策正在有助于改善商业环境。 <div> China's services activity expanded at the fastest pace in three months in October, helped by early signs that Beijing's big stimulus push was helping improve business conditions, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday.

item.title: Chinese company bullish on Cuban solar drive, executive says
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Hangzhou Duojia Technology, Cuba, solar technology, China, manufacturing, Cuba solar generation plan, win for both countries

总结: 杭州多佳科技公司向古巴提供太阳能技术，并称赞古巴大幅提高太阳能发电的计划对两国都是双赢。该公司强调了中国在制造业的实力以及古巴阳光充足的气候条件对于实现这一计划的重要性。
Hangzhou Duojia Technology, which distributes solar technology to Cuba, called a Cuban plan to dramatically boost solar generation a win for both countries, touting China's manufacturing heft and the island's sunny climate.

item.title: Morning Bid: Eerie pre-US election calm, RBA sets rates
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市动向、经济数据、政策动态、企业业绩 总结: 随着新的一天开始，亚洲市场的焦点将落在各地股市的动向上。投资者会密切关注各国即将公布的重要经济数据，包括但不限于贸易收支、GDP和通胀率等，这些数据可能对市场情绪产生重大影响。此外，央行的政策动态也将成为市场关注的重点，任何有关利率调整或货币政策变化的消息都可能引发市场波动。同时，企业的季度业绩报告也将陆续出炉，良好的业绩表现有望提振相关公司股价，反之则可能导致股价承压。因此，整体而言，今日亚洲市场的走势将由上述多重因素共同决定。

A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: Mitrovic helps Al-Hilal stay perfect in Champions League but Neymar injured
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Al-Hilal, Aleksandar Mitrovic, Asian Champions League Elite, Esteghlal, Neymar 总结:
在周一进行的亚洲冠军联赛精英赛中，阿尔希拉尔队的亚历山大·米特罗维奇上演帽子戏法，帮助球队以3-0完胜伊朗的埃斯特格拉尔队，继续保持本赛季亚洲冠军联赛的全胜战绩。然而，沙特球队的夜晚因内马尔在比赛后期受伤而蒙上阴影。
Al-Hilal's Aleksandar Mitrovic got a hat-trick as they continued their perfect start to the Asian Champions League Elite on Monday with a 3-0 win over Iran's Esteghlal, although the Saudi side's evening was soured by a late injury to Neymar.

item.title: Shein's European entity reports 68% sales growth in 2023
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Shein、Ireland-registered entity、Infinite Styles Ecommerce Co、增长68%、销售额7.684亿欧元

总结： Shein旗下注册于爱尔兰的实体公司Infinite Styles Ecommerce Co在2023年的销售额实现了68%的增长，达到7.684亿欧元（合83.6亿美元）。这一数据来自于周一公布的年度业绩报告。
Sales by Shein's Ireland-registered entity Infinite Styles Ecommerce Co grew 68% in 2023, hitting 7.684 billion euros ($8.36 billion), according to annual results published on Monday.

item.title: US accuses Russia, China of shielding North Korea at UN
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、俄罗斯、中国、联合国安全理事会、朝鲜、违反制裁、核力量 总结:
美国在联合国安理会指责俄罗斯和中国“可耻地袒护”并壮胆朝鲜，导致平壤方面进一步违反联合国制裁决议。同时，朝鲜誓言将加速建设其“核力量”。
The United States on Monday called out Russia and China at the United Nations Security Council for "shamelessly protecting" and emboldening North Korea to further violate U.N. sanctions as Pyongyang pledged to accelerate building up its "nuclear force."

item.title: Top seed Sabalenka reaches semis at WTA Finals with win over Paolini
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Aryna Sabalenka、WTA总决赛、半决赛、Jasmine Paolini、意大利第四种子 总结：
世界排名第一的阿琳娜·萨巴伦卡在周一的比赛中以6-3、7-5战胜意大利第四种子贾斯敏·帕奥莉尼，成功晋级WTA总决赛半决赛。在这场紫色小组的对决中，萨巴伦卡保持不败战绩。
World number one Aryna Sabalenka secured a semi-final berth at the WTA Finals by beating Italian fourth seed Jasmine Paolini 6-3 7-5 on Monday to stay unbeaten in the purple round-robin group.

item.title: UK lawmakers could question Shein over workers' rights early next year
item.content:encoded:
关键词：英国议员、Shein、线上快时尚集团、工人权益、伦敦上市

总结: 英国议会议员可能将于一月份最早开始质询在线快时尚集团Shein的高管，关注其工人的权益问题。这一举动发生在Shein可能进行伦敦上市之前。据议会委员会主席表示，此事已提上日程。
British lawmakers could question executives of online fast-fashion group Shein on workers' rights as early as January, ahead of a possible London listing, according to the head of a parliamentary committee.

item.title: China EV price deal needs be as effective as tariffs, says EU official
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国生产商、最低价格、电动车辆、欧盟关税、未来欧洲联盟贸易首席
总结: 未来可能成为欧洲联盟贸易主管的人士周一表示，与中方就电动汽车的最低价格达成的任何协议，都需像上周实施的欧盟关税那样具有同等效力和执行力。这表明欧盟在与中国生产商的谈判中将寻求确保相关协议能够得到有效执行和遵守。 <div> Any agreement reached with Chinese producers on minimum prices for electric vehicles would need to be as effective and enforceable as the EU tariffs that were imposed last week, the likely future European Union trade chief said on Monday.

item.title: Marriott trims 2024 profit forecast on sluggish China domestic travel demand
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Marriott International、年度利润预测、中国国内旅行、国际需求、股价下跌
总结: 万豪国际集团于周一宣布下调其全年利润预期，原因是中国国内旅游市场的疲软表现盖过了强劲的团体和国际需求增长的影响，导致公司股票在上午晚些时候交易中下挫2%。 <div> Marriott International cut its annual profit forecast on Monday as weak domestic travel in China overshadowed strong group and international demand, sending its shares down 2% in late morning trading.

item.title: Trump's tariffs would reorder trade flows, raise costs, draw retaliation
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 农业团体、出口市场、巴西、阿根廷、损失
总结: 农业团体担心会因巴西和阿根廷的竞争而丧失出口市场份额。这两个南美国家在农产品领域具有较强竞争力，可能挤压到其他国家的出口空间。因此，农业团体对可能出现的市场流失表示关切。 <div> Farm groups fear export market losses to Brazil and Argentina.

item.title: China's Sinopec signs agreement for 15-yr LNG deal with TotalEnergies
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Sinopec Corp、TotalEnergies、液化天然气、购买协议、年供应量200万吨、15年期、2028年开始 总结：
中国石化集团（Sinopec Corp）周一宣布，已与TotalEnergies签署谅解备忘录，计划从2028年开始，每年购买总计两百万吨液化天然气，供应期长达十五年。
China's state oil and gas major Sinopec Corp said on Monday it has signed Heads of Agreement to buy from TotalEnergies two million metric tons of liquefied natural gas a year for 15 yrs starting 2028.

item.title: China to file lawsuit with WTO against EU's final EV ruling, commerce ministry says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国商务部、WTO、欧盟、电动车辆、反补贴措施 总结:
中国商务部宣布，针对欧盟对中国制造的电动汽车实施的最终反补贴措施，已决定向世贸组织（WTO）提起诉讼。
China's commerce ministry said on Monday that it has decided to file a lawsuit with the WTO against the EU's final countervailing measures on China-made electric vehicles.

item.title: Tesla's Oct China-made EV sales fall 5.3% y/y
item.content:encoded:
关键词：特斯拉、中国、电动车销量、十月、下滑 总结:
特斯拉十月份在中国制造并销售了68,280辆电动车辆，相比去年同期下降了5.3%，这一数据来源于中国汽车流通协会（CPCA）周一发布的报告。
U.S. automaker Tesla sold 68,280 China-made electric vehicles in October, down 5.3% from a year earlier, data from the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) showed on Monday.

item.title: Malaysia complains to Vietnam over South China Sea reef expansion, sources say
item.content:encoded:
关键词：马来西亚、越南、南中国海、礁石、领土争端 总结:
马来西亚向越南发出抗议信，指责越南涉嫌扩大双方共同声索的南中国海礁石区域，两名官员向路透社透露。这是不涉及中国的罕见双边争端升级事件。
Malaysia has sent a complaint letter to Vietnam over its alleged expansion of a South China Sea reef that both countries claim as their own, two officials told Reuters, in a rare bilateral escalation not involving China.

item.title: Volvo Cars October sales rise 3% year-on-year
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Volvo Cars、销量、同比增长、电动车、插电式混合动力车型
总结: Volvo Cars公司周一表示，其十月份汽车销量同比增长3%，达到61,686辆，增长主要由欧洲市场全电动汽车和插电式混合动力车型销售增加所驱动。 <div> Volvo Cars' sales rose 3% year-on-year in October to 61,686 cars driven primarily by an increase in sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid models in Europe, the Sweden-based automaker said on Monday.

item.title: French families sue TikTok over alleged failure to remove harmful content
item.content:encoded:
关键词：法国、家庭、起诉、TikTok、有害内容、青少年自杀 总结:
七个法国家庭因指控社交媒体平台TikTok将其未成年子女暴露于有害内容中，导致其中两名15岁少年自杀，已对该公司提起诉讼。他们的律师在周一宣布了这一消息。这些家庭认为TikTok应对此承担责任。
Seven French families have filed a lawsuit against social media giant TikTok, accusing the platform of exposing their adolescent children to harmful content that led to two of them taking their own lives at 15, their lawyer said on Monday.

item.title: Myanmar junta chief to make first China visit since seizing power
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 缅甸军方领导人、敏昂莱、中国、地区峰会、访问 总结:
缅甸军方领导人敏昂莱将于本周前往中国，参加地区峰会。这是他自2021年发动政变掌权以来首次访问这个具有影响力的邻国。
Myanmar junta leader Min Aung Hlaing will travel to China this week to attend regional summits, state media said on Monday, in the embattled top general's first visit to the influential neighbouring nation since he seized power in a 2021 coup.

item.title: China's Nio plans to sell its first hybrid car overseas only, sources say
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Nio、混合动力车型、2026年、海外市场、欧洲、中东、北非

总结: 中国电动汽车制造商蔚来计划于2026年推出其首款混合动力车型，并将仅在海外市场销售，包括中东、北非以及欧洲等地。据两位知情人士透露，此举标志着蔚来将继续扩大其全球市场布局和产品线。
Chinese electric vehicle maker Nio is planning to launch its first hybrid model in 2026 and will only sell it in overseas markets, including the Middle East, North Africa and Europe, according to two people with knowledge of the matter.

item.title: China urges palatable EV trade solution from EU as France defends bloc
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、法国、欧洲委员会、电动汽车产业、关税

总结: 中国呼吁法国推动欧盟委员会找到一个同时符合中欧电动车产业利益的解决方案。然而，法国表示，欧盟将在关键问题上坚持立场，力求推翻针对品牌的关税。
China has urged France to push the European Commission towards a solution acceptable to both the European and Chinese electric vehicle industries, while France said the bloc would not yield on key matters as it pushes to overturn a tariff on brandy.

item.title: Chinese solar firms go where US tariffs don't reach
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国、越南、太阳能工厂、减产、裁员、老挝、印尼、新建工厂
总结: 由于一些中国在越南的太阳能工厂正面临减产和裁员的情况，同时新的太阳能工厂开始在老挝和印尼涌现。这表明全球太阳能产业的布局正在发生变化，中国企业在东南亚的投资转移可能正加速进行，寻求更低成本和市场机遇的新生产基地。 <div> Some Chinese-owned solar factories in Vietnam are cutting production and laying off workers, while new plants are popping up in Laos and Indonesia.

item.title: Taiwan reports rise in Chinese military activity as US election nears
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 台湾防务部门、中国军机、解放军空军、台湾南部、太平洋军演
总结: 台湾防务部门表示，周日侦测到有35架中国大陆军机，包括战斗机和轰炸机，飞越台湾南部海域前往太平洋进行军事演习，这已是连续第二天出现此类活动。这些军机的行动显示了解放军空军在该区域的频繁活动以及对台湾周边海空域的持续关注。 <div> Taiwan's defence ministry said on Sunday it had spotted 35 Chinese military aircraft, including fighters and bombers, flying to the island's south on the way to exercises in the Pacific, a second day in a row it has reported such activities.

item.title: China's BYD boosts production and hiring amid Q3 growth
item.content:encoded:
关键词: BYD、电动车辆、产量增加、新员工招聘、生产规模扩大

总结: BYD执行副总裁何志奇在周六的微博上表示，从8月到10月期间，中国电动汽车巨头BYD大幅提高了产量，增加了近20万辆电动汽车的产量。同时，公司在汽车制造和零部件领域雇佣了近20万新员工，显示出其生产规模正在迅速扩大。
China's electric vehicle giant BYD , ramped up production by nearly 200,000 units from August to October, while hiring close to 200,000 new employees in car manufacturing and components, Executive Vice President He Zhiqi said on Weibo on Saturday.

item.title: Marriage registrations in China drop for the first nine months of 2024
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、人口措施、婚姻登记下降、官方数据、民政部
总结: 今年前三季度，中国针对低迷的人口水平推出一系列扶持措施后，据民政部发布的官方数据显示，全国结婚登记数量出现下降。这表明尽管政府采取了相关鼓励政策，但婚姻与生育形势依然严峻。 <div> China, which has been releasing a slew of measures to bolster its sagging population levels, recorded a drop in marriage registrations for the first nine months of 2024, according to official data from Ministry of Civil Affairs.

item.title: China's Premier Li Qiang to speak at import expo in Shanghai
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、李强、总理、中国国际进口博览会、商务部、中国经济、对外开放
总结: 中国商务部周日宣布，国务院总理李强将在本周举行的中国国际进口博览会上发表讲话。此举旨在展示尽管经济面临挑战，但中国市场依然开放并欢迎外资进入。这表明中国政府持续致力于推动对外贸易和经济合作。
China's Premier Li Qiang will deliver remarks at the opening ceremony of this week's China International Import Expo, the Chinese commerce ministry said on Sunday, as Beijing seeks to show the faltering economy is open for business.

item.title: Corica wants consistency after newcomers Auckland maintain perfect A-League start
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Auckland FC、Steve Corica、A-League、新秀赛季、三连胜 总结:
Auckland FC的新任教练Steve Corica希望球队能够在其惊艳的新人赛季初期表现后，继续保持势头。在周六的比赛中，他带领球队以2-0战胜Wellington Phoenix，取得了俱乐部在其首个赛季的第三场连胜。
Auckland FC coach Steve Corica wants the A-League newcomers to focus on maintaining their impressive early season form after guiding his side to a 2-0 victory over Wellington Phoenix on Saturday, the club's third win in a row in their debut campaign.

item.title: U.S. finalizes rule to review more foreign land deals near military bases
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：拜登政府、周五、新规则、外国购买、军事基地、国家安全威胁
总结: 拜登政府于上周五最终确定了一项新规定，该规定扩大了其对于外国在美军基地附近购买房地产进行国家安全威胁审查的权限。这项新规旨在加强对美国军事设施周边不动产交易的监管，以防范潜在的国家安全风险。 <div> The Biden administration on Friday finalized a new rule expanding its authority to review foreign purchases of real estate near U.S. military bases for national security threats.

item.title: South Korea minister says all scenarios under consideration for aiding Ukraine
item.content:encoded:
关键词：南韩、外交部长、Cho Tae-yul、乌克兰、武器输送、北韩、援助俄罗斯 总结:
韩国外长Cho Tae-yul于周五被问及是否可能因朝鲜支持俄罗斯而向乌克兰提供更多武器时表示，首尔正在考虑所有可能的情形。
South Korean Foreign Minister Cho Tae-yul, asked on Friday whether Seoul could send more weapons to Ukraine in response to North Korea's aiding Russia, said all possible scenarios were under consideration.

item.title: US fines GlobalFoundries for shipping chips to sanctioned Chinese firm
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 美国、GlobalFoundries、罚款、芯片、SMIC
总结: 美国政府于上周五宣布，对总部位于纽约的全球第三大合约芯片制造商GlobalFoundries施以50万美元的罚款，原因是该公司未经许可向中国芯片制造商SMIC的一家关联企业出口了芯片。SMIC此前已被美国列入黑名单。 <div> The U.S. said on Friday it imposed a $500,000 penalty on New York-based GlobalFoundries , the world's third-largest contract chipmaker, for shipping chips without authorization to an affiliate of blacklisted Chinese chipmaker SMIC.

item.title: Venezuela's oil exports hit a 4-year peak on higher output, sales to US, India
item.content:encoded:
关键词：委内瑞拉、石油出口、四年高点、95万桶/日、印度、美国、原油产量、销售增长

总结： 委内瑞拉的石油出口在十月份达到了近四年来的新高，每日接近95万桶。这一增长得益于其原油产量的增加以及向印度和美国等市场的销售量提升，根据航运数据和国有石油公司PDVSA的文件显示。
Venezuela's oil exports rose to a four-year high, approaching 950,000 barrels per day in October, boosted by growing crude output and more sales to India and the United States, according to shipping data and documents from state firm PDVSA.

item.title: Sabalenka aims to deny Swiatek at WTA Finals, end year as number one
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Aryna Sabalenka、year-end world number one ranking、Iga Swiatek、WTA Finals、Saudi Arabia

总结： 白俄罗斯选手阿瑞娜·萨巴伦卡有机会通过在沙特阿拉伯举行的WTA年终总决赛上的优异表现，锁定年终世界排名第一的位置。而波兰球员伊加·斯维亚泰克则将寻求在本次赛事中实现反超，重夺世界第一的宝座。两位顶尖选手将于周六在WTA总决赛中心球场展开激烈对决。
Aryna Sabalenka can finish a spectacular season by securing the year-end world number one ranking, while Iga Swiatek will eye a late surge to reclaim top spot as the duo take centre stage at the WTA Finals in Saudi Arabia from Saturday.

item.title: China expands visa-free policy to 9 more countries including South Korea
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中国、签证免费入境、九个国家、南韩、挪威、芬兰、外国事务部、周五宣布

总结: 中国外交部于上周五宣布，将对来自包括南韩、挪威和芬兰在内的九个新增国家的公民实施免签入境政策。
China will extend visa-free entry to citizens from nine additional countries, including South Korea, Norway and Finland, the foreign ministry said on Friday.

item.title: China confirms EU delegation visit for EV tariff talks
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国商务部、欧盟、代表、电动车关税纠纷、谈判

总结：中国商务部于上周五证实，欧盟将派出代表前往中国就电动车辆关税争端进行价格承诺谈判。
China's commerce ministry on Friday confirmed that the European Union will send representatives to the country for negotiations regarding price commitments in the electric vehicle tariff dispute.

item.title: US envoy sees some 'concerning signals' in Russia-China military cooperation in Arctic
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、俄罗斯、中国、北极、军事合作 总结:
美国正密切关注俄罗斯和中国在北极地区的日益增强的合作关系，特别是他们近期在该区域进行的一些军事协作行动，这引发了美国的“担忧信号”。美国驻北极大使表示，这一系列动态表明两国在北极的战略互动正在引起美方的高度关注。
The United States is watching growing cooperation between Russia and China in the Arctic closely and some of their recent military collaboration in the region sends "concerning signals", the U.S. Arctic ambassador said.

item.title: China, Slovakia forge closer ties amid EU trade disputes
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、斯洛伐克、贸易投资、乌克兰和平、战略伙伴关系 总结:
斯洛伐克总理罗伯特·菲科访问北京期间，中斯两国表示将加强贸易和投资联系，并就维护乌克兰和平的必要性达成共识。此次访问是为了启动双方新的战略伙伴关系。
China and Slovakia said on Friday they would boost trade and investment ties and spoke of the need for peace in Ukraine during a visit to Beijing by Prime Minister Robert Fico to launch a new strategic partnership.

item.title: Amazon calms the horses, payrolls due
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国市场、全球市场、Mike Dolan、经济数据、投资者情绪 总结:
迈克·多兰展望了美国和全球市场的未来走势，重点关注当天即将公布的经济数据及其对投资者情绪的影响。预计市场动态将受制于这些关键数据的表现以及全球贸易局势和央行政策的最新进展。
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

item.title: China hopes US will continue climate change collaboration whoever wins election, official says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国、美国、气候变改、总统选举、政府官员
总结: 中国一位高级政府官员表示，无论下周美国总统选举结果如何，中国希望美国能够继续与其他国家在气候变化问题上展开合作。 <div> China hopes the United States will be able to continue to cooperate with other countries on climate change, whatever the outcome of the presidential election next week, a senior government official said on Friday.

item.title: Markets start big month on cautious footing as US jobs data looms
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 市场、波动性、美国就业数据、英国政府债券、四月月初 总结:
随着四月份可能成为重大转折点的开始，市场谨慎开盘，股价保持稳定，美国国债收益率接近四个月高位。市场紧张气氛加剧，一方面等待即将公布的美国就业数据，另一方面则是由于本周英国预算案引发的英国政府债券波动性增加。
Markets started what could be a momentous month warily, with shares steady and Treasury yields near four-month highs ahead of U.S. jobs data, with volatility in British government bonds after this week's budget adding to the sense of nervousness.

item.title: China's sanction-hit tech industry puzzles over impact of Trump, Harris presidencies
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Donald Trump, U.S. presidency, Chinese technology firms, Kamala Harris, sanctions
总结: 如果唐纳德·特朗普下周赢得美国总统选举，相较于卡玛拉·哈里斯获胜，这将给中国科技企业带来更大的不确定性。企业高管表示，他的不可预测性可能导致对受制裁行业既有缓解措施也有更严格的限制。而相比之下，哈里斯当选可能会带来更为清晰和强硬的政策预期，从而使得中国科技公司面临更加明确的挑战方向。 <div> Donald Trump winning the U.S. presidency next week would muddle the outlook for Chinese technology firms far more than a win for Kamala Harris, with executives saying his unpredictable style could lead as much to a reprieve for the sanction-hit industry as increased restrictions.

item.title: China new home prices grow slightly faster in Oct, private survey shows
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、新建住宅价格、上涨速度、十月、私人调查、支持措施、危机打击市场
总结: 根据周五的一项私人调查显示，中国新建住宅价格在传统购房旺季的十月份上涨速度加快，这表明近期针对危机打击市场的支持措施可能已产生了一些初步效果。 <div> Prices of new homes in China rose at a faster pace in October, traditionally a peak season for house hunting, a private survey showed on Friday, suggesting that recent support measures could be having some early impact in a crisis-hit market.

item.title: Asia Gold Festivities trigger buying spree in India, but volumes lag
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Gold demand, India, Festival purchases, Record-high prices, Volumes

总结: 本周，印度的黄金需求因节日购买而上升，但成交量低于正常水平，原因是金价创下历史新高。
Gold demand in India jumped this week amid festival purchases, although volumes were lower than usual due to record-high prices.

item.title: Taiwan cleans up as remnant of Typhoon Kong-rey brushes Chinese coast
item.content:encoded:
关键词：台湾、Typhoon Kong-rey、两死亡、交通混乱、中国海岸 总结:
台风“康妮”肆虐后，台湾于周五清理完毕并重新开放办公及金融市场。该台风导致了两名人员死亡并使当地交通陷入混乱。随着风暴残余势力扫过中国沿海地区，台湾已逐步恢复正常秩序。
Taiwan cleared up and offices and financial markets re-opened on Friday after the powerful Typhoon Kong-rey swept through the island causing two deaths and snarling transport, as the remnant of the storm brushed the Chinese coast.

item.title: Morning Bid: A November to remember...
item.content:encoded:
关键词：欧洲市场、全球市场、展望、经济数据、企业财报 总结： 随着新的一天开启，我们将关注欧洲和全球市场的动态。今日市场上，经济数据的发布将对市场走势产生影响，包括重要的通胀指标、制造业或服务业PMI等。同时，投资者也将密切关注各大企业的财报表现，这些财报可能会揭示公司业绩以及行业趋势的最新情况。此外，任何关于政策制定者对于货币政策立场的言论也会成为左右市场情绪的关键因素。

A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu

item.title: Exclusive: Chinese researchers develop AI model for military use on back of Meta's Llama
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国顶级研究机构、中国人民解放军、Meta、Llama模型、AI工具、军事应用
总结: 据学术论文和分析显示，与中国人民解放军有关的中国顶级研究机构利用了Meta公司公开提供的Llama模型开发了一款可能用于军事应用的人工智能工具。 <div> Top Chinese research institutions linked to the People's Liberation Army have used Meta's publicly available Llama model to develop an AI tool for potential military applications, according to academic papers and analysts.

item.title: China pivot from US farm imports bolsters it against trade war risks
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、食品进口来源、关税、美国农产品、贸易摩擦 总结:
自2018年以来，中国积极推动改变其食品进口来源，使其在与华盛顿发生贸易摩擦后，若美国大选后紧张局势升级，能够在对美实施报复性关税时，对其自身粮食安全的影响减至更小程度。
China's push to shift its food import sources since 2018 has put it in a better position to impose tit-for-tat tariffs on U.S. farm goods with less harm to its food security if trade friction with Washington flares after the U.S. presidential election.

item.title: IMF warns of risks to Asia's economy as trade tensions, soft China growth bite
item.content:encoded:
关键词：IMF、北京、需求驱动型复苏、中国经济、措施 总结:
国际货币基金组织(IMF)敦促中国政府采取措施，推动经济向更多由内需驱动的方向复苏，以实现更为稳健和可持续的增长模式。
The IMF urged Beijing to take steps to achieve a more demand-driven recovery for its economy.

item.title: Asia's factory activity stagnates, taking shine off rebound in China
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 数据、政策制定者、美国、中国、贸易紧张局势
总结: 数据给政策制定者带来不利信号，他们正准备应对可能出现的美中贸易紧张局势升级。这一情况表明，两国间的贸易关系可能进一步恶化，对全球经济和政策决策产生负面影响。 <div> The data is a discouraging sign for policymakers bracing for a potential escalation of U.S.-China trade tensions.

item.title: US condemns sentencing of prominent Chinese human rights defenders
item.content:encoded: The United States on Friday condemned the "unjust imprisonment" of prominent Chinese human rights lawyer Yu Wensheng and his wife Xu Yan, who were sentenced to three years and one year and nine months, respectively, by a Chinese court this week.

item.title: China's PLA navy perform first dual aircraft formation exercise in South China Sea
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、航空母舰、辽宁舰、山东舰、南中国海、人民海军、双航母编队演练、复杂任务

总结: 中国人民海军表示，中国首度在南中国海进行了辽宁舰和山东舰双航母编队演练，此举标志着中国海军能够执行更多样化和复杂的任务。
China's aircraft carriers Liaoning and Shandong carried out dual aircraft carrier formation exercises for the first time in the South China Sea, the PLA navy said, a move that sets China's navy up for more diverse and complex missions.

item.title: China's Oct factory activity returns to expansion, Caixin PMI shows
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、制造业活动、增长、新订单、生产增长
总结: 中国制造业活动在10月份重回扩张轨道，由于新订单增加导致生产增速加快，这表明该行业在四季度初出现改善迹象。一项私营部门调查显示，这一情况预示着制造业可能出现复苏态势。 <div> China's manufacturing activity swung back to growth in October as an expansion in new orders led to a pick-up in production growth, signalling an improvement in the sector at the start of the final quarter, a private-sector survey showed on Friday.

item.title: China surrogacy abandonment case being investigated after online criticism
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、成都、代孕、被弃、调查 总结:
一名28岁的女性在四川成都担任代母后，据称遭到其代孕机构遗弃，引发社交媒体上的广泛批评。这一事件促使健康部门对此展开调查。这位女性在中国西南部城市成都完成代孕后，被代孕机构抛弃，该事件在社交媒体上引起了大量批评和关注，相关部门随即介入并开展调查工作。
A 28-year-old woman who acted as a surrogate in China's southwestern city of Chengdu is said to have been abandoned by her surrogacy agency, fuelling tides of criticism on social media and prompting health authorities to investigate the situation.

item.title: How Asian pharma suppliers cash in on Ozempic copies
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：新西兰海关、Fitaro、Orsema、Incepta Pharmaceuticals、注射药物
总结: 新西兰海关在过去一年中开始截获一批批标有Fitaro和Orsema标签的注射药物，这些药品由孟加拉国的小型制药公司Incepta Pharmaceuticals生产。 <div> Just over a year ago, New Zealand customs officials started to intercept batches of injectable medications labelled Fitaro and Orsema, developed by a little-known Bangladeshi drugmaker, Incepta Pharmaceuticals.

item.title: Blinken expects North Korea troops to enter fight against Ukraine in coming days
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、朝鲜、俄罗斯、克拉斯诺达尔边疆区、乌克兰

总结: 美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯于周四表示，美国预期朝鲜军队将在未来几天进入俄罗斯克拉斯诺达尔边疆区并参与对抗乌克兰的战斗。他同时敦促中国运用其影响力约束朝鲜的行为。
The United States expects North Korean troops in Russia's Kursk region to enter the fight against Ukraine in the coming days, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Thursday as he pressed China to use its influence to rein in Pyongyang.

item.title: Morning Bid: Bond vigilantes flex muscles, tech tonic still fizzing
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：亚洲市场、股市表现、经济数据、政策动态、企业财报
总结: 随着新的一天开始，亚洲市场的关注焦点预计将集中在各个股市的表现上，投资者将对各地的主要股指走势进行密切关注。此外，一系列重要的经济数据发布也将影响市场情绪，包括贸易数据、GDP等关键指标。同时，区域内各国的政策动态，如央行利率决议或财政政策措施，也可能引发市场波动。另外，一批重要企业的财报发布亦将为各自行业乃至整个市场带来指引和影响。 <div> A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: US calls Vietnam's blogger sentence harsh, deeply troubled by abduction reports
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、越南、博主Duong Van Thai、定罪、严厉刑罚 总结:
美国表示对越南判处博客作者Duong Van Thai重刑并据报道他被越南当局在泰国绑架表示关切。美国称对越南这一做法深感忧虑。
The United States said on Thursday it was concerned by Vietnam's conviction and "harsh" sentencing of blogger Duong Van Thai, and deeply troubled by reports he was abducted by Vietnamese authorities in Thailand.

item.title: US says 8,000 North Korean troops in Russia's Kursk
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、信息、北朝鲜军队、俄罗斯、库尔斯克地区 总结:
美国接到情报显示，“目前”有8000名朝鲜士兵位于俄罗斯的库尔斯克地区。这一情况是由美国驻联合国副大使罗伯特·伍德在安理会会议上透露的。
The United States has received information that indicates that "right now" there are 8,000 North Korean troops in Russia's Kursk region, deputy U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations Robert Wood told the Security Council.

item.title: Democratic lawmaker takes aim at Biden over TSMC chip in Huawei product, letter shows
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Mark Warner, 美国拜登政府, TSMC, 台积电, 华为, 芯片制裁
总结: 美国民主党参议员马克·华纳批评拜登政府对台积电的“明显疏于监控”，原因是据透露，台积电生产的芯片最终出现在了受到中国严厉制裁的华为的产品中。 <div> Democratic Senator Mark Warner criticized the Biden administration for "apparent lax monitoring" of TSMC following revelations a chip produced by the Taiwanese chipmaker ended up in a product made by China's heavily sanctioned Huawei.

item.title: Merck sees Gardasil China woes carrying into 2025
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Merck & Co、Gardasil、中国、销售下滑、库存减少、需求低、股价下跌

总结: 默克公司表示，由于其在中国的疫苗产品Gardasil面临低需求，分销商正在削减库存，预计该情况可能会持续到2025年。受此消息影响，默克公司的股价下跌了3%。
Merck & Co said on Thursday that weak sales of Gardasil in China are likely to carry over into 2025 as the vaccine's distributor there reduces inventories amid low demand, and the U.S. drugmaker's shares fell 3%.

item.title: UN Security Council asked to meet on Monday on North Korea missile launch
item.content:encoded:
关键词：联合国安全理事会、周一、朝鲜、洲际弹道导弹、测试 总结:
联合国安全理事会两名外交官透露，安理会将于周一召开会议，讨论朝鲜上周四进行的洲际弹道导弹试射事件。据朝方称，此次试射的是洲际弹道导弹。
The United Nations Security Council is likely to meet on Monday, two diplomats said, over North Korea's test on Thursday of what Pyongyang said was an intercontinental ballistic missile.

item.title: BIS to leave China-backed central bank digital currency project
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Bank for International Settlements、Project mBridge、中国、跨境支付、地缘政治审查
总结: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）于周四宣布退出由中国支持的跨境支付平台Project mBridge，这使得该计划在全球转账领域日益增长的地缘政治审查背景下如何发展产生了疑问。
The Bank for International Settlements said on Thursday it would quit the cross-border payments platform Project mBridge, raising questions about how the scheme backed by China will evolve at a time of growing geopolitical scrutiny of global transfers.

item.title: China's SAIC denies reports of negotiations with EU on EVs, govt-backed media says
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：SAIC Motor、欧洲联盟、最高额外电动汽车关税、35.3%、否认、单独谈判、上海观察者报
总结: 中国车企上汽集团针对欧盟对其施加的高达35.3%的最高额外电动汽车关税问题，据当地政府支持的上海观察者报报道，否认了有关其与欧盟进行单独谈判的传闻。 <div> China's SAIC Motor , hit with the highest additional electric vehicle tariffs imposed by the European Union at 35.3%, has refuted reports about separate negotiations with the EU on the matter, the local government-backed Shanghai Observer reported on Thursday.

item.title: Vietnam urges China to release detained fishermen in South China Sea
item.content:encoded:
关键词：越南、中国、拘留、越南渔民、南中国海、 Paracel群岛、渔业船舶 总结:
越南外交部发言人表示，越南已就中国涉嫌在有争议的南中国海Paracel群岛扣押越南渔民和渔船一事提出抗议。
Vietnam has protested against China's alleged detention of Vietnamese fishermen and fishing vessels in the contested Paracel Islands in the South China Sea, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Thursday.

item.title: China's manufacturing activity expands for the first time in six months
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 服务、十月、增长、经济恢复、市场活动
总结: 随着经济逐渐恢复，市场活动增加，十月份的服务业也呈现出明显的增长态势。这表明在该时期内，服务业业务量和就业等方面可能均有提升，对整体经济发展起到了积极促进作用。 <div> Services also picked up in October.

item.title: Indonesia to respond appropriately to South China Sea incidents, official says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印尼、南中国海、领土主权、中国海岸警卫队、能源公司调查 总结：
印尼官方表示，印尼在南中国海问题上的立场不变，将采取适当措施捍卫其领土主权。此前，一艘中国海岸警卫队船只干扰了雅加达国家能源公司的调查活动。
Indonesia's position on the South China Sea remains unchanged and it will respond appropriately to safeguard its territory, an official said on Thursday, after a Chinese coast guard vessel interrupted a survey by Jakarta's state energy firm.

item.title: China's Shanghai braces for torrential rain as Typhoon Kong-rey advances
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：上海、最强降雨、40多年、台风“康妮”、东部沿海
总结： 上海正面临超过40年来可能最为严重的强降雨天气，因其将受到从南部逼近的台风“康妮”的影响，在接下来的两天里，“康妮”预计将沿着东部沿海地区席卷而过。 <div> China's financial hub Shanghai is bracing for potentially the worst rains in more than 40 years as Typhoon Kong-rey looks set to arrive from the south to sweep along the eastern coast over the next two days.

item.title: US secured release of pastor from China with trade for Chinese citizen, Politico reports
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、中国、牧师David Lin、交换、公民 总结:
美国上个月与中国达成一项协议，成功让被扣押的美国牧师David Lin获释。Politico周三报道，此举是以一名中国公民的释放为交换条件。据三位知情人士透露，这一行动显示了两国之间罕见的人质外交互动。
The United States secured the release of American pastor David Lin from China last month in exchange for a Chinese citizen, Politico reported on Wednesday, citing three people familiar with the deal.

item.title: China's Oct non-manufacturing activity breaks back into expansion
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、非制造业活动、扩张、官方调查、经济复苏

总结: 官方调查显示，中国10月非制造业活动出现扩张，给政策制定者带来一些宽慰。尽管其他指标表明全球第二大经济体的全面复苏仍然路途遥远，但这一数据为中国经济带来了积极信号。
China's non-manufacturing activity expanded in October, an official survey showed on Thursday, providing some relief to policymakers even as other indicators have suggested recovery in the world's No. 2 economy remains distant.

item.title: Morning Bid: Bank of Japan, China PMIs top bumper day
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、走势、股市、汇率、经济数据 总结: 随着新的一天开始，我们将目光投向亚洲市场，预期各地股市将展现不同的走势。关键因素可能包括重要经济数据的发布，例如中国、日本和韩国等国的制造业PMI等指标，这些数据可能会对区域股市和货币汇率产生显著影响。此外，全球市场的情绪变化，特别是前一天欧美市场的表现，也将为亚洲市场带来连锁反应。投资者还需关注各国央行政策动态，尤其是美联储及日本央行的最新政策信号对市场的影响。

A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: Stocks fall with chipmakers, gold hits record high
item.content:encoded:
关键词：全球股市指数、Advanced Micro Devices、芯片制造商、黄金价格、美国大选 总结:
全球股市指数周三小幅下跌，其中芯片制造商板块受到Advanced Micro Devices悲观前景影响承压。与此同时，因对下周美国总统选举结果的不确定性引发避险需求上升，黄金价格触及历史新高。
Global stock indexes edged lower on Wednesday as a disappointing forecast from Advanced Micro Devices weighed on chipmakers, while gold prices rose to a record high as uncertainty ahead of next week's U.S. presidential election drove safe-haven demand.

item.title: US cracks down on Russia sanctions evasion in fresh action
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 美国、制裁、俄罗斯、乌克兰、新行动
总结: 美国于周三对数百个目标实施了新的制裁措施，表明其将继续打击规避针对俄罗斯入侵乌克兰所实施的制裁行为。此举是对俄罗斯的进一步施压和回应。 <div> The United States imposed sanctions on Wednesday on hundreds of targets in fresh action against Russia, a signal the U.S. will continue to counter evasion of its measures imposed over Moscow's invasion of Ukraine.

item.title: StanChart's Winters says banks approaching 'sweet spot'
item.content:encoded:
关键词：银行、维持、强劲表现、利率下降、标准渣打银行CEO比尔·温特斯

总结: 标准渣打银行首席执行官比尔·温特斯周三向路透社表示，即使在利率下降的情况下，银行仍具备维持当前强劲业绩水平的良好态势。
Banks are in a good position to maintain current strong performance levels even as interest rates come down, Standard Chartered Chief Executive Bill Winters told Reuters on Wednesday.

item.title: European Commission to launch investigation into Temu, Bloomberg reports
item.content:encoded:
关键词：欧洲委员会、中国、在线零售平台、Temu、非法产品销售调查 总结:
欧洲委员会据Bloomberg新闻周三报道，将对中国的在线零售平台Temu展开调查，以确定其是否违反了旨在防止网上销售非法产品的规定。此举源于匿名消息源透露的信息。
The European Commission is set to launch an investigation into Chinese online retail platform Temu over whether it is in breach of rules meant to prevent the sale of illegal products online, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed sources.

item.title: Eli Lilly's rare sales miss for weight-loss drug sends shares tumbling
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Eli Lilly、体重管理药物、糖尿病药物、华尔街销售估计、供应过剩 总结:
美国制药公司礼来公司的高关注度体重管理和糖尿病药物在本周三未能达到华尔街的销售预期，原因是药品库存积压在仓库中。这一情况与该公司此前长期难以满足强劲市场需求的情况形成了鲜明对比。
Eli Lilly's high profile weight-loss and diabetes drugs fell short of Wall Street sales estimates on Wednesday as supplies sat in warehouses, a 180-degree turn for the company after long struggling to meet outsized demand.

item.title: AstraZeneca says its China operations president under investigation
item.content:encoded:
关键词：AstraZeneca、中国总裁、调查、合作、股价下跌 总结: 英国制药公司阿斯利康(AstraZeneca)表示，其中国区总裁正接受中国政府调查，并已配合当局工作。此消息导致该公司股价最多下挫5.3%，成为伦敦富时100指数中表现最差的股票。

AstraZeneca's China president is under investigation and is cooperating with Chinese authorities, the company said on Wednesday, sending its shares down as much as 5.3% and making it the biggest loser on London's FTSE 100.

item.title: US LNG export gains at risk if Trump wins election and boosts tariffs, analysts say
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 美国液化天然气出口商、唐纳德·特朗普、共和党、中国进口关税、能源许可
总结: 如果共和党的唐纳德·特朗普赢得总统选举，美国液化天然气(LNG)出口商可能面临新的挑战。尽管特朗普曾承诺加快新能源项目的审批，但其提出的对从中国进口商品征收60%关税的方案可能会给美国LNG出口带来障碍。 <div> U.S. exporters of liquefied natural gas (LNG) could face new hurdles if Republican Donald Trump wins the presidential election because of a proposed 60% tariff on imports from China, despite the former president's pledge to speed new energy permits, say analysts.

item.title: US targets 40 firms, research groups for aiding Russian military
item.content:encoded:
关键词：拜登政府、俄罗斯军事、贸易限制名单、乌克兰战争压力 总结:
拜登政府周三将40家公司和研究机构列入贸易限制名单，原因是它们涉嫌支持俄罗斯对乌克兰的军事行动。这一举措旨在加大华盛顿对莫斯科在乌战争努力的压力。
The Biden Administration on Wednesday added 40 companies and research institutions to a trade restriction list over their alleged support of the Russian military, as Washington seeks to keep up pressure on Moscow's war effort in Ukraine.

item.title: US issues hundreds of Russia-related sanctions, Treasury Dept website shows
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国、俄罗斯、制裁、中国、印度、土耳其、实体、个人、美国财政部、网站。 总结:
美国周三针对俄罗斯实施了新的制裁措施，根据美国财政部网站消息，此次制裁涉及数百个目标，包括数十家中国、印度和土耳其的实体和个人。
The United States on Wednesday targeted Russia with fresh sanctions, issuing curbs on hundreds of targets including dozens of Chinese, Indian and Turkish entities and individuals, according to the U.S. Treasury Department website.

item.title: Volvo Cars seeks to oust Northvolt from EV battery venture
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Volvo Cars、Northvolt、瑞典电池制造合资企业、NOVO、中国拥有、收购股权、新伙伴、 Gigafactory 计划 总结:
沃尔沃汽车公司表示，正寻求从Northvolt手中接管双方在瑞典电池制造合资企业NOVO中的股份。然而，完成这一动作后，沃尔沃将需要寻找新的合作伙伴来确保其 Gigafactory 计划能够继续推进。由于沃尔沃已被中国公司控股，这一举动对于该公司自身及合资项目的未来发展具有重要意义。
Volvo Cars is seeking to take over Northvolt's stake in their Swedish battery-making joint venture NOVO but will need a new partner to keep plans for a gigafactory on track, the Chinese-owned automaker said on Wednesday.

item.title: Chinese EV maker BYD's net profit up 11.5%, revenue beats Tesla for first time
item.content:encoded:
关键词：BYD、电动汽车制造商、第三季净利润、增长11.5%、政府贸易-in激励政策 总结:
中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪周三宣布，其第三季度净利润实现了11.5%的增长，这主要得益于政府提供的贸易-in激励政策，使其销售保持了强劲势头。
Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD posted an 11.5% rise in third-quarter net profit on Wednesday as it maintained strong sales momentum helped by government trade-in incentives.

item.title: Top Chinese airlines' profits fall as flagging economy pressures fares
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、三大国有航空公司、第三季、利润下滑、国内经济增长放缓、廉价航班需求增加
总结： 中国三大国有航空公司尽管在今年夏季创下了乘客人数纪录，并且飞机载客率较去年有所提高，但第三季度仍出现了利润下降的情况。这主要是由于国内经济增速放缓导致旅客转向寻求更便宜的航班票价所致。 <div> China's top three state-owned airlines reported profit declines in the third quarter despite record summer passenger numbers and fuller planes than last year, as a slowdown in domestic economic growth pushes flyers to seek cheaper fares.

item.title: India, China complete troops pull-back from border face-off points, Indian official says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度、中国、军队撤离、 Himalayan 边境、争议点 总结:
中印两国已经按照计划从他们具有争议的喜马拉雅边境两个对峙点撤回了各自部队，一名印度国防官员于周三表示。
India and China have completed pulling back their troops from two face-off points on their disputed Himalayan frontier as planned, an Indian defence official said on Wednesday.

item.title: EU tariffs on Chinese electric cars based on WTO rules, Renault boss says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：欧洲联盟、关税、中国电动车辆、世界贸易组织、Luca de Meo、雷诺 总结:
欧洲联盟针对进口自中国的电动汽车实施的新关税是依据世界贸易组织的规定进行的，该规定为所有成员国所接受。雷诺汽车公司的首席执行官Luca de Meo就此作出了上述表示。
European Union tariffs imposed on Wednesday on imported Chinese electric vehicles are based on rules set by the World Trade Organization that everyone has signed up to, said Luca de Meo, chief executive of French car maker Renault .

item.title: BYD appoints former Stellantis UK chief Davino to push European expansion
item.content:encoded:
关键词：BYD、Stellantis UK、Maria Grazia Davino、欧洲、德国 总结:
中国汽车制造商比亚迪宣布，已任命前斯特兰提斯（Stellantis）英国首席执行官玛丽亚·格拉齐亚·达维诺（Maria Grazia Davino）领导其在包括德国在内的一系列欧洲国家的业务运营。
BYD has appointed former Stellantis UK chief Maria Grazia Davino to lead its operations in a group of European countries including Germany, the Chinese automaker said on Wednesday.

item.title: Exclusive: China tells carmakers to pause investment in EU countries backing EV tariffs, sources say
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、欧洲国家、投资、电动车辆、关税
总结: 中国已要求其汽车制造商暂停对支持对中国制造电动汽车征收额外关税的欧洲国家进行大规模投资。这一举措可能会进一步加剧欧洲内部的分歧。据两位知情人士透露，此举显示了中国对于贸易保护主义立场的强硬回应，也可能影响中欧之间的电动汽车产业合作与发展。 <div> China has told its automakers to halt big investment in European countries that support extra tariffs on Chinese-built electric vehicles, two people briefed about the matter said, a move likely to further divide Europe.

item.title: China's looming fiscal package set to stabilise rather than boost growth
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：刺激措施、调整、经济增长、前期策略、改变
总结: 中国政府正在制定更为精准的刺激措施，与以往全力以赴的经济增长振兴策略相比，这是一种转变。这一新方法意味着更加注重政策的精细化和定向性，旨在更有效地推动经济复苏和发展。 <div> The measures in the works represent a more calibrated approach to stimulus, which is a departure from previous all-out strategies to revive growth.

item.title: Gazprom subsidiary files $880 mln claim against Linde
item.content:encoded:
关键词：俄罗斯天然气巨头Gazprom、子公司、林德(Linde)、857亿卢布(8.79亿美元)、索赔

总结: 俄罗斯天然气巨头Gazprom的一家子公司已向法院提交了一份针对全球工业气体和工程公司Linde及其子公司的索赔申请，索赔金额高达857亿卢布（约合8.79亿美元）。
A subsidiary of Russia's gas major Gazprom has filed a claim for 85.7 billion roubles ($879 million) against global industrial gases and engineering company Linde and its subsidiaries, court documents showed on Wednesday.

item.title: Volkswagen third-quarter profit slumps as major overhaul looms
item.content:encoded:
关键词：大众汽车、第三季、营业利润、下滑、成本高昂 总结:
大众汽车宣布其第三季度营业利润锐减42%，主要原因是核心乘用车部门表现疲软以及包括车型翻新在内的高额成本影响了该公司业绩。
Volkswagen said on Wednesday its third-quarter operating profit plunged 42% as weak performance in the core passenger car unit and high costs, including for model revamps, hit the automaker.

item.title: Toyota worldwide output drops for 8th straight month in September
item.content:encoded:
关键词：丰田汽车、全球产量、连续第八个月下滑、美国、中国 总结:
丰田汽车周三表示，其全球产量已连续第八个月下降，原因是其两大市场——美国和中国的销量与产量均出现下滑。
Toyota Motor said on Wednesday its worldwide production fell for an eighth straight month in September, as both sales and output declined in its two biggest markets, the United States and China.

item.title: China, queried on Trump comments, says Taiwan could become 'discarded'
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、美国、特朗普、选举、台湾

总结: 中国暗示，如果美国共和党总统候选人特朗普赢得11月5日的选举，他可能会“抛弃”台湾。中国表示，美国一直奉行“美国优先”的政策。这意味着，如果特朗普胜选，他可能会基于这一政策重新考虑美国与台湾的关系。
China implied on Wednesday that if U.S. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump won the Nov. 5 election he could 'discard' Taiwan, saying the United States has always pursued an "America First" policy.

item.title: Russia's deputy foreign minister meets China's foreign minister in Beijing, Russia's RIA reports
item.content:encoded: Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Andrei Rudenko met with China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi in Beijing on Wednesday, Russia's RIA agency reported from Beijing.

item.title: Australia to ramp up missile production as Indo Pacific enters new missile age
item.content:encoded: Australia said it was boosting its missile defence capability amid "significant concerns" about China's test of an ICBM in the South Pacific, and will bolster weapons stockpiles and exports to security partners as the region enters a new "missile age".

item.title: Brazil's military to reinforce Rio security during G20 summit, security official says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：巴西、武装力量、安全强化、G20会议、里约热内卢

总结: 巴西将动用其武装力量加强下月在里约热内卢举行的二十国集团（G20）领导人会议期间的安全保障工作。该城市州级安全部门秘书长于周二宣布了这一消息。
Brazilian armed forces will be used to reinforce security during the meeting of the Group of 20 leading economies in Rio de Janeiro next month, the city's state secretary for security said on Tuesday.

item.title: What's at stake for China's markets at the US election
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国货币、股市、保护主义、美国政策、选举影响
总结: 随着美国转向保护主义政策，预计中国的货币和股票市场将受到主要冲击，并对选举产生的贸易和外交政策影响极为敏感。这意味着中国的经济表现可能会与美国的政策走向紧密相关，特别是在国际贸易和投资领域。 <div> China's currency and equities will bear the brunt of a protectionist shift in the U.S. and are seen trading sensitively to the election's trade and foreign policy implications.

item.title: Morning Bid: China 'bazooka' fizzles, dollar on the march
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市表现、中国经济数据、日本央行利率决定、韩国出口 总结:
预计今日亚洲市场将关注各国股市的表现，特别是中国经济数据的发布，可能会对区域市场产生影响。投资者也将聚焦日本央行的利率决定，任何政策变化都可能引起市场波动。此外，韩国作为重要的出口国，其即将公布的出口数据也将成为市场关注的焦点，该数据或将反映全球需求趋势以及地区经济健康状况。
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: First Solar says several large rivals are infringing on patents
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：First Solar、美国太阳能面板制造商、专利侵权、领先太阳能技术、竞争对手
总结: 美国太阳能面板制造商First Solar周二在与分析师的电话会议中表示，已通知几家大型竞争对手，认为它们侵犯了其在领先太阳能技术方面的专利。 <div> U.S. solar panel maker First Solar has notified several large rivals that it believes they are infringing on its patents on a leading solar technology, executives said on a conference call with analysts on Tuesday.

item.title: Daimler Truck assesses China business, flags $195 mln valuation hit
item.content:encoded:
关键词：Daimler Truck、中国运营评估、中国市场复苏、180万欧元估值调整费用、卡车市场 总结:
德国戴姆勒卡车公司表示，由于中国卡车市场复苏前景不明朗，该公司正在评估其在中国的业务未来走向。同时，该公司宣布将面临一笔1.8亿欧元（约合1950万美元）的一次性估值调整费用。
Germany's Daimler Truck said on Tuesday it was assessing the future of its China operations as a recovery in the Chinese truck market remained elusive, and flagged a 180 million euro ($195 million) one-off valuation adjustment charge.

item.title: Trump family, Biden aides among China hack targets, NYT reports
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国黑客、特朗普家族、拜登政府官员、电信公司系统、纽约时报
总结: 据《纽约时报》报道，一些与中方有关的黑客成功侵入了电信公司的系统，目标包括美国前总统特朗普的家庭成员以及拜登政府的一些官员。这些人熟悉此事的消息源透露，这次网络攻击事件凸显了中国黑客对具有政治敏感性的个人持续不断的网络威胁活动。 <div> Members of former U.S. President Donald Trump's family and officials from the Biden administration were among those targeted by China-linked hackers who were able to break into telecommunications company systems, the New York Times reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Special Report: Inside Intel, CEO Pat Gelsinger fumbled the revival of an American icon
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Intel、TSMC、芯片制造、折扣、合作
总结: Intel与台湾的TSMC达成了一项合作协议，TSMC将为Intel生产由其设计但自身无法制造的芯片。据消息人士透露，TSMC向Intel提供了深度折扣。 <div> Intel had a sweet deal going with Taiwan’s TSMC, who would make chips that Intel designed but could not produce. And it was offering deep discounts to Intel, sources say.

item.title: ASMI ups guidance as AI, Chinese demand remain strong
item.content:encoded:
关键词：ASM International (ASMI)、第四季度、第三季、订单增长、人工智能、中国订单 总结:
ASM International (ASMI)周二预测，由于人工智能持续推动高端订单增加，以及中国订单下降幅度低于预期，其第三季度订单超出预期，进而上调了第四季度业绩展望。
Chip-making equipment supplier ASM International (ASMI) forecast on Tuesday higher fourth-quarter guidance after third-quarter bookings beat expectations as AI continues to drive high-end orders and Chinese orders fall less than anticipated.

item.title: Sales at Moncler slip 3% in third quarter as demand weakens globally
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Moncler、营收、下跌、第三季度、分析师预期
总结: 意大利奢侈户外服装品牌Moncler在第三季度的销售额（按固定汇率计算）下降了3%，这一跌幅略高于分析师的预期。其主要市场的业务均出现疲软。 <div> Revenues at Italian luxury outerwear maker Moncler fell 3% at constant exchange rates in the third quarter, slightly more than analysts had anticipated, with weakness spread across all its main markets.

item.title: Apple set for biggest revenue jump in two years on iPhone demand in China
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：Apple、季度营收、两年来最大增幅、iPhone需求、中国
总结: 苹果公司预计将于本周四公布其两年来最大的季度营收增长，这主要得益于在其年度产品发布周期接近尾声之际，iPhone的需求表现好于近几年，尤其是在中国市场。 <div> Apple is expected to report its biggest quarterly revenue jump in two years on Thursday, with iPhone demand faring better than recent years toward the end of the company's annual release cycle, especially in China.

item.title: Kremlin rejects U.S. accusations that Russia spread hurricane misinformation
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：克里姆林宫、美国、俄罗斯、中国、古巴、假新闻、飓风米尔顿、飓风海伦妮
总结： 克里姆林宫周二否认了美国对其与中俄及古巴共同散播关于飓风米尔顿和海伦妮假新闻的指责。 <div> The Kremlin on Tuesday rejected U.S. accusations that Russia, China and Cuba had spread fake news relating to Hurricanes Milton and Helene.

item.title: Reaction to Reuters report on China's stimulus plans
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、债务发行、10万亿人民币、经济振兴、知情人士 总结：
中国正考虑在下周批准在未来几年内发行超过10万亿元人民币（约合1.4万亿美元）的额外债务，以提振其脆弱的经济。据两位知情人士透露，这一举措旨在为中国经济注入资金，推动经济增长。
China is considering approving next week the issuance of over 10 trillion yuan ($1.4 trillion) in extra debt in the next few years to revive its fragile economy, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.

item.title: China detains South Korean on suspicion of espionage
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、韩国公民、涉嫌间谍活动、拘留、大使馆官员
总结： 中国周二证实，已拘留一名涉嫌从事间谍活动的韩国公民，并已向韩国大使馆官员通报此事，但未透露该名被拘留者的具体身份和详细指控情况。 <div> China confirmed on Tuesday the detention of a South Korean citizen suspected of espionage, saying it had advised embassy officials, but without identifying the individual or detailing the charges.

item.title: China's factory activity likely contracted in Oct for a sixth month - Reuters poll
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 中国、工厂活动、收缩、第六个月、刺激措施
总结: 中国10月工厂活动可能连续第六个月出现萎缩，但幅度微小，这与官员们的乐观看法相吻合，他们认为近期的新一轮刺激措施将使这个世界第二大经济体重回增长轨道。尽管制造业持续承压，不过官方预期刺激政策的效果将逐步显现并助力经济复苏。 <div> China's factory activity likely contracted in October for a sixth month, a Reuters poll showed on Tuesday, but by the tiniest of margins, backing officials' optimism that recent fresh stimulus will get the world's No.2 economy back on track.

item.title: Exclusive: Eyeing US election, China considers over $1.4 trillion in extra debt over next few years
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、债务发行、10万亿人民币、经济复苏、特朗普胜选
总结： 中国正在考虑下周批准在未来几年内发行超过10万亿元人民币（约1.4万亿美元）的额外债务，以振兴其脆弱的经济。若唐纳德·特朗普赢得美国总统选举，预计这一财政刺激方案将进一步加强。 <div> China is considering approving next week the issuance of over 10 trillion yuan ($1.4 trillion) in extra debt in the next few years to revive its fragile economy, a fiscal package which is expected to be further bolstered if Donald Trump wins the U.S. election.

item.title: North Korean foreign minister arrives in Russian far east, heading for Moscow
item.content:encoded:
关键词：朝鲜外相朴善姬、俄罗斯远东城市符拉迪沃斯托克、莫斯科、俄罗斯国家媒体、周二、周三 总结:
朝鲜外相朴善姬于周二抵达俄罗斯远东城市符拉迪沃斯托克，并计划于周三访问莫斯科。此消息由俄罗斯国家媒体发布。
North Korean Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui arrived in Russia's far eastern city of Vladivostok on Tuesday and will visit Moscow on Wednesday, Russian state media said.

item.title: China's 'Hawaii' under water as tropical storm dumps record rainfall
item.content:encoded:
关键词：极端降雨、中国南方、海南省、热带气旋、记录破纪录湿天气 总结:
中国南方的海南省连续第三天遭受极端降雨侵袭，该地区被誉为中国的“夏威夷”。此次降雨是由于又一个热带气旋过境所导致，使得今年已经经历了破纪录湿天气的海南岛大半区域被洪水淹没。
For a third day, extreme rainfall pounded the southern Chinese province of Hainan, known as China's "Hawaii", amid the transit of yet another tropical cyclone, leaving the island half-submerged in a year of record-breaking wet weather.

item.title: Indonesia's Prabowo to visit China and US in first foreign trip, newspaper says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印尼总统、普拉博沃·苏比安托、中国、美国、访问 总结：
印尼新任总统普拉博沃·苏比安托将在上任几周后开启对五国的访问行程，据《印尼日报》报道，他将首访中国和美国。此举显示出普拉博沃意在国际舞台上积极发挥重要作用的意愿。
Indonesia President Prabowo Subianto will visit China and the United States during a five-country trip just a few weeks after taking office, Kompas newspaper reported on Tuesday, signalling his intent to pursue an active role on the international stage.

item.title: Election shock in key US ally Japan could embolden China, other rivals
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 日本、选举结果、美国、总统选举、中国、竞争对手、东亚洲、西方决心、潜在不稳定 总结:
日本出现意外的选举结果，作为美国在亚太地区的重要安全盟友，加上下周可能引发不稳定的美国总统选举，这为中国和其他竞争对手提供了试探西方在东亚地区决心的机会。
A shock election result in Japan, Washington's key Asian security ally, and the United States' potentially destabilising presidential election next week could provide an opportunity for China and other rivals to test Western resolve in East Asia.

item.title: Founder of TikTok owner ByteDance jumps to top of China's rich list
item.content:encoded:
关键词：ByteDance、张一鸣、中国首富、个人财富、$49.3亿美元、年度富豪榜、房地产、新能源、表现不佳。 总结：
根据一份年度富豪榜显示，ByteDance创始人张一鸣以493亿美元的个人财富成为中国首富。然而，来自房地产和新能源行业的富豪们今年的表现则不如人意。
ByteDance founder Zhang Yiming is China's richest person, with personal wealth of $49.3 billion, an annual rich list showed on Tuesday, although counterparts in real estate and renewables have fared less well.

item.title: Rupee battles yuan weakness, losses in local equities
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度卢比、压力、中国人民币贬值、当地股市下跌、外资流出
总结: 印度卢比周二持续承受压力，主要原因是受到中国人民币贬值的影响以及当地股市因外资流出而下跌。
The Indian rupee remained under pressure on Tuesday in the wake of a drop in the Chinese yuan and a fall in local equities amid foreign outflows.

item.title: What is 'Taiwan independence' and is Taiwan already independent?
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、台湾、使用武力、控制、声明
总结: 中国重申其立场，表示不会放弃使用武力来实现对台湾的统一控制。这一声明强调了中国对于台湾问题的一贯主张和维护国家统一的决心。 <div> China says it will not renounce the use of force to bring Taiwan under its control.

item.title: Exclusive: China's Xi pressed Biden to alter language on Taiwan
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：中国、美国、台湾独立、反对、支持
总结: 据路透社消息来源透露，中国希望美国能明确表示“我们反对台湾独立”，而不是当前美国所持的立场，即“不支持台湾独立”。 <div> China wanted the US to say "we oppose Taiwan independence," rather than the current version, which is that the United States "does not support" independence for Taiwan, sources told Reuters.

item.title: HSBC coy on cost savings of revamp as quarterly profit tops expectations
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：HSBC Holdings、第三季度利润、预期、营收增长、结构改革
总结: HSBC Holdings在周二宣布，得益于财富管理和批发银行业务营收的增长，其第三季度利润超出市场预期。然而，公司并未立即向投资者提供关于其大规模结构性改革将如何实现成本节约的更多详细信息。 <div> HSBC Holdings beat third quarter profit expectations on Tuesday thanks to rising wealth and wholesale banking revenue, but kept investors waiting for more detail on how a sweeping overhaul of its structure will deliver cost savings.

item.title: China to send 14th crewed mission to space on Shenzhou-19
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国、三名宇航员、低地球轨道、第14次载人航天任务、科学实验
总结: 中国将于周三将三名航天员送入低地球轨道，这是该国进行的第14次载人航天任务。在这次任务中，航天员们将执行数十项科学实验。
China will send three astronauts into low-Earth orbit on Wednesday in the country's 14th crewed mission to space, where dozens of scientific experiments will be conducted.

item.title: Rupee to remain defiant in face of higher U.S. yields, outflows
item.content:encoded:
关键词：印度卢比、周二开盘、美国国债收益率、资金外流、印度储备银行干预

总结： 印度卢比预计在周二开盘时变化不大，对美国国债收益率、资金外流等外部因素反应平淡，这可能是因为存在印度储备银行的干预措施。
The Indian rupee is likely to open little changed on Tuesday, remaining unresponsive to U.S. Treasury yields, outflows and other external cues amid possible intervention from the Reserve Bank of India.

item.title: Senior US diplomat arrives in Taiwan as officials downplay Trump comments
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国高级外交官、台湾、台北、特朗普、芯片产业 总结：
美国一名负责管理与台湾关系的高级外交官已抵达台北，据实质上的美国驻台大使馆于周二宣布。与此同时，台湾官员试图淡化特朗普对台湾关键芯片产业和国防需求的最新批评。
A senior U.S. diplomat who helps manage ties with Taiwan has arrived in Taipei, the de facto U.S. embassy said on Tuesday, as Taiwanese officials sought to downplay Donald Trump's latest attacks of the island's crucial chip industry and defence needs.

item.title: China warns of deep-sea spying devices, underwater 'lighthouses' that guide foreign submarines
item.content:encoded:
关键词：中国国家安全部、间谍设备、海洋表面、海底、水下“灯塔”潜艇引导 总结:
中国国家安全部周二表示，已从海洋表面和海底回收多件间谍设备，其中包括能指引外国潜艇通行的水下“灯塔”。这表明中国在维护国家安全方面采取了积极行动，针对潜在的海洋监控与情报收集行为进行了有效反制。
China's Ministry of State Security said on Tuesday that it had retrieved spying devices both on the ocean surface and in the depths of the sea, including underwater "lighthouses" that could guide the transit of foreign submarines.

item.title: Morning Bid: Uncertainty runs deep, investors seek clearer signals
item.content:encoded:
关键词：亚洲市场、股市表现、经济数据、政策动态、企业财报 总结:
随着新的一天开启，投资者将关注亚洲市场的股市表现，预计各主要股指将会有所波动。今日的经济数据发布将成为市场焦点，包括中国、日本和韩国等国的关键经济指标，可能对市场走势产生影响。此外，各地央行的政策动态也将吸引眼球，任何有关货币政策调整的信号都将引发市场反应。同时，一些重要企业的财报公布也可能左右相关板块乃至整体市场的表现。
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.

item.title: US finalizes rules to curb AI investments in China, impose other restrictions
item.content:encoded:
关键词：拜登政府、美国投资、中国、人工智能、技术领域、国家安全 总结:
拜登政府表示，正在制定规则以限制美国对中国的投资，特别是那些可能威胁到美国国家安全的人工智能和其他技术领域。此举意味着美国将进一步收紧对华科技领域的投资管控，旨在保护其国家安全利益。
The Biden administration said on Monday it is finalizing rules that will limit U.S. investments in artificial intelligence and other technology sectors in China that could threaten U.S. national security.

item.title: Russian, Chinese and Cuban accounts are amplifying hurricane misinformation, US official says
item.content:encoded:
关键词：俄罗斯、中国、古巴政府、虚假信息、美国飓风 总结:
美国官员周一表示，与俄罗斯和中国有关联的影响行动者及古巴政府在美国遭遇两场致命飓风后，一直在放大虚假信息，包括错误地声称美国拒绝了灾区救援请求。
Russian and Chinese-linked influence actors and the Cuban government have been amplifying misinformation following two deadly U.S. hurricanes, including false claims that the U.S. was denying disaster relief claims, a U.S. official said on Monday.

item.title: Mexico warns US ban on Chinese car tech could hurt automotive industry
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词：墨西哥政府、拜登政府、中国软件硬件、联网车辆、国家安全顾虑
总结： 墨西哥政府对于拜登政府因国家安全顾虑，提议禁止在美国道路上运行的联网汽车使用关键的中国软件和硬件表示关注。 <div> The Mexican government on Monday raised concerns about the Biden administration's proposal to prohibit key Chinese software and hardware in connected vehicles on American roads due to national security concerns.

item.title: US lawmakers urge review of China threat from photonics technology
item.content:encoded:
关键词：美国议员、商务部、中国、硅光子技术、国家安全威胁 总结:
美国两党议员周一敦促商务部门审视来自中国发展硅光子技术对国家安全构成的潜在威胁。硅光子技术是一种快速发展领域，有可能加速人工智能的进步。
A bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers on Monday urged the Department of Commerce to examine national security threats from China's development of silicon photonics technology, a fast-developing field that could speed up artificial intelligence.

item.title: Beijing stabbing wounds five in rare knife assault, Chinese police say
item.content:encoded:
关键词：北京、刀具袭击、中国首都、五人受伤、三名未成年人

总结: 周一，中国首都北京市发生一起刀具袭击事件，据国家电视台CCTV引用当地警方报告称，该事件造成包括三名未成年人在内的五人受伤。
A knife attack in China's capital Beijing wounded five people including three minors on Monday, state television CCTV reported, citing local police.

item.title: Trump's second-term agenda: deportations, trade wars, cutting corporate tax rate
